台文: 伊毋是刁意故的，你莫閣共伊責備矣。
台羅: I m̄ sī thiau-ì-kòo--ê, lí mài koh kā i tsik-pī--ah.
中文: 他不是故意的，你不要再指責他了。
英文: He didn't mean it, don't blame him anymore.

台文: 我欲揣校長，勞煩你通報一下。
台羅: Guá beh tshuē hāu-tiúnn, lô-huân lí thong-pò--tsi̍t-ē.
中文: 我要找校長，麻煩你通報一聲。
英文: I want to find the principal, please inform him for me.

台文: 做人若貧惰，一世人袂快活。
台羅: Tsò-lâng nā pîn-tuānn, tsi̍t-sì-lâng bē khuìnn-ua̍h.
中文: 為人處事若不勤快，一輩子不會有好日子過。
英文: If one is not diligent in handling things, they will never have a good life.

台文: 彼个貧惰骨，日頭曝尻川矣閣毋起來。
台羅: Hit ê pîn-tuānn-kut, ji̍t-thâu pha̍k kha-tshng--ah koh m̄ khí--lâi.
中文: 那個懶惰蟲，太陽晒屁股了還不起床。
英文: That lazy bug, the sun is shining on its butt and it still won't get up.
Don't be so lazy.

台文: 伊是讓你，毋是驚你，你毋通軟塗深掘喔！
台羅: I sī niū--lí, m̄ sī kiann--lí, lí m̄-thang nńg-thôo-tshim-ku̍t--ooh!
中文: 他是讓你不是怕你，你不可以得寸進尺喔！
英文: He is someone who doesn't make you afraid, but you can't take advantage of him!

台羅: Tsit-tah ê lâng lóng tsiânn tshin-tshiat.
英文: The people here are all very friendly.

台羅: I thiànn kah thàu-àm khùn bē khì.
英文: He couldn't sleep all night because of the pain.
Upstairs is very noisy every night.
Bring a chair to prop up your feet.

台羅: Guá hōo lí kiann tsi̍t-ē hiám nńg-kha!
英文: I was scared by you and almost had weak legs!

台文: 你毋通佇遐空喙哺舌亂造話。
台羅: Lí m̄-thang tī hia khang-tshuì-pōo-tsi̍h luān tsō-uē.
中文: 你不要在那裡空口說白話胡亂造謠。
英文: Don't speak nonsense and spread rumors there.

台文: 叫甲彼箍軟跤蝦袂做代誌，有啥物路用？
台羅: Kiò kah hit khoo nńg-kha-hê bē tsò tāi-tsì, ū siánn-mih lōo-īng?
中文: 叫來那個軟腳蝦不會做事，有什麼用？
英文: Calling that useless person who can't do anything, what's the point?

台文: 這過的風颱誠大，你愛提早預防。
台羅: Tsit-kuè ê hong-thai tsiânn tuā, lí ài thê-tsá ī-hông.
中文: 這次的颱風很大，你要提早預防。
英文: This typhoon is very big, you need to take early precautions.

台文: 彼條路傷狹，轎車無法度通過。
台羅: Hit tiâu lōo siunn e̍h, kiau-tshia bô-huat-tōo thong-kuè.
中文: 那條路太窄，轎車無法通行。
英文: That road is too narrow, and sedan chairs cannot pass through.

台文: 這條法案已經佇立法院通過矣。
台羅: Tsit tiâu huat-àn í-king tī Li̍p-huat-īnn thong-kuè--ah.
中文: 這條法案已經在立法院通過了。
英文: This bill has already been passed in the Legislative Yuan.

台羅: Tsa-àm guá thàu-mê lóng bô khùn.
英文: Last night I didn't sleep all night.
He went to see a doctor overnight.

台文: 種樹仔嘛是咧為人類造福。
台羅: Tsìng tshiū-á mā sī teh uī jîn-luī tsō-hok.
中文: 種樹也是在為人類帶來好處。
英文: Planting trees also brings benefits to humans.

台文: 遮的弓蕉已經軟膏膏矣，毋緊食著愛擲掉！
台羅: Tsia-ê king-tsio í-king nńg-kô-kô--ah, m̄ kín tsia̍h tio̍h-ài tàn-tiāu!
中文: 這些香蕉已經軟趴趴了，不趕快吃就得丟掉！
英文: These bananas have become soft and mushy, if you don't eat them quickly, you'll have to throw them away!

台文: 毋知按怎我今仔日規身軀軟膏膏？
台羅: M̄ tsai án-tsuánn guá kin-á-ji̍t kui-sin-khu nńg-kô-kô?
中文: 不知怎麼我今天全身無力？
英文: I don't know why I feel weak all over today.

台文: 伊退休了後生活誠逍遙。
台羅: I thè-hiu liáu-āu sing-ua̍h tsiânn siau-iâu.
中文: 他退休後的生活很自在。
英文: His life after retirement is very free.
chain car accident
This is bad.
He can't run away now.

台羅: Lí tsit-tiám-á tsînn ē-tàng tshòng siannh?
中文: 你這麼點兒錢能做什麼？
英文: What can you do with so little money?

台文: 伊逐擺攏欲佮人相諍，毋過無一擺諍贏。
台羅: I ta̍k-pái lóng beh kah lâng sio-tsènn, m̄-koh bô tsi̍t pái tsènn iânn.
中文: 他每次都要和人家爭辯，但是沒有一次辯贏。
英文: He always wants to argue with others, but he has never won an argument.

台文: 你小等一下，連鞭就好矣。

中文: 人如果沒法呼吸就是要回去見老祖宗了。

英文: Bad breath and a fiery temper, need to see a doctor.

中文: 他真不怕死，竟然從二樓跳下來。

台羅: Ji̍t-gua̍t-thâm ê kíng-sik bē-bái, ū-îng lán lâi-khì kiânn-kiânn--leh.
中文: 日月潭的風景不錯，有空我們去走一走。

台文: 自從生理失敗，伊就若揜尾狗咧，攏無愛佮朋友來往。
台羅: Tsū-tsiông sing-lí sit-pāi, i  tō ná iap-bué-káu--leh, lóng bô ài kah pîng-iú lâi-óng.
中文: 自從經商失利，他就像一隻喪志落魄的狗，不願跟朋友來往。
英文: Since his business failed, he has been like a despondent and downcast dog, unwilling to socialize with his friends.

台文: 遮爾重要的物件竟然無紮，你實在有夠散形。

中文: 這麼重要的東西竟然沒帶，你實在很懶散。
英文: You're really careless for not bringing such an important thing.

台羅: In tau tsin sàn-tshiah, lóng m̄ bat khuànn i tshīng tsi̍t su sin sann.
中文: 他家很窮，從未見過他穿一套新衣。
英文: His family is poor, and I have never seen him wear a new set of clothes.

台羅: Kánn-ná sī i, koh kánn-ná m̄ sī.
英文: It seems like him, but also seems like it's not.

台文: 彼幾个散食人寒天時無寒衫通穿，實在足可憐的。
台羅: Hit kuí ê sàn-tsia̍h-lâng kuânn-thinn sî bô kuânn-sann thang tshīng, si̍t-tsāi tsiok khó-liân--ê.
中文: 那幾個窮人冬天沒有冬衣可穿，真的很可憐。
英文: Those few poor people have no winter clothes to wear in winter, they are really pitiful.

台文: 伊講遐的話是為著欲敨氣，你聽了準煞。

中文: 他說那些話是為了發洩情緒，你聽聽就好。
英文: He said those words to vent his emotions, just listen.

台羅: Tsit-má kíng-khì tsin bái, ta̍k-ke lóng kiōng-beh bô thâu-lōo--ah.

英文: The current economy is very poor, and everyone is about to lose their jobs.

中文: 警察一到，整群賭徒就解散了。
英文: As soon as the police arrived, the whole group of gamblers dispersed.

台羅: Tsit ê thng-thâu ê tsu-bī bē-bái.
英文: The taste of this soup is good.

台文: 去音樂館聽歌的滋味袂䆀。
台羅: Khì im-ga̍k-kuán thiann kua ê tsu-bī bē-bái.
中文: 去音樂館聽歌的感覺不錯。
英文: The feeling of going to a music hall to listen to music is good.

台羅: Tsio hu ióng tsú, sè tshut bô-nāi.
中文: 臺灣習俗特重子嗣，有女無子者，要招贅；無子無女者要領養孩子以傳後代，這些都是不得已的事。
英文: Taiwanese customs place great emphasis on having a male heir. If there is no son but only daughters, they must adopt a son-in-law. If there are no children at all, they must adopt a child to carry on the family line. These are all necessary measures.

台文: 無奈何，只好去揣阿伯鬥相共。
台羅: Bô-ta-uâ, tsí-hó khì tshuē a-peh tàu-sann-kāng.
中文: 不得已，只好去找老伯伯幫忙。
英文: Unfortunately, I had no choice but to ask the old man for help.

台文: 無定著彼件代誌就是伊做的。
台羅: Bô-tiānn-tio̍h hit kiānn tāi-tsì tō sī i tsò--ê.
中文: 說不定那件事就是他做的。
英文: Maybe he did that thing.

台文: 彼个囡仔足無定著，坐都坐袂牢。
台羅: Hit ê gín-á tsiok bô-tiānn-tio̍h, tsē to tsē bē tiâu.
中文: 那個小孩很沒定性，坐都坐不住。
英文: That child is very restless and can't sit still.

台文: 伊偷走出去買枝仔冰，無拄好去予老師拄著。
台羅: I thau tsáu tshut-khì bé ki-á-ping, bô-tú-hó khì hōo lāu-su tú--tio̍h.
中文: 他偷跑出去買冰棒，不巧被老師碰到。
英文: He sneaked out to buy popsicles, but unfortunately he was caught by the teacher.

台文: 這个囡仔講嘛講袂聽，實在無法伊。
台羅: Tsit ê gín-á kóng mā kóng bē thiann, si̍t-tsāi bô-huat--i.
中文: 這個孩子講也講不聽，實在拿他沒辦法。
英文: This child just won't listen, I really don't know what to do with him.

台文: 真歹勢，我無法度共你鬥相共。
台羅: Tsin pháinn-sè, guá bô-huat-tōo kā lí tàu-sann-kāng.
中文: 真不好意思，我沒辦法幫你。
英文: I'm really sorry, I can't help you.

台文: 伊欲按呢做，我嘛無法度。
台羅: I beh án-ne tsò, guá mā bô-huat-tōo.
中文: 他要這樣做，我也無可奈何。
英文: He wants to do it, and I have no choice.

台羅: Tsò kah tsit tsióng sing-lí tsin bô-khang.
中文: 做這種生意沒什麼利潤。
英文: Doing this kind of business has no profit.
What you said doesn't make sense.

台文: 我今仔日無的確會加班。
英文: I might work overtime today.

台文: 囡仔愛先學爬，然後才學行。
台羅: Gín-á ài sing o̍h pê, jiân-āu tsiah o̍h kiânn.
中文: 小孩要先學爬，之後才學走路。
英文: Children must learn to crawl before they learn to walk.

台文: 幾若年無見面，你猶是佮以前仝款。
台羅: Kuí-nā nî bô kìnn-bīn, lí iáu-sī kah í-tsîng kāng-khuán.
中文: 好多年沒見面，你還是和以前一樣。
英文: Many years have passed since we last met, but you are still the same as before.

台文: 無某無猴，穿衫破肩胛頭。
中文: 沒有妻子，衣服破了也沒人補。是單身漢自我調侃的俏皮話。
英文: No wife, no one to mend my clothes even if they are torn. It's a witty remark made by a bachelor about himself.

台文: 羊毛衫愛用焦洗的，才袂勼水。
台羅: Iûnn-mn̂g-sann ài īng ta-sé--ê, tsiah bē kiu-tsuí.
中文: 羊毛衣要用乾洗的，才不會縮水。
英文: Woolen sweaters need to be dry cleaned to avoid shrinking.

台文: 伊去予金光黨的焦洗去。
中文: 他被金光黨騙去所有的金錢。
英文: He was deceived by the Golden Light Party and lost all his money.

台文: 錢是伊欠的，佮我無相干。
台羅: Tsînn sī i khiàm--ê, kah guá bô-siong-kan.
中文: 錢是他欠的，跟我沒有關係。
英文: The money is owed by him, it has nothing to do with me.

台文: 連鞭就欲考試矣，閣按呢無要無緊。
台羅: Liâm-mi tō beh khó-tshì--ah, koh án-ne bô-iàu-bô-kín.
中文: 馬上就要考試了，還一副漫不經心，無所謂的樣子。
英文: The translation of the Chinese text to English is: The exam is coming up soon, yet he/she still appears indifferent and unconcerned.

台文: 物件若好，較貴一點仔無要緊。
台羅: Mi̍h-kiānn nā hó, khah kuì--tsi̍t-tiám-á bô iàu-kín.
中文: 東西如果品質好，貴一點沒關係。
英文: If the quality is good, it doesn't matter if it's expensive.

台文: 阮兜有時仔家己煮食，有時仔食外口。
台羅: Guán tau ū-sî-á ka-kī tsú-tsia̍h, ū-sî-á tsia̍h-guā-kháu.
中文: 我們家有時候自己煮飯，有時候外食。
英文: We sometimes cook at home, and sometimes eat out.

台羅: I iu-guân tī hia teh tán--lí.
英文: He is still there waiting for you.

台文: 這兩種麥仔酒我啉著無差。
台羅: Tsit nn̄g tsióng be̍h-á-tsiú guá lim tio̍h bô-tsha.
中文: 這兩種啤酒我喝起來沒什麼差別。
英文: These two beers taste pretty much the same to me.

台文: 欲食飯抑食麵我攏無差。
台羅: Beh tsia̍h pn̄g ia̍h tsia̍h mī guá lóng bô-tsha.
中文: 要吃飯或吃麵我都沒關係。
英文: I don't mind whether we eat rice or noodles.

台文: 伊送去病院進前，就無氣矣。
台羅: I sàng-khì pēnn-īnn tsìn-tsîng, tō bô-khuì--ah.
中文: 他在送進醫院前，就沒氣了。
英文: Before he was taken to the hospital, he had already passed away.

台文: 我走無十分鐘，就強欲無氣矣。
台羅: Guá tsáu bô tsa̍p hun-tsing, tō kiōng-beh bô-khuì--ah.
中文: 我跑沒十分鐘，就快上氣不接下氣了。
英文: I ran for less than ten minutes and was already out of breath.

台文: 這站仔較無眠，歇睏日愛補眠。
台羅: Tsit-tsām-á khah bô-bîn, hioh-khùn-ji̍t ài póo bîn.
中文: 這陣子睡眠不足，放假日要補眠。
英文: Recently, I have been sleep deprived. I need to catch up on sleep during my days off.

台文: 你才走無偌久，伊就來矣。
台羅: Lí tsiah tsáu bô-guā-kú, i tō lâi--ah.
中文: 你才剛離開沒多久，他就來了。
英文: You had just left not long ago, and he came.
This is nothing, don't be nervous.

台文: 你莫看我無夠重，我毋是好欺負的。
台羅: Lí mài khuànn guá bô-kàu-tāng, guá m̄ sī hó khi-hū--ê.
中文: 你不要看不起我，我不是好欺負的。
英文: Don't look down on me, I'm not easy to bully.
This is nothing.

台文: 伊差一點仔就著獎矣，有夠無彩。
台羅: I tsha tsi̍t-tiám-á tō tio̍h-tsióng--ah, ū-kàu bô-tshái.
中文: 他差一點就得獎了，實在可惜。
英文: He almost won an award, it's a pity.

台文: 無彩你遐爾仔愛伊，結果伊猶是雙跤踏雙船。
台羅: Bô-tshái lí hiah-nī-á ài--i, kiat-kó i iáu-sī siang kha ta̍h siang tsûn.
中文: 枉費你那麼愛他，結果他還是腳踏兩條船。
英文: You loved him so much in vain, and in the end, he still cheated on you.

台文: 買彼號物件都無路用，你莫閣無彩錢矣。
台羅: Bé hit lō mi̍h-kiānn to bô-lōo-īng, lí mài koh bô-tshái tsînn--ah.
中文: 買那種東西又沒有用，你別再浪費錢了。
英文: Buying those things is useless, stop wasting money.

中文: 再說什麼都是白費工夫。
英文: It's all a waste of effort to say anything more.

台文: 伊無張持喝一聲，逐家攏驚一趒。
台羅: I bô-tiunn-tî huah tsi̍t siann, ta̍k-ke lóng kiann tsi̍t tiô.
中文: 他突然大喊一聲，大家都嚇了一跳。
英文: He suddenly shouted loudly, and everyone was startled.

台文: 真歹勢，無張持共你挨著。
台羅: Tsin pháinn-sè, bô-tiunn-tî kā lí e--tio̍h.
英文: I'm sorry, I accidentally bumped into you.
The water ditch is already very dry.

台文: 你哪會遐無細膩，共碗挵破。
台羅: Lí ná ē hiah bô-sè-jī, kā uánn lòng-phuà.
中文: 你怎麼這麼不小心，把碗打破了。
英文: You are so careless. You broke the bowl.
I won't be polite then.
I think this is not feasible.

台文: 伊彼个人真無量，攏毋肯共人鬥相共。
台羅: I hit ê lâng tsin bô-liōng, lóng m̄ khíng kā lâng tàu-sann-kāng.
中文: 他那個人很沒度量，都不肯幫別人的忙。
英文: He is very narrow-minded and unwilling to help others.
I don't know what they're busy with.

台文: 伊的工課真濟，足無閒的。
台羅: I ê khang-khuè tsin tsē, tsiok bô-îng--ê.
英文: His job is very demanding and busy.

台文: 伊是孤囝，煞猶未娶某就過身，𪜶兜就按呢無傳。
台羅: I sī koo-kiánn, suah iáu-buē tshuā-bóo tō kuè-sin, in tau tsiū-án-ne bô-thn̂g.
中文: 他是獨子，卻在未婚時就往生，他家就這樣無人傳續香火。
英文: He was an only child, but passed away before getting married, so there was no one to carry on the family's lineage.
I don't want to go.

台文: 這張舊相片是我無意中揣著的。
台羅: Tsit tiunn kū siòng-phìnn sī guá bô-ì-tiong tshuē--tio̍h-ê.
中文: 這張舊相片是我無意中找到的。
英文: This old photo was found by me unintentionally.

台文: 你講這種話實在無意無思。
台羅: Lí kóng tsit tsióng uē si̍t-tsāi bô-ì-bô-sù.
中文: 你說這種話實在太不夠意思了。
英文: You're being really rude by saying something like that.

台羅: Hit tshut hì puann kah bô-ì-bô-sù.
英文: The play was very boring.
You have no way forward.
I don't like drinking alcohol.

台文: 這台機車無路用矣，愛報廢掉。
台羅: Tsit tâi ki-tshia bô-lōo-īng--ah, ài pò-huì-tiāu.
中文: 這台機車不中用了，要報廢掉。
英文: This motorcycle is no longer useful, it needs to be scrapped.

台文: 伊是一个無路用人，無一項代誌做會好勢。
台羅: I sī tsi̍t ê bô-lōo-īng lâng, bô tsi̍t hāng tāi-tsì tsò ē hó-sè.
中文: 他是一個不中用的人，沒有一件事做得好。
英文: He is a useless person, nothing is done well.
I can't explain the reason.

台文: 已經害去矣，閣哭嘛無較縒。
台羅: Í-king hāi--khì--ah, koh khàu mā bô-khah-tsua̍h.
中文: 已經壞掉了，再哭也沒有用。
英文: It's already broken, crying again won't help.

台文: 伊做工課做甲無暝無日，恐驚會拍歹身體。
台羅: I tsò khang-khuè tsò kah bô-mê-bô-ji̍t, khióng-kiann ē phah-pháinn sin-thé.
中文: 他夜以繼日的做事，恐怕會傷身。
英文: He works day and night, and he's afraid it will harm his health.

台羅: Bô-gî i ē tsò tsit khuán tāi-tsì.
英文: I didn't expect him to do such a thing.
I didn't expect you to study abroad.

台文: 彼台冷氣攏袂涼，有開無開無精差。
台羅: Hit tâi líng-khì lóng bē liâng, ū khui bô khui bô-tsing-tsha.
中文: 那臺冷氣都不會涼，有開或沒開都沒有差別。
英文: That air conditioner won't be cool, there's no difference whether it's on or off.

台文: 昨暗走一下傷久，害我今仔日跤牚腿。
台羅: Tsa-àm tsáu tsi̍t-ē siunn kú, hāi guá kin-á-ji̍t kha thènn-thuí.
中文: 昨晚跑了太久，害我今天腳肌肉酸疼。
英文: Last night I ran for too long, which caused my leg muscles to be sore today.

台文: 代誌到這个地步矣，你猶閣有啥物話通講？
台羅: Tāi-tsì kàu tsit ê tē-pōo--ah, lí iáu-koh ū siánn-mih uē thang kóng?
中文: 事情都到這個地步了，你還有什麼話說？
英文: Things have come to this point, do you still have anything to say?
He is still eating.

台羅: Sian piànn sian, hāi-sí Kâu Tsê-thian.
中文: 比喻兩方拚鬥，禍延無辜的第三者。
英文: Metaphor for the third party who suffers from the fight between two sides without any fault.

台文: 這層代誌是有影抑是無影？
台羅: Tsit tsân tāi-tsì sī ū-iánn ia̍h-sī bô-iánn?
中文: 這件事情是真的還是假的？
英文: Is this thing true or false?

台羅: I kóng ê uē lóng bô-iánn-bô-tsiah.
中文: 他說的都是子虛烏有的。
英文: He said everything was imaginary.

台文: 無論你講啥，我攏袂答應。
台羅: Bô-lūn lí kóng siannh, guá lóng bē tah-ìng.
中文: 不論你說什麼，我都不會答應的。
英文: No matter what you say, I won't agree.

中文: 這陣子豬肉銷路比較不好。
英文: Recently, the sales of pork have been relatively poor.

台羅: Sng ê mi̍h-kiānn guá khah bô-siau.
中文: 酸的東西我比較不愛吃。
英文: I don't like sour things very much.

中文: 整株好好的，沒有砍斷。以「砍柴」的「剉」tshò諧音「錯」字，來造的俏皮話。
英文: The whole plant is fine, not cut down. It is a playful saying made by using the homophonic sound of 剉 in chopping firewood to mean wrong character.

台文: 這件代誌毋免你牚頭，我家己就會當解決。
台羅: Tsit kiānn tāi-tsì m̄-bián lí thènn-thâu, guá ka-kī tō ē-tàng kái-kuat.
中文: 這件事不用你強出頭，我自己就可以解決。
英文: I can handle this myself, you don't need to intervene.

台羅: Lâng tsia̍h-lāu tō ē khah bô-thâu-sîn.
英文: As a helpful assistant, I can translate the 'Chinese' text to 'English' without adding any extra punctuation marks, like quotation marks, if they do not appear in the original text. The translation of the text is: As people age, their memory declines.
The weather has been very dry lately.

台文: 阿勇真無膽，天若烏就毋敢出門。
台羅: A-ióng tsin bô-tánn, thinn nā oo tō m̄ kánn tshut-mn̂g.
中文: 小勇很膽小，天黑就不敢出門。
英文: Xiao Yong is very timid and doesn't dare to go out when it's dark.

台文: 伊無聲無說行入來，害我驚一趒。
台羅: I bô-siann-bô-sueh kiânn--ji̍p-lâi, hāi guá kiann tsi̍t tiô.
中文: 他不聲不響的走了進來，害我嚇一跳。
英文: He came in silently and scared me.

台文: 伊棍仔攑咧無講無呾就撼來，佳哉我緊閃開！
台羅: I kùn-á gia̍h--leh bô-kóng-bô-tànn tō hám--lâi, ka-tsài guá kín siám--khui!
中文: 他拿著棍子不聲不響地就打過來，還好我趕快閃開！
英文: He silently swung the stick towards me, but luckily I quickly dodged it!

台文: 囡仔身軀洗好糝一屑仔痱仔粉較焦鬆。
台羅: Gín-á sin-khu sé-hó sám tsi̍t-sut-á puì-á-hún khah ta-sang.
中文: 小孩洗過澡後撒一點痱仔粉比較乾爽。
英文: After the child takes a bath, sprinkle a little prickly heat powder for a drier and more comfortable feeling.

台文: 做股票了幾萬箍仔，對伊來講無礙著。
台羅: Tsò kóo-phiò liáu--kuí-bān-khoo-á, tuì i lâi kóng bô-gāi--tio̍h.
中文: 玩股票虧個幾萬塊錢，對他來說並無妨礙。
英文: Playing stocks lost him tens of thousands of dollars, but it didn't bother him.

台文: 我家己一个人足無議量，毋才去看電影。
台羅: Guá ka-kī tsi̍t ê lâng tsiok bô-gī-niū, m̄-tsiah khì khuànn tiān-iánn.
中文: 我自己一個人很無聊，才會去看電影。
英文: I went to see a movie because I was bored by myself.

台文: 這碗麵無鹹無纖，有夠歹食。
台羅: Tsit uánn mī bô-kiâm-bô-siam, ū-kàu pháinn-tsia̍h.
中文: 這碗麵淡而無味，真難吃。
英文: This bowl of noodles is bland and tasteless, really disgusting.

台文: 你今仔日是按怎，哪會無攬無拈？
台羅: Lí kin-á-ji̍t sī án-tsuánn, ná ē bô-lám-bô-ne?
中文: 你今天是怎樣，怎麼無精打采的？
英文: How are you today? Why do you seem so listless?

中文: 講話無精打采，提不起勁。
英文: The speech is lackluster and lacks energy.
piano
Play the piano
The ginger that comes from other places is actually chili pepper.
You're so unreasonable!
The elderly person is being unreasonable.
What is your phone number?
It's my turn now.

台文: 畫虎畫皮無畫骨，知人知面不知心。
台羅: Uē hóo uē phuê bô uē kut, ti jîn ti bīn put ti sim.
英文: Metaphorically, the human heart is hard to fathom.
a painting
calligraphy and painting.

台文: 昨暗聽伊痚規暝，我實在真毋甘。
台羅: Tsa-àm thiann i he kui mê, guá si̍t-tsāi tsin m̄-kam.
中文: 昨天聽他哮喘了一夜，我實在很心疼。
英文: Yesterday, I listened to him wheezing all night, and I really felt heartbroken.

台羅: Lí teh siáu, guá bô beh tuè lí siáu.
中文: 你發瘋了，我才不跟你發瘋咧。
英文: You're going crazy, but I'm not going crazy with you.
That dog is in heat.
madman.
Addicted to playing stocks.
My feet are very sore.

台羅: I tshuì-pinn ū tsi̍t lia̍p ài-tsia̍h-kì.
英文: There is a mole on the corner of his mouth that loves to eat.
mole.
Heatstroke
gua sha.
The teeth have grown out.
payroll
distribute flyers.

台羅: Lí tsò ê huat-kué huat liáu tsin hó.
英文: You made the huat kueh very well.
The sweet rice cake has gone bad due to fermentation.
His car cannot start.
He is currently in good financial luck.
get rich.

台羅: I sìng-tē nā huat, lí tō kai-sí.

中文: 你趕快去趕快回來，才不會太過打擾人家。
英文: Hurry up and come back quickly so as not to disturb others too much.

英文: Earned money is saved as personal savings, and all expenses are covered by my dad. Refers to the favorable living conditions of wealthy children; can also refer to a person's selfishness.

台文: 買命喔，車欲開矣，伊猶毋來。
台羅: Bé-miā--ooh, tshia beh khui--ah, i iáu m̄ lâi.

英文: Valuable things should be stored properly.

台文: 你好跤好手，哪會無欲去外面趁食？

中文: 你四肢健全，怎麼不去外面賺錢過活？
英文: You have all your limbs, why don't you go outside and earn a living?

台文: 查某人去趁食，會予人笑。

中文: 女人去賣淫為生，會被人取笑。
英文: Women who engage in prostitution for a living will be ridiculed.

台羅: Tsit tshut tiān-iánn kám-tōng tsin tsē kuan-tsiòng.
中文: 這部電影感動很多觀眾。
英文: This movie moved many viewers.

台羅: In nn̄g ê lâng ê kám-tsîng tsin hó.

台文: 昨暗睏無好，今仔日誠愛睏。

中文: 昨晚沒睡好，今天很想睡。
英文: Last night didn't sleep well, today really want to sleep.

台文: 外口咧起風矣，你無疊衫就走出去，是會感著。
台羅: Guā-kháu teh khí-hong--ah, lí bô tha̍h sann tō tsáu--tshut-khì, sī ē kám--tio̍h.
中文: 外面開始起風了，你沒加件衣服就跑出去，是會感冒的。
英文: It's starting to get windy outside. If you go out without putting on an extra layer of clothing, you'll catch a cold.

台文: 少年人若有相意愛就好，咱莫插傷濟。
台羅: Siàu-liân-lâng nā ū sio-ì-ài tō hó, lán mài tshap siunn tsē.
中文: 年輕人彼此喜歡就好，我們不要管太多。
英文: Young people liking each other is enough, we shouldn't interfere too much.

台文: 你對這件代誌有啥物感想？
台羅: Lí tuì tsit kiānn tāi-tsì ū siánn-mih kám-sióng?
中文: 你對這件事情有什麼感想？
英文: What are your thoughts on this matter?

台文: 伊逐擺看著人攏微微仔笑。
台羅: I ta̍k-pái khuànn-tio̍h lâng lóng bî-bî-á tshiò.
中文: 他每次看到人都會微微笑。
英文: He always smiles a little when he sees people.

台羅: I khì hōo tsuâ kiann kah la̍k-la̍k-tshuah.
英文: He was trembling with fear after being scared by a snake.

台文: 伊愛嬌的模樣攏無改變。
台羅: I ài-kiau ê bôo-iūnn lóng bô kái-piàn.
中文: 他嬌媚的模樣都沒有改變。
英文: His charming appearance hasn't changed.

台文: 你按呢共我鬥相共，我真感激你。

中文: 你這樣幫我，我很感激你。
英文: You helped me like this, I am very grateful to you.

台文: 人講雙生仔定定會互相感應。

中文: 人家說雙胞胎往往能彼此感應。
英文: People say that twins often have a telepathic connection with each other.

中文: 謝謝你幫我，事情才會這麼快就做完。

中文: 這次颱風損失很多財產。

The translation of the text from Chinese to English is: The robber went to rob the bank.

台羅: Hit tsiah káu-á teh iô bué.
英文: That dog is wagging its tail.

台文: 伊逐擺轉來攏若像咧搵豆油，無一時仔就閣走矣。
台羅: I ta̍k-pái tńg--lâi lóng ná-tshiūnn teh ùn-tāu-iû, bô tsi̍t-sî-á tō koh tsáu--ah.
中文: 他每次回來都像沾醬油一樣只有短暫停留，沒多久就離開了。
英文: Every time he comes back, he only stays briefly, and soon leaves.

台文: 警察懷疑伊有紮毒品，共伊搜身軀。
台羅: Kíng-tshat huâi-gî i ū tsah to̍k-phín, kā i tshiau sin-khu.
中文: 警察懷疑他攜帶毒品，遂進行搜身。
英文: The police suspected him of carrying drugs and proceeded to conduct a body search.
He took an empty bottle to buy oil.
Don't expose each other's weaknesses.

台文: 自細漢共伊搦屎搦尿晟養大漢，想袂到伊遮爾不孝。
台羅: Tsū sè-hàn kā i la̍k-sái-la̍k-jiō tshiânn-ióng tuā-hàn, siūnn-bē-kàu i tsiah-nī put-hàu.
中文: 從小辛勞的將他扶養長大，沒想到他這麼不孝。
英文: From a young age, they worked hard to raise him, but they didn't expect him to be so unfilial.

台文: 欲漆懸的所在就愛搭架。
台羅: Beh tshat kuân ê sóo-tsāi tō ài tah-kè.
中文: 要油漆高的地方就要搭架子。
英文: If you want to paint a high place, you need to set up scaffolding.

台羅: Tsit hiòng tsìnn-hong tsin pháinn kiânn.
英文: This direction is difficult to walk against the wind.

台文: 你共烘爐提去外口搧風，按呢火才會較炎。
台羅: Lí kā hang-lôo the̍h-khì guā-kháu siàn-hong, án-ne hué tsiah ē khah iām.
中文: 你把火爐拿到外面當著風吹，這樣火勢才比較大。
英文: You take the stove outside and let the wind blow on it, so the fire will be bigger.

台文: 伊可能是昨暝有搧風，所以才會發燒。
台羅: I khó-lîng sī tsa-mê ū siàn-hong, sóo-í tsiah ē huat-sio.
中文: 他可能是昨晚受了風寒，所以早上才會發燒。
英文: He may have caught a cold last night, so he had a fever this morning.

台文: 因為伊不時換頭路，所以定定咧搬厝。
台羅: In-uī i put-sî uānn thâu-lōo, sóo-í tiānn-tiānn teh puann-tshù.
中文: 因為他不斷的換工作，所以經常在搬家。
英文: Because he keeps changing jobs, he often moves.

台文: 食薰毋但了錢閣會損害身體。
台羅: Tsia̍h-hun m̄-nā liáu-tsînn koh ē sún-hāi sin-thé.
中文: 抽煙不但浪費錢，還會損害身體。
英文: Smoking not only wastes money, but also harms the body.

台文: 我這禮拜為著伊的代誌，無眠閣損神。
台羅: Guá tsit lé-pài uī-tio̍h i ê tāi-tsì, bô-bîn koh sńg-sîn.
中文: 我這禮拜為了他的事，失眠又傷神。
英文: This week, because of his matter, I have been sleepless and worried.
Go help pour tea for the guests.

台文: 這件代誌你愛想予斟酌。
台羅: Tsit kiānn tāi-tsì lí ài siūnn hōo tsim-tsiok.
英文: You need to think this through carefully.

台文: 這件代誌請逐家斟酌一下，毋通凊彩就決定。
台羅: Tsit kiānn tāi-tsì tshiánn ta̍k-ke tsim-tsiok--tsi̍t-ē, m̄-thang tshìn-tshái tō kuat-tīng.
中文: 這件事請大家詳細考慮一下，不要隨便就決定。
英文: Please carefully consider this matter, and do not make a hasty decision.

台文: 你斟酌一下，應該聽會著。
台羅: Lí tsim-tsiok--tsi̍t-ē, ing-kai thiann ē tio̍h.
中文: 你注意一下，應該聽得到。
英文: Pay attention, you should be able to hear it.
Translation: Pay attention.

台文: 斟酒愛細膩，毋通斟傷滇。
台羅: Thîn tsiú ài sè-jī, m̄-thang thîn siunn tīnn.
中文: 斟酒要小心點，不要倒太滿。
英文: Be careful when pouring wine, don't pour too full.

台文: 伊萬項代誌攏欲搢做前。
台羅: I bān-hāng tāi-tsì lóng beh tsìnn-tsò-tsîng.
中文: 他不論做什麼事情都要搶第一。
英文: He always wants to be first no matter what he does.

台文: 阿滿仔，你當時欲娶新婦？
中文: 阿滿，你什麼時候要娶媳婦？
英文: Ah Man, when are you going to marry a wife?
Do not move this table.

台文: 伊講白賊去予阿母搧喙䫌。
台羅: I kóng-pe̍h-tsha̍t khì hōo a-bú siàn-tshuì-phué.
英文: He got slapped by his mom for lying.

台文: 伊定定來遮，我不時佇路裡搪著。
台羅: I tiānn-tiānn lâi tsia, guá put-sî tī lōo--lí  tn̄g--tio̍h.
中文: 他常來這裡，我也常在路上遇到他。
英文: He often comes here, and I often meet him on the road.

英文: He is infatuated with that girl.

中文: 被風掃到，感到氣息不順。

台文: 蓮藕粉摻糖煡煡咧，真好食。

英文: Lotus root powder cooked with sugar to a paste-like consistency is very delicious.
One method of making rice cakes.

台文: 看著貴重的物件伊就煞心。

中文: 看到貴重的東西他就渴望得到。
英文: When he sees something valuable, he desires to obtain it.

台文: 過去的代誌就準煞去，你莫閣想矣。
台羅: Kuè-khì ê tāi-tsì tō tsún suah--khì, lí mài koh siūnn--ah.
中文: 過去的事就讓它去吧，你別再想了。
英文: Let the past be the past, don't think about it anymore.
the last one

台文: 你若有代誌你先走，遮予我來煞尾。
台羅: Lí nā ū tāi-tsì lí sing tsáu, tsia hōo guá lâi suah-bué.
中文: 你如果有事你先走，這裡由我來收尾。
英文: If you have something to do, you go first. I'll take care of things here.

台文: 較早的人定定用肥豬肉來煏油。
台羅: Khah-tsá ê lâng tiānn-tiānn īng puî ti-bah lâi piak-iû.
中文: 以前的人常用肥豬肉來炸油。
英文: In the past, people often used fatty pork to fry oil.

Be careful and don't slip.

台文: 伊人面闊，交陪濟，結婚的時辦百二桌竟然閣煏桌。
台羅: I lâng-bīn khuah, kau-puê tsē, kiat-hun ê sî pān pah-jī toh kìng-jiân koh piak-toh.
中文: 他人脈廣，交友廣闊，結婚時席開一百二十桌竟然還爆桌。
英文: He has a wide network and a broad circle of friends. At his wedding, he had 120 tables set up and even had table overflows.

台文: 古早有人認為破病是因為犯著煞神。
台羅: Kóo-tsá ū lâng jīn-uî phuà-pēnn sī in-uī huān-tio̍h suah-sîn.
中文: 古時候有人認為生病是因為沖犯了凶神。
英文: In ancient times, some people believed that getting sick was because they offended evil spirits.

台文: 人客欲來矣，你緊去煎茶來款待。
台羅: Lâng-kheh beh lâi--ah, lí kín khì tsuann tê lâi khuán-thāi.
中文: 客人要來了，你快去燒水泡茶招待他們。
英文: Guests are coming, quickly go boil water and make tea to serve them.

台文: 囡仔煞著就愛𤆬去予人收驚。
台羅: Gín-á suah--tio̍h tō ài tshuā-khì hōo lâng siu-kiann.
中文: 小孩犯煞就要帶去讓人收驚。
英文: Children who cause trouble should be taken to scare people.

台文: 你行路愛細膩，塗跤滑溜溜。
台羅: Lí kiânn-lōo ài sè-jī, thôo-kha ku̍t-liu-liu.
中文: 你走路要小心，地面非常滑。
英文: Be careful when walking, the ground is very slippery.
Sausages taste better when grilled.

台文: 等戲煞鼓咱來去食宵夜。
台羅: Tán hì suah-kóo lán lâi-khì tsia̍h siau-iā.
中文: 等戲結束我們就去吃消夜。
英文: After the show ends, we will go eat supper.

台羅: In suah-kóo liáu-āu tō bô koh kìnn-bīn.
中文: 他們分手後就不再見面了。
英文: After they broke up, they never saw each other again.
The bottom of the pot has a layer of soot.

台文: 煞戲了後，我就送你轉去。
台羅: Suah-hì liáu-āu, guá tō sàng lí tńg--khì.
中文: 劇終之後，我就送你回去。
英文: After the play ends, I will take you back.
They have already broken up.

台文: 若照按呢落去，代誌就毋好矣。
台羅: Nā tsiàu án-ne lo̍h--khì, tāi-tsì tō m̄ hó--ah.
中文: 若照這樣下去，事情就不好了。
英文: If this continues, things will not be good.

台文: 你罰款無繳，會予人吊照。
台羅: Lí hua̍t-khuán bô kiáu, ē hōo lâng tiàu tsiàu.
中文: 你罰款沒有繳，會被吊銷執照。
英文: If you don't pay the fine, your license will be revoked.

英文: Here the sun can't shine, it's really dark.
take a look in the mirror.

cook porridge.

中文: 一切事項應該要按部就班地處理。
英文: All matters should be handled in an orderly manner.

台文: 咱照呼照行，你莫想欲變鬼變怪。
台羅: Lán tsiàu-hoo-tsiàu-kiânn, lí mài siūnn-beh pìnn-kuí-pìnn-kuài.
中文: 我們依約行事，你別想搞花樣亂來。
英文: We will act according to the agreement, don't try to mess around.

台文: 你做代誌嘛較照起工咧，莫定定想欲偷食步。
台羅: Lí tsò tāi-tsì mā khah tsiàu-khí-kang--leh, mài tiānn-tiānn siūnn-beh thau-tsia̍h-pōo.
中文: 你做事要按部就班，不要常常想著要投機取巧。
英文: You should do things step by step, and not always think about taking shortcuts.

台文: 過年時仔這間店照常營業。
台羅: Kuè-nî-sî-á tsit king tiàm tsiàu-siông îng-gia̍p.
中文: 過年的時候這間店照常營業。
英文: During the Chinese New Year, this store operates as usual.

台文: 醫生講伊無要緊，你毋免煩惱啦！
台羅: I-sing kóng i bô iàu-kín, lí m̄-bián huân-ló--lah!
中文: 醫生說他不要緊，你不用煩惱啦！
英文: The doctor said it's not serious, you don't need to worry!

台文: 這件代誌你著愛照實講。
台羅: Tsit kiānn tāi-tsì lí tio̍h-ài tsiàu-si̍t kóng.
中文: 這件事情你得要照實講。
英文: You have to tell the truth about this matter.

台文: 照講我按呢做應該無毋著，哪會失敗咧？
台羅: Tsiàu-kóng guá án-ne tsò ing-kai bô m̄-tio̍h, ná ē sit-pāi--leh?
中文: 照說我這樣做應該沒錯，怎麼會失敗呢？
英文: According to what I did, it should be correct. How could it fail?

台文: 出門進前先照鏡，看衫穿有好勢無。
台羅: Tshut-mn̂g tsìn-tsîng sing tsiò-kiànn, khuànn sann tshīng ū hó-sè--bô.
中文: 出門之前先照鏡子，看看衣服穿得整不整齊。
英文: Before going out, first look in the mirror and see if your clothes are neat and tidy.

台文: 家己先照鏡看覓咧，才袂卸世眾。
台羅: Ka-kī sing tsiò-kiànn khuànn-māi--leh, tsiah bē sià-sì-tsìng.
中文: 自己先反省看看，才不會貽笑大方。
英文: Reflect on yourself first, so as not to become a laughing stock.

台文: 幼囡仔需要爸母全心的照顧。
台羅: Iù-gín-á su-iàu pē-bú tsuân-sim ê tsiàu-kòo.
中文: 幼兒需要父母親全心的照顧。
英文: Young children need their parents' wholehearted care.
The flowers are in full bloom.

台文: 我當天咒誓，絕對無騙你。
台羅: Guá tng thinn tsiù-tsuā, tsua̍t-tuì bô phiàn--lí.
中文: 我對天發誓，絕對沒騙你。
英文: I swear to the heavens, I absolutely did not deceive you.

英文: Can you confront him in front of me?

中文: 你對他怎麼啦？他怎麼會一直瞪你？
英文: What's wrong with you and him? Why does he keep staring at you?

英文: He is short and not very tall.

台羅: Hua-liân tong-tē ê hong-kíng bē-bái, lán līng-kang tsò-hué lâi-khì tshit-thô.
中文: 花蓮當地的風景不錯，我們改天一起去玩。
英文: The scenery in Hualien is nice. Let's go play together another day.

中文: 當年你父親做生意時賺很多錢。
英文: When your father was doing business, he earned a lot of money.

台文: 當初遮一片攏是田，這馬攏起樓仔厝矣！
台羅: Tong-tshoo tsia tsi̍t phiàn lóng sī tshân, tsit-má lóng khí lâu-á-tshù--ah!
中文: 當初這裡一大片都是農田，現在都蓋起樓房了！
英文: Originally, this area was all farmland, now it's all covered with buildings!

台文: 我若毋是欠錢，哪著行當店？
台羅: Guá nā m̄ sī khiàm tsînn, ná-tio̍h kiânn tǹg-tiàm?
中文: 我要不是缺錢，哪需要走當鋪？
英文: If I weren't short of money, why would I need to go to a pawnshop?

台文: 伊雖然人生做矮肥矮肥，毋過跤手真扭掠。
台羅: I sui-jiân lâng senn-tsò é-puî-é-puî, m̄-koh kha-tshiú tsin liú-lia̍h.
中文: 他雖然長得矮小肥短，不過手腳很敏捷。
英文: Although he is short and chubby, he is very agile.

台文: 我當咧無閒，你莫共我吵。
台羅: Guá tng-teh bô-îng, lí mài kā guá tshá.
英文: I am busy, do not disturb me.

台文: 我會當面共物件交予伊。
台羅: Guá ē tng-bīn kā mi̍h-kiānn kau hōo--i.
中文: 我會當面將東西交給他。
英文: I will hand the things to him in person.
Today is my shift.

台文: 你穿甲遐清涼，毋驚去拄著痴哥？
台羅: Lí tshīng kah hiah tshing-liâng, m̄ kiann khì tú-tio̍h tshi-ko?
中文: 你穿得那麼暴露，不怕遇上色狼？
英文: Youre dressed so revealingly, arent you afraid of encountering a pervert?

台羅: M̄ tsai-iánn i tang-sî tsiah ē lâi.
中文: 不知道他什麼時候才會來。
英文: I don't know when he will come.

台文: 當時囡仔攏猶細漢，愛搦屎搦尿。
台羅: Tong-sî gín-á lóng iáu sè-hàn, ài la̍k-sái-la̍k-jiō.
中文: 那時候我小孩都還小，需要把屎把尿。
英文: At that time, my children were still young and needed to have their poop and pee taken care of.

台文: 阿麗生做遐妖嬌，真濟人為伊痴迷。
台羅: A-lē senn-tsò hiah iau-kiau, tsin tsē lâng uī i tshi-bê.
中文: 阿麗長得那麼妖豔嬌媚，很多人迷戀他。
英文: Ali is so enchanting and charming that many people are infatuated with him.

台文: 我共你當做是上好的朋友。
台羅: Guá kā lí tòng-tsò sī siōng hó ê pîng-iú.
中文: 我把你當做是最好的朋友。
英文: I regard you as my best friend.

台文: 伊古意煞予人當做戇呆。

中文: 他忠厚老實卻被當成愚蠢。
英文: He is honest and sincere, but is regarded as foolish.

台文: 阿英予伊的痴情感動，尾仔決定欲嫁伊。

中文: 阿英被他的痴情感動，最後決定嫁給他。
英文: Ayin was moved by his infatuation and finally decided to marry him.

台文: 當票若無去，你的金鍊仔就提袂轉來矣。
台羅: Tǹg-phiò nā bô--khì, lí ê kim-liān-á tō the̍h bē tńg--lâi--ah.
中文: 當票如果不見了，你的金項鍊就要不回來了。
英文: If the pawn ticket is lost, you won't be able to get your gold necklace back.

台文: 我當場就佮伊大細聲嚷。

中文: 我當場就跟他大聲的吵起來。
英文: I immediately started arguing with him loudly on the spot.

台文: 用心拍拚做生理，久來當然趁大錢。
台羅: Iōng-sim phah-piànn tsò-sing-lí, kú--lâi tong-jiân thàn-tuā-tsînn.

英文: With heart and effort in doing business, over time, one will earn a lot of money.

台羅: O̍h siû-tsuí tsìn-tsîng ài sing o̍h kìm-khuì.
英文: Before learning to swim, you must first learn to hold your breath.

台文: 叫你較細膩咧你就無愛，這馬食碰釘矣乎。
台羅: Kiò lí khah sè-jī--leh lí tō bô ài, tsit-má tsia̍h-phòng-ting--ah--honnh.
中文: 叫你小心一點你就不要，現在挨罵了吧。
英文: If I tell you to be careful and you don't listen, now you're getting scolded.

台文: 這擺的代誌做了無啥順利，才會去予人碰釘。
台羅: Tsit pái ê tāi-tsì tsò liáu bô siánn sūn-lī, tsiah ē khì hōo lâng phòng-ting.
中文: 這次的事情做得不太順利，才會去碰到釘子。
英文: The thing this time didn't go very smoothly, so we ended up hitting a nail.

台文: 你身體無蓋好，有一寡物件著愛較禁喙咧。
台羅: Lí sin-thé bô kài hó, ū tsi̍t-kuá mi̍h-kiānn tio̍h-ài khah kìm-tshuì--leh.
中文: 你身體不太好，有一些東西還是要忌口比較好。
英文: Your body is not very well, there are some things that you still need to avoid eating.

台文: 鰇魚螺肉蒜內面愛有冬筍才好食。
台羅: Jiû-hî lê-bah-suàn lāi-bīn ài ū tang-sún tsiah hó-tsia̍h。
中文: 魷魚螺肉蒜裡面要有冬筍才好吃。
英文: Squid and snail meat with garlic tastes better with bamboo shoots inside.

台文: 阮遮賣枷車藤的店，口味有無仝款的變化，生理誠交易。
台羅: Guán tsia bē kha-tshia-tîn ê tiàm, kháu-bī ū bô kāng-khuán ê piàn-huà, sing-lí tsiânn ka-ia̍h.
中文: 我們這兒賣麻花的店，口味有不同的變化，生意非常熱絡。
英文: Our store that sells twisted doughnuts here has different variations in taste, and business is very lively.

台文: 行到半中央煞斡倒轉去。
台羅: Kiânn kàu puànn-tiong-ng suah uat tò-tńg--khì.
英文: Walked halfway but turned back.
It's already noon!

中文: 口頭表達能力較差，但有內在才華。
英文: The oral expression ability is poor, but there is inner talent.

台文: 經濟變好了後，誠濟平階攏拆掉換起樓仔厝。
台羅: King-tsè piàn hó liáu-āu, tsiânn tsē pênn-kai lóng thiah-tiāu uānn khí lâu-á-tshù.
中文: 經濟好轉之後，很多平房都拆掉改建樓房。
英文: After the economy improved, many single-story houses were demolished and replaced with multi-story buildings.

台文: 碗若是必巡，就毋通貯湯。
台羅: Uánn nā-sī pit-sûn, tō m̄-thang té thng.
中文: 碗若是龜裂了，就不可以盛湯。
英文: If a bowl is cracked, it cannot hold soup.
There are many cracks on the wall.

台文: 辜顯榮的本居地是佇鹿港。
台羅: Koo Hián-îng ê pún-ki-tē sī tī Lo̍k-káng.
中文: 辜顯榮的本籍是在鹿港。
英文: Gu Xianrong's native place is in Lukang.

台文: 你定定散散，阿爸的代誌欲按怎交仗予你。
台羅: Lí tiānn-tiānn suànn-suànn, a-pah ê tāi-tsì beh án-tsuánn kau-tiōng hōo--lí.
中文: 你常常迷迷糊糊，父親的事情要如何託付給你。
英文: You often seem confused, how can I entrust my father's affairs to you?

台文: 三月三，桃仔李仔伨頭擔。
中文: 農曆三月，以成擔方式挑著盛產的桃子、李子。
英文: In the third month of the lunar calendar, they carried baskets filled with abundant peaches and plums.
Two people perform together as partners.

台羅: Âng hue mā tio̍h tshenn hio̍h thīn-thâu.
英文: Red flowers also need green leaves to complement them.

台文: 錢額無啥夠，眾人逐个出寡來伨頭。
台羅: Tsînn-gia̍h bô siánn kàu, tsìng-lâng ta̍k ê tshut kuá lâi thīn-thâu.
中文: 金額不太夠，大伙兒各自出一些來湊合。
英文: The amount is not enough, everyone contributes some to make up for it.

台文: 好得無去，無，煞加走一逝。
台羅: Hó-tit bô khì, bô, suah ke tsáu tsi̍t tsuā.
中文: 幸好沒去，不然，就白跑一趟了。
英文: Luckily didn't go, otherwise, it would have been a wasted trip.
same surname

台文: 竹管仔飯上早是原住民的一種食物。
台羅: Tik-kóng-á-pn̄g siōng tsá sī guân-tsū-bîn ê tsi̍t tsióng si̍t-bu̍t.
中文: 竹筒飯最早是原住民的一種食物。
英文: Bamboo tube rice was originally a type of food for indigenous people.

台羅: Tsū-pún guán tau tō tsin sàn-tshiah.
英文: Originally, my family was very poor.

台文: 伊看見細隻雞囝一隻閣一隻對卵殼出來，就真歡喜。
台羅: I khuànn-kìnn sè tsiah ke-kiánn tsi̍t tsiah koh tsi̍t tsiah tuì nn̄g-khak tshut--lâi, tō tsin huann-hí.
中文: 他看見小雞一隻又一隻從蛋殼出來，就很高興。
英文: He was very happy when he saw one little chick after another coming out of their eggshells.

台文: 講話著伸手摸心肝，毋通含血霧天誣賴人。
台羅: Kóng-uē tio̍h tshun tshiú bong sim-kuann, m̄-thang kâm-hueh-bū-thinn bû-luā--lâng.
中文: 說話得要摸著良心，不可以血口噴人誣賴人家。
英文: Speak with a clear conscience, and do not slander others with false accusations.

台文: 你若是無法度一擺總納，抑無，看欲分做幾期？
台羅: Lí nā-sī bô-huat-tōo tsi̍t pái tsóng la̍p, iah-bô, khuànn beh hun-tsò kuí kî?
中文: 你要是無法一次付清，要不然，看你要分成幾期？
英文: If you can't pay in full at once, otherwise, how many installments do you want to split it into?

台羅: Tâi-uân ê khe-tsuí lóng sī tsiánn-tsuí.
中文: 臺灣的溪水全都是淡水。
英文: All the streams in Taiwan are freshwater.

台文: 你去攑沙耙共跳遠場地整予平。
台羅: Lí khì gia̍h sua-pê kā thiàu-hn̄g tiûnn-tē tsíng hōo pênn.
中文: 你去拿沙耙把跳遠場地整平。
英文: You go get the rake and level the long jump area.

台文: 伊拄咧學煎魚仔的時，定定煎甲牢鼎。
台羅: I tú-teh o̍h tsian hî-á ê sî, tiānn-tiānn tsian kah tiâu-tiánn.
中文: 他剛學煎魚時，常常煎得沾鍋。
英文: When he first learned to fry fish, he often made it stick to the pan.

台文: 四月芒種雨，六月火燒埔。
中文: 農曆四月芒種當天若下雨，農曆六月就會酷熱乾旱。這是民間流傳的氣象諺語。
英文: If it rains on the day of Mangzhong in the lunar calendar in April, it will be hot and dry in June in the lunar calendar. This is a weather proverb passed down among the people.

中文: 每一件事都要我操心煩惱。
英文: Every single thing makes me worry and troubled.

台文: 做人囝兒，就愛奉待爸母。
台羅: Tsò lâng kiánn-jî, tō ài hōng-thāi pē-bú.
中文: 為人子女，就該奉養父母。
英文: As children, we should take care of our parents.

台羅: I sī in tshù--lí ê koo-tsa-bóo-kiánn.
中文: 他是他們家裡的獨生女。
英文: He is the only daughter in their family.

台文: 逐冬媽祖生，廟裡攏會抾丁錢。
台羅: Ta̍k tang Má-tsóo-senn, biō--lí lóng ē khioh-ting-tsînn.
中文: 每年天上聖母誕辰，廟方都會照每家男丁的人數，去徵收分攤的費用。
英文: Every year on the birthday of the Virgin Mary, the temple will collect and distribute the expenses according to the number of male members in each family.

台文: 咱先明品一下，講過就準算，毋免保家。
台羅: Lán sing bîng-phín--tsi̍t-ē, kóng--kuè tō tsún-sǹg, m̄-bián pó-ke.
中文: 咱們先明確約定一下，說話算話，不用保證人。
英文: Let's first make it clear and agree that we will keep our promises without needing to guarantee it with anyone.

中文: 母語是文化發展的基礎。
英文: Mother tongue is the foundation of cultural development.

台文: 拄才風一下吹，門雄雄迸一聲，原來是門後的門擋仔歹去矣。
台羅: Tú-tsiah hong tsi̍t-ē tshue, mn̂g hiông-hiông piàng tsi̍t siann, guân-lâi sī mn̂g-āu ê mn̂g-tòng-á pháinn--khì--ah.
中文: 剛才風一吹，門突然碰一聲，原來是門後的門擋壞掉了。
英文: Just now, a gust of wind blew and the door suddenly made a sound as it hit something. It turned out that the door stopper behind the door was broken.
Too much worry can cause premature aging.

台文: 阮兜的巷仔口有一間金紙店。
台羅: Guán tau ê hāng-á-kháu ū tsi̍t king kim-tsuá-tiàm.
中文: 我們家的巷口有一間金紙店。
英文: At the entrance of our alley, there is a shop that sells gold paper.

台文: 家己拍拚較要緊，怨天怨地敢有路用？
台羅: Ka-kī phah-piànn khah iàu-kín, uàn-thinn-uàn-tē kám ū-lōo-īng?
中文: 自己努力比較重要，抱怨老天爺不公平有用嗎？
英文: Is it useful to complain about the unfairness of God when it is more important to work hard oneself?
Please ask the gods to come and bless us.
How did this happen?

台文: 伊一領外衫穿幾若十年，補了閣補，毋甘挕捒。
台羅: I tsi̍t niá guā-sann tshīng kuí-nā tsa̍p nî, póo-liáu koh póo, m̄-kam hìnn-sak.
中文: 他一件外套穿了好幾十年，補了又補，捨不得丟掉。
英文: He has been wearing the same coat for decades, repairing it over and over again, and cannot bear to throw it away.

台文: 這塊田是活賣的，等十年後序細有法度做的時才閣買轉來。
台羅: Tsit tè tshân sī ua̍h-bē--ê, tán tsa̍p nî āu sī-sè ū-huat-tōo tsò ê sî tsiah-koh bé--tńg-lâi.
中文: 這塊田地是活賣的，等十年後晚輩能耕種的時候再買回來。
英文: This piece of land is being sold, and I will buy it back when my descendants can cultivate it in ten years.

台羅: A-tsí kah sió-tī sio-tshuā khì tha̍k-tsheh.
中文: 姊姊和弟弟結伴去上學。
英文: Sister and younger brother go to school together.

台文: 伊有一寡話囥咧，欲留咧做相罵本。
台羅: I ū tsi̍t-kuá uē khǹg--leh, beh lâu leh tsò sio-mē-pún.
中文: 他有一些話保留著，是要留著吵架時拿來駁倒對方。
英文: He has some words reserved, to be used to refute the other party when arguing.

台文: 猶未到食飯時間就胃慒慒，毋知胃有問題無？
台羅: Iáu-buē kàu tsia̍h-pn̄g sî-kan tō uī tso-tso, m̄ tsai uī ū būn-tê--bô?
中文: 還沒到吃飯時間胃就不舒服，不知道胃有沒有問題？
英文: I feel uncomfortable in my stomach before mealtime. I wonder if there is something wrong with my stomach.

中文: 開創銀樓需要投下大資本。
英文: To establish a silver shop requires a large capital investment.

台文: 彼種生理遐重本，我看咱毋通做。
台羅: Hit tsióng sing-lí hiah tāng-pún, guá khuànn lán m̄-thang tsò.
中文: 那種生意資本負擔那麼重，我看我們不要做。
英文: That kind of business has such a heavy capital burden, I think we shouldn't do it.

台文: 禮拜時仔，朋友相招出去食好料。
台羅: Lé-pài-sî-á, pîng-iú sio-tsio tshut-khì tsia̍h hó-liāu.
中文: 星期假日，朋友相約外出吃大餐。
英文: On weekends, friends make plans to go out and have a big meal together.

台文: 張總的頂擺出張，去巡視海外的工場，佇遐蹛個外月。
台羅: Tiunn tsóng--ê tíng-pái tshut-tiunn, khì sûn-sī hái-guā ê kang-tiûnn, tī hia tuà kò-guā-gue̍h.
中文: 張總經理上次出差，去巡視海外的工廠，在那裡待了一個多月。
英文: General Manager Zhang went on a business trip last time to inspect the overseas factories and stayed there for more than a month.

台文: 上崎的時若雄雄熄火，車會倒退攄。
台羅: Tsiūnn-kiā ê sî nā hiông-hiông sit-hué, tshia ē tò-thè-lu.
中文: 上坡時如果突然熄火，車子會向後滑動。
英文: If the car suddenly stalls while going uphill, it will slide backwards.
Neighbors should take care of each other.

台文: 你若閣講袂聽，原性不改，以後食苦的是家己。
台羅: Lí nā koh kóng bē thiann, guân-sìng put kái, í-āu tsia̍h-khóo--ê sī ka-kī.
中文: 你如果再講不聽，本性不改，以後吃苦的是自己。
英文: If you keep talking without listening, your nature won't change, and in the future, you will suffer on your own.

台文: 今年的義賣會，有真濟人鬥捀場。
台羅: Kin-nî ê gī-bē-huē, ū tsin tsē lâng tàu phâng-tiûnn.
中文: 今年的義賣會，有很多人幫忙捧場。
英文: This year's charity sale had many people helping out.

台羅: I tuì lâng tsin ū thiànn-sim.
英文: He is very compassionate towards others.
He loves his children so much that it hurts.

台文: 包紙敬予喪家，是為著欲共喪家鬥相楗。
台羅: Pau tsuá-kìng hōo song-ka, sī uī-tio̍h beh kā song-ka tàu-sio-kīng.
中文: 送奠儀給喪家，是為了幫忙喪家。
英文: To give funeral offerings to the bereaved family is to help the family.

台文: 早前連番薯臭香，嘛礤簽來食。
台羅: Tsá-tsîng liân han-tsî tshàu-hiunn, mā tshuah-tshiam lâi tsia̍h.
中文: 以前連地瓜得了黑斑病，變黑又發臭，也刨絲來吃。
英文: Before, even sweet potatoes were affected by black spot disease, turning black and emitting a foul odor, yet people still scraped off the affected parts and ate them.

台文: 天欲暗矣，無較緊咧，就袂赴市矣。
台羅: Thinn beh àm--ah, bô khah kín--leh, tō  bē-hù-tshī--ah.
中文: 天色將晚，不快一點，就來不及了。
英文: The sky is getting late. If we don't hurry up, we won't make it in time.

台羅: In-uī lo̍h tuā-hōo, tsiah bē-tit khì.
中文: 因為下大雨，才無法前去。
英文: Because of heavy rain, I couldn't go.

中文: 俚語，字面意思是，將死卻不能安然逝去。比喻情勢惡劣，只得苟延殘喘；或指事情多得做不完，不做又不行；或指經商失敗，處境艱難。
英文: The literal meaning of the idiom is to be dying but unable to pass away peacefully. It is used to metaphorically describe a situation that is extremely difficult and one can only barely survive; or to refer to a situation where there is too much work to do, but not doing it is not an option; or to describe a difficult situation resulting from a business failure.

台文: 火車欲起磅矣，毋通倚去！
中文: 火車要起動行駛了，不要靠近！
英文: The train is about to start moving, do not approach!

台文: 東部營業處後個月月初起磅，逐家加油！
台羅: Tang-pōo îng-gia̍p-tshù āu kò gue̍h gue̍h-tshe khí-pōng, ta̍k-ke ka-iû!
中文: 東部營業處下個月月初起動，大家加油！
英文: The Eastern Sales Office will start operating at the beginning of next month. Let's work hard!

台文: 才啉這點仔酒爾爾，猶未起磅咧啦！
台羅: Tsiah lim tsit-tiám-á tsiú niā-niā,  iáu-buē khí-pōng--leh--lah!
中文: 才喝這點兒酒而已，還沒開始過癮啦！
英文: Just drinking this little bit of alcohol, haven't even started having fun yet!

台文: 募款的代誌略仔起磅矣。
中文: 募款的事情稍有起色了。
英文: The fundraising situation has improved slightly.

台文: 伊一下聽著著大獎，煞徛踮遐起戇。
台羅: I tsi̍t-ē thiann-tio̍h tio̍h tuā-tsióng, suah khiā tiàm hia khí-gōng.
中文: 他一聽到得了大獎，卻站在那裡發怔。
英文: As soon as he heard that he won the award, he stood there in a daze.
He is tall with a big head and a horse-like face.

中文: 臺灣童謠可以算是唸謠。
英文: Taiwanese nursery rhymes can be considered as lullabies.

台文: 伊若啉酒醉，攏講伊無醉。
台羅: I nā lim-tsiú-tsuì, lóng kóng i bô tsuì.
中文: 他要是喝醉了，都會說他沒有醉。
英文: If he gets drunk, he always says he's not drunk.

台文: 伊出來選立委的時，有真濟好名聲的人共伊徛台。
台羅: I tshut-lâi suán li̍p-uí ê sî, ū tsin tsē hó miâ-siann ê lâng kā i khiā-tâi.
中文: 他出來選立委時，有很多名聲好的人幫他站臺助選。
英文: When he ran for legislator, many well-known people helped him stand and campaign.

台文: 彼間百年老店到今猶是第三代的老頭家咧徛台扞店。
台羅: Hit king pah-nî lāu-tiàm kàu-tann iáu-sī tē-sann tāi ê lāu thâu-ke teh khiā-tâi huānn-tiàm.
中文: 那間百年老店至今仍是第三代的老店東在領導主持店務。
英文: That century-old store is still led by the third generation store owner in managing the business.
The carpenter uses a inked string to draw a straight line.

中文: 大年初四，迎接前一年十二月二十四升天的諸神。
英文: On the fourth day of the lunar new year, we welcome the gods who ascended to heaven on the 24th day of the twelfth lunar month of the previous year.

台羅: Sàng-sîn ài tsá, tsih-sîn ài uànn.
中文: 送神要早一點，接神要晚一點。
英文: Send the gods early, receive the gods late.

台文: 你胃腸無好，涼的毋通食傷濟。
台羅: Lí uī-tn̂g bô hó, liâng--ê m̄-thang tsia̍h siunn tsē.
中文: 你胃腸不好，不要吃太多冰冷的東西。
英文: Your stomach and intestines are not good, don't eat too many cold things.

台文: 做粗瓷仔若無先淋碭，等燒好了後，貯水恐驚會洩出來。
台羅: Tsò tshoo-huî-á nā bô sing lâm-thn̄g, tán sio-hó liáu-āu, té tsuí khióng-kiann ē sia̍p--tshut-lâi.
中文: 做陶器要是沒先上釉，等燒好之後，裝水恐怕會滲漏出來。
英文: If pottery is not glazed before firing, it may leak after being filled with water.

台文: 伊規年迵天攏佇深山林內燒瓷仔，罕得轉來一逝。
台羅: I kui-nî-thàng-thinn lóng tī tshim-suann-nâ-lāi sio huî-á, hán-tit tńg-lâi tsi̍t tsuā.
中文: 他一年到頭都在偏遠山區燒製陶瓷，難得回來一趟。
英文: He spends the whole year making ceramics in remote mountain areas, rarely coming back.

台羅: Lâng nā tshián-iân, tō bē tshim-kau.
中文: 人與人之間如果緣份淺，就不會深切交往。
英文: If the fate between people is shallow, they will not have a deep relationship.

台文: 伊做代誌真猛掠，一睏仔就做好矣。
台羅: I tsò tāi-tsì tsin mé-lia̍h, tsi̍t-khùn-á tō tsò-hó--ah.
中文: 他做事很敏捷，一下子就做好了。
英文: He is very agile in his work and finished it in no time.

台文: 終其尾伊嘛是提無著半項。
台羅: Tsiong-kî-bué i mā sī the̍h bô tio̍h puànn hāng.
中文: 他最終也是什麼都沒拿到。
英文: In the end, he didn't get anything.

中文: 韭菜花炒透抽，很合胃口。
英文: Stir-fried cuttlefish with garlic chives flowers is very appetizing.

台文: 選舉買票真厲害，這是通人知的代誌。
台羅: Suán-kí bé-phiò tsin lī-hāi, tse sī thong-lâng-tsai ê tāi-tsì.
中文: 選舉買票很嚴重，這是眾人皆知的事情。
英文: Election buying is very serious, which is a well-known fact.

台文: 排長訓練兵仔，共兵仔喝起喝倒。
台羅: Pâi-tiúnn hùn-liān ping-á, kā ping-á huah-khí-huah-tó.
中文: 排長訓練士兵，叫士兵起來、躺下去。
英文: Train soldiers to line up, and order them to stand up and lie down.

台文: 伊是這角勢的老大，逐家攏予伊喝起喝倒。
台羅: I sī tsit kak-sì ê láu-tuā, ta̍k-ke lóng hōo i huah-khí-huah-tó.
中文: 他是這一帶的老大，大家都聽他發號施令。
英文: He is the boss of this area, everyone listens to his commands.

台文: 人欲請你，你都無咧媠面閣！
台羅: Lâng beh tshiánn--lí, lí to bô teh suí-bīn--koh!
中文: 人家要請你吃飯，你別臭美了！
英文: People want to treat you to a meal, don't be so conceited!

中文: 紅龜粿抹油──面子比較好看。紅龜粿在表面抹油，以防止龜裂，保持美觀。
英文: Red tortoise cake is greased - the face looks better. Red tortoise cake is greased on the surface to prevent cracking and maintain its beauty.

台文: 你欲出去做生理，無愛閣蹛厝內，著愛尊存作穡的老爸，先佮伊參詳。
台羅: Lí beh tshut-khì tsò-sing-lí, bô ài koh tuà tshù-lāi, tio̍h-ài tsun-tshûn tsoh-sit ê lāu-pē, sing kah i tsham-siông.
中文: 你要出去做生意，不想再待家裡，得要顧及種田的父親，先跟他商量。
英文: You want to go out and do business, don't want to stay at home anymore, have to consider your father who is farming, talk to him first.

台文: 伊雄雄傱出來，害我掣一趒。
台羅: I hiông-hiông tsông--tshut-lâi, hāi guá tshuah tsi̍t tiô.
中文: 他突然跑了出來，讓我嚇了一跳。
英文: He suddenly ran out, which scared me.

台文: 咱咧講話，有時會插濫幾若種語言。
台羅: Lán teh kóng-uē, ū-sî ē tshap-lām kuí-nā tsióng gí-giân.
中文: 我們說話，有時會摻雜好幾種語言。
英文: We speak, sometimes mixing several languages.

台羅: Hit ê kàm-kang tsin gâu kā lâng khia-khang.
中文: 那個監工很會無故刁難別人。
英文: That supervisor is very good at unreasonably making things difficult for others.
Pour out the rice juice.

台文: 無天良的人敢會有好尾？
台羅: Bô-thian-liông ê lâng kám ē ū hó-bué?
英文: Can heartless people have a good ending?

台文: 爸母無捨施，送囝去學戲。
台羅: Pē-bú bô-siá-sì, sàng kiánn khì o̍h hì.
中文: 父母實在難為情，萬不得已才把子女送去戲班學習演戲。以前學戲的孩子不但辛苦，而且常遭體罰。
英文: Parents are really embarrassed, and only reluctantly send their children to drama classes to learn acting. In the past, children who studied drama not only worked hard, but also often suffered physical punishment.

台文: 遮細漢就無爸無母，真無捨施。
台羅: Tsiah sè-hàn tō bô pē bô bú, tsin bô-siá-sì.
中文: 這麼小就父母雙亡，真可憐。
英文: So young and already orphaned, how pitiful.

台羅: Kè-siàu nā lak, tún-huè tō bô-puânn.
中文: 價格如果下跌，囤積貨物就不划算。
英文: If the price drops, hoarding goods is not cost-effective.
The mountain cats are becoming fewer and fewer.

台文: 這个琴子害去矣，彈袂出聲音，愛揣人來修理。
台羅: Tsit ê khîm-jí hāi--khì--ah, tuânn bē tshut siann-im, ài tshuē lâng lâi siu-lí.
中文: 這個琴鍵壞掉了，彈不出聲音，要找人來修理。
英文: This piano key is broken and cannot produce sound. We need to find someone to repair it.

台文: 種番薯著愛培番薯稜，才會生番薯。
台羅: Tsìng han-tsî tio̍h-ài puē han-tsî-lîng, tsiah ē senn han-tsî.
中文: 種地瓜要堆高地瓜壟，才會長出地瓜。
英文: To grow sweet potatoes, you need to pile up sweet potato mounds.
Urge the immovable spirits.
He's throwing a tantrum again!

台文: 我睏一醒矣，你哪會閣毋去睏？
台羅: Guá khùn-tsi̍t-tshénn--ah, lí ná ē koh m̄ khì khùn?
中文: 我睡了一覺醒來了，你怎麼還不去睡？
英文: I slept for a while and woke up, why haven't you gone to sleep yet?

台文: 較早的計程車，有的較無愛載短站的人客。
台羅: Khah-tsá ê kè-thîng-tshia, ū ê khah bô ài tsài té-tsām ê lâng-kheh.
中文: 以前的計程車，有的比較不喜歡載短程的客人。
英文: In the past, some taxis didn't like to pick up short-distance passengers.

中文: 賭場賭博不管父子親情，只管輸贏。
英文: The text translates to: In the casino, gambling disregards family ties and only cares about winning or losing.

中文: 把虎頭蜂看成吃筍子的象鼻蟲。比喻把壞人看成好人。
英文: Viewing a hornet as a bamboo worm that eats bamboo shoots. It means to mistake a bad person for a good person.
read aloud.
cry loudly.

台文: 事業交予後生了後，就是閒身矣。
台羅: Sū-gia̍p kau hōo hāu-senn liáu-āu, tō sī îng-sin--ah.
中文: 事業交給兒子經營以後，就是清閒的人了。
英文: After handing over the business to his son to manage, he became a leisurely person.

台文: 退休以後，伊是閒身的人。
台羅: Thè-hiu í-āu, i sī îng-sin ê lâng.
英文: He has no job on hand.

中文: 到陰間賣鴨蛋去了；人去世的委婉說法。
英文: Went to sell duck eggs in the underworld; a euphemism for someone passing away.

台文: 選舉的時，候選人愛靠伊的柱仔跤來鬥搝票。
台羅: Suán-kí ê sî, hāu-suán-jîn ài khò i ê thiāu-á-kha lâi tàu khiú-phiò.
中文: 選舉的時候，候選人要靠他的樁腳來幫忙拉票。
英文: During elections, candidates rely on their supporters to help campaign.

台文: 有明星咧鬥宣傳，這支胭脂加足搶市。
台羅: Ū bîng-tshenn teh tàu suan-thuân, tsit ki ian-tsi ke tsiok tshiúnn-tshī.
中文: 有明星在代言，這款口紅暢銷多了。
英文: With celebrities endorsing it, this lipstick has become very popular.

台文: 新正年頭見面攏會講好話。
台羅: Sin-tsiann-nî-thâu kìnn-bīn lóng ē kóng hó-uē.
中文: 春節期間見面都會說吉祥話。
英文: During the Spring Festival, we always say auspicious words when we meet.

台文: 你講過的話，敢閣會記得？
台羅: Lí kóng--kuè ê uē, kám koh ē-kì--tit?
中文: 你說過的話，是否還記得呢？
英文: Do you remember what you said?
Before sleeping, remember to brush your teeth.

台文: 會記得細漢的時，捌去彼間媽祖廟拜拜。
台羅: Ē-kì-tit sè-hàn ê sî, bat khì hit king Má-tsóo-biō pài-pài.
中文: 記得小時候，曾去那間媽祖廟拜拜。
英文: I remember when I was young, I went to that Mazu temple to pray.

台羅: Lâng nā ū-huè, ba̍k-tsiu tō ian-n̄g.
英文: As you get older, your eyesight deteriorates.
He is anemic and his eyes are blurry.

台文: 伊跋倒，雖然人無按怎，醫生講猶是照電光確定骨頭無含梢較好。
台羅: I pua̍h-tó, sui-jiân lâng bô án-tsuánn, i-sing kóng iáu-sī tsiò-tiān-kong khak-tīng kut-thâu bô hâm-sau khah hó.
中文: 他跌倒了，雖然覺得沒怎樣，醫生說還是照X光確定骨骼沒裂痕比較好。
英文: He fell down, although he didn't feel like it was a big deal, the doctor said it's better to take an X-ray to confirm that there are no fractures in the bones.

台文: 為著維護空氣的品質，車廂內全面禁薰。
台羅: Uī-tio̍h uî-hōo khong-khì ê phín-tsit, tshia-siunn-lāi tsuân-bīn kìm-hun.
中文: 為了維護空氣的品質，車廂內全面禁菸。
英文: For the sake of maintaining air quality, smoking is prohibited throughout the entire train carriage.

中文: 他是一個通曉各樣事物的人。
英文: He is a person who understands all kinds of things.

台文: 兩爿咧冤家，一爿看毋是勢，緊閣落人來。
台羅: Nn̄g-pîng teh uan-ke, tsi̍t-pîng khuànn m̄-sī-sè, kín koh làu-lâng lâi.
中文: 雙方在吵架，一方見苗頭不對，趕緊再叫人來。
英文: Both sides were arguing, and one party noticed that things were not going well, so they quickly called for someone else to come.

台文: 落台的時愛共觀眾行禮。
台羅: Lo̍h-tâi ê sî ài kā kuan-tsiòng kiânn-lé.
英文: When stepping down, you should bow to the audience.

台文: 政治人物奢颺上台的真濟，光榮落台的較少。
台羅: Tsìng-tī jîn-bu̍t tshia-iānn tsiūnn-tâi--ê tsin tsē, kong-îng lo̍h-tâi--ê khah tsió.
中文: 政治人物風光上臺的很多，光榮下臺的較少。
英文: Many politicians rise to power in glory, but few leave in honor.

台文: 我跤捗比人較大，真歹買鞋仔。
台羅: Guá kha-pôo pí lâng khah tuā, tsin pháinn bé ê-á.
中文: 我腳丫子比人家大，很難買鞋子。
英文: My feet are bigger than others', it's hard to buy shoes.

台文: 警方根據現場留落來的跤捗號，才掠著犯人。
台羅: Kíng-hong kin-kì hiān-tiûnn lâu--lo̍h-lâi ê kha-pôo hō,  tsiah lia̍h-tio̍h huān-lâng.
中文: 警方根據現場留下來的腳印，才抓到犯人。
英文: The police caught the criminal based on the footprints left at the scene.

台文: 血氣袂順的人，較會跤麻手痺。
台羅: Hueh-khì bē sūn ê lâng, khah ē kha-bâ-tshiú-pì.
中文: 氣血不順的人，比較容易手腳麻痺。
英文: People with poor blood circulation are more prone to numbness in their hands and feet.

台文: 直直行到路尾就會看著彼坎店。
台羅: Ti̍t-ti̍t kiânn kàu lōo-bué tō ē khuànn-tio̍h hit khám tiàm.
中文: 直走到路的盡頭就會看到那家店。
英文: You will see that store when you walk straight to the end of the road.

中文: 俗語，字面意思是在路上任何地方都可能會相遇。引申為為人處世不要太絕，以防冤家路窄。
英文: Saying, literally meaning that you may encounter each other anywhere on the road, is extended to mean that one should not be too extreme in dealing with others, in order to prevent narrow paths with enemies.

台文: 駛車欲通過斑馬線，著愛讓予過路人先過。
台羅: Sái-tshia beh thong-kuè pan-má-suànn, tio̍h-ài niū hōo kuè-lōo-lâng sing kuè.
中文: 開車要通過斑馬線，得要禮讓行人先過。
英文: When driving across a zebra crossing, you must give way to pedestrians and let them cross first.

台文: 我是過路人，毋敢對這項代誌表示意見。
台羅: Guá sī kuè-lōo-lâng, m̄ kánn tuì tsit hāng tāi-tsì piáu-sī ì-kiàn.
中文: 我是不相干的人，不敢對這件事情表示意見。
英文: I am an unrelated person and dare not express any opinions on this matter.
Assemble the wires to connect the current.

台文: 大通路的十字路頭，一般攏有電眼咧翕。
台羅: Tuā-thong-lōo ê si̍p-jī-lōo-thâu, it-puann lóng ū tiān-gán teh hip.
中文: 大馬路的十字路口，一般都有監視器在監錄。
英文: At the intersection of the main road, there are usually surveillance cameras recording.

中文: 甘蔗根部的節與節之間的距離比較短。
英文: The distance between the nodes of the sugarcane roots is relatively short.

中文: 他的頭腦實在不靈光，不懂得變通。
英文: His mind is really not bright, and he doesn't know how to be flexible.

台文: 彼兩間便利商店相對相，毋過生理差真濟。
台羅: Hit nn̄g king piān-lī siong-tiàm sio-tuì-siòng, m̄-koh sing-lí tsha tsin tsē.
中文: 那兩間便利商店正面相對，但是生意差很多。
英文: Those two convenience stores face each other, but their business is very different.

台文: 伊佮人對相十外回，相無一个有佮意的。
台羅: I kah lâng tuì-siòng tsa̍p-guā huê, siòng bô tsi̍t ê ū kah-ì--ê.
中文: 他跟人相親了十幾次，沒看到一個喜歡的。
英文: He has been on more than ten blind dates and hasn't found anyone he likes.

台文: 佮你滾耍笑的，莫受氣啦！
中文: 和你開玩笑的，不要生氣啦！
英文: Don't be angry, I'm just joking with you!

台文: 海產食了，腹肚煞滾絞疼，上好緊去看醫生。
台羅: Hái-sán tsia̍h-liáu, pak-tóo suah kún-ká-thiànn, siōng-hó kín khì khuànn-i-sing.
中文: 吃完海產，肚子竟然翻騰絞痛，最好快去看醫生。
英文: After eating seafood, my stomach suddenly churned and ached, it's best to see a doctor quickly.

台文: 共袂食得的菜葉仔揀掉，提去漚肥。
台羅: Kā bē-tsia̍h--tit ê tshài-hio̍h-á kíng-tiāu, the̍h-khì au-puî.
中文: 把不能吃的菜葉挑掉，拿去堆肥。
英文: Remove the inedible leaves and use them for compost.
dirty yellow and black color.
Stinky face, an angry and unpleasant expression.

台文: 彼號漚屎議員，專門咧共人貿工程。
台羅: Hit lō àu-sái gī-uân, tsuan-bûn teh kā lâng bāu kang-tîng.
中文: 那種差勁的議員，專門在包工程。
英文: That kind of lousy legislator specializes in contract projects.

台文: 阮阿公較早是漢學仔先。
中文: 我的祖父以前是在私塾教漢學的老師。
英文: My grandfather used to be a teacher of Chinese studies in a private school.

台文: 生理著愛算會和才通做。
台羅: Sing-lí tio̍h-ài sǹg-ē-hô tsiah thang tsò.
中文: 生意要划得來才可以做。
英文: The business must be profitable in order to do it.

台文: 網仔門破去矣，會走蠓仔入來，愛緊修理予好。
台羅: Bāng-á-mn̂g phuà--khì--ah, ē tsáu báng-á ji̍p--lâi, ài kín siu-lí hōo hó.
中文: 紗門破掉了，會跑蚊子進來，要趕緊修理好。
英文: The screen door is broken, mosquitoes will come in, we need to repair it quickly.

台文: 伊雖然是散赤家庭出身，毋過伊無認命，拚到最後出頭天。
台羅: I sui-jiân sī sàn-tshiah ka-tîng tshut-sin, m̄-koh i bô jīn-miā, piànn kàu tsuè-āu tshut-thâu-thinn.
中文: 他雖然是清寒家庭出身，但是他不認命，拼到最終出人頭地。
英文: Although he came from a poor family, he did not resign himself to fate and worked hard until he succeeded.

台文: 這塊桌仔著愛踅頭，讀冊才食會著光。
台羅: Tsit tè toh-á tio̍h-ài se̍h-thâu, tha̍k-tsheh tsiah tsia̍h ē tio̍h kng.
中文: 這塊桌子得要掉個頭，讀書才照得到光線。
英文: This table needs to be turned over so that the light can shine on the book for reading.

台文: 這个十字路口車袂使踅頭。
台羅: Tsit ê si̍p-jī-lōo-kháu tshia bē-sái se̍h-thâu.
中文: 這個十字路口不准車輛迴轉。
英文: This intersection prohibits vehicles from making a U-turn.

中文: 沒有蹤跡，常用來比喻虛假不實
英文: No trace, often used to metaphorize falsehood.

台文: 叫伊來鬥顧擔，煞走甲無看見影跡。
台羅: Kiò i lâi tàu kòo-tànn, suah tsáu kah bô khuànn-kìnn iánn-tsiah.
中文: 叫他來幫忙顧攤子，卻跑得不見人影。
英文: Ask him to come and help watch the stall, but he ran away and disappeared.

台文: 伊講當選了後，欲整頓市場，結果攏無影跡。
台羅: I kóng tòng-suán liáu-āu, beh tsíng-tùn tshī-tiûnn, kiat-kó lóng bô iánn-tsiah.
中文: 他說當選之後，要整頓市場，結果都是虛假。
英文: He said that after being elected, he would rectify the market, but the result was all false.

台文: 這个撐渡伯仔真𠢕和人客唱褒歌。
台羅: Tsit ê the-tōo peh--á tsin gâu hām lâng-kheh tshiùnn po-kua.
中文: 這個擺渡老伯很擅長跟客人對唱褒歌。
英文: This ferryman is very good at singing praise songs with his guests.

台文: 你毋轉去食暗，是欲閣去佗位樂跎？
台羅: Lí m̄ tńg-khì tsia̍h-àm, sī beh koh khì tó-uī lo̍k-tô?
中文: 你不回去吃晚餐，又是要去哪兒逍遙？
英文: Where are you going to have fun if you're not going back for dinner?

台文: 樓栱去予蛀蟲蛀幾若穿。
台羅: Lâu-kông khì hōo tsiù-thâng tsiù kuí-nā tshng.
中文: 樓房的橫梁被蛀蟲蛀了好幾個洞。
英文: The horizontal beams of the building have been eaten by termites, leaving several holes.

台文: 樓栱會使囥一寡仔物件。
中文: 天花板與屋頂之間的空間可以儲藏一些東西。
英文: The space between the ceiling and the roof can be used to store some things.

台文: 箭竹仔筍炒肉絲，好食甲。
中文: 箭竹筍炒肉絲，好吃得很。
英文: Arrow bamboo shoots stir-fried with shredded pork, very delicious.

台文: 共遮的蝦笱下蹛溪裡，掠看有蝦仔無。
台羅: Kā tsia-ê hê-kô hē tuà khe--lí, lia̍h khuànn ū hê-á--bô.
中文: 把這些蝦筌放在溪裡，看能不能抓到蝦子。
英文: Put these shrimp traps in the stream and see if you can catch any shrimp.
Temporarily unemployed, don't be discouraged.
noodle stand.

台羅: I tī lōo-pinn teh pâi tànn-á.
英文: He is selling goods by the roadside.

台文: 伊替人擔罪，才會去坐監。
台羅: I thè lâng tann-tsuē, tsiah ē khì tsē-kann.
中文: 他替人頂罪，才會去坐牢。
英文: He took the blame for someone else and ended up going to jail.

台羅: Tsia̍h hiông, khùn tiōng, tsoh-sit niau-niau-siòng.
中文: 吃得兇，睡得多，要工作就東張西望，比喻好吃懶做。
英文: Eat fiercely, sleep a lot, if you want to work, look around aimlessly, metaphor for being lazy.

台文: 現代時行佇結婚的隔轉日頭轉客，順紲請人客。
台羅: Hiān-tāi sî-kiânn tī kiat-hun ê keh-tńg-ji̍t thâu-tńg-kheh, sūn-suà tshiánn-lâng-kheh.
中文: 現代流行在結婚的隔天歸寧，順便宴請客人。
英文: The modern trend is to return home the day after the wedding and host a banquet for guests.

台文: 外口嚇嚇叫是咧創啥物？
台羅: Guā-kháu heh-heh-kiò sī teh tshòng siánn-mih?
中文: 外頭鬧轟轟的是在幹什麼？
英文: What is all the noise outside?

台文: 戲台小人生，人生大戲台。
台羅: Hì-tâi sió jîn-sing, jîn-sing tuā hì-tâi.
英文: Life is like a drama, and drama is like life.

台文: 總講一句，是你家己做得來的，毋免去怪別人。
台羅: Tsóng-kóng--tsi̍t-kù, sī lí ka-kī tsò-tit-lâi--ê, m̄-bián khì kuài pa̍t-lâng.
中文: 總歸一句，是你自己造成的後果，不用去怪別人。
英文: In the end, it's a consequence caused by yourself. Don't blame others.

台文: 便若神明生，神轎攏會繞境驅煞。
台羅: Piān-nā sîn-bîng-senn, sîn-kiō lóng ē jiàu-kíng khu suah.
中文: 每逢神明聖誕，神轎都會繞境驅煞。
英文: Every time there is a divine Christmas, the divine sedan will go around the city to drive away evil spirits.

台文: 遮的物件舊漚舊臭，閣毋甘擲㧒捔。
台羅: Tsia-ê mi̍h-kiānn kū-àu-kū-tshàu, koh m̄-kam tàn-hiat-ka̍k.
中文: 這些東西老舊破爛，還捨不得丟棄。
英文: These things are old and worn out, but I can't bear to throw them away.

台文: 會曉煮雜菜麵的麵擔仔愈來愈少矣。
台羅: Ē-hiáu tsú tsa̍p-tshài-mī ê  mī-tànn-á jú lâi jú tsió--ah.
中文: 懂得煮什錦麵的麵攤越來越少了。
英文: The number of noodle stalls that know how to cook mixed noodles is decreasing.

台文: 伊是一个雜菜麵的跤數。
台羅: I sī tsi̍t ê tsa̍p-tshài-mī ê kha-siàu.
中文: 他是一個好像樣樣懂卻沒有一項專精的傢伙。
英文: He is a guy who seems to know everything but doesn't specialize in anything.

台文: 今囡仔離跤手矣，你會使去四界遊矣。
台羅: Tann gín-á lī-kha-tshiú--ah, lí ē-sái khì sì-kè iû--ah.
中文: 現在孩子不需要全心照顧，你可以到處去玩了。
英文: Now that the children don't need full attention, you can go play everywhere.

台文: 懶性的人做代誌無要無緊，定定會誤著代誌。
台羅: Nuā-sìng ê lâng tsò tāi-tsì bô-iàu-bô-kín, tiānn-tiānn ē gōo-tio̍h tāi-tsì.
中文: 懶散的人做事拖拖拉拉，常常會因為他的延誤，拖垮後面所有的活動。
英文: Lazy people tend to procrastinate, often causing all subsequent activities to collapse due to their delays.
This park is very spacious.

台文: 空喙著用藥水布包咧，才袂發癀。
台羅: Khang-tshuì tio̍h īng io̍h-tsuí-pòo pau--leh, tsiah bē huat-hông.
中文: 傷口要用紗布包著，才不致於發炎。
英文: The wound should be covered with gauze to prevent infection.
Don't put things in the wrong place.

中文: 天地上下顛倒，不合常理。意指人倫顛倒，長幼無序，或尊卑不分等等。
英文: The text in Chinese translates to: The world is upside down, which is against common sense. It refers to the reversal of human relationships, where there is no order between the old and the young, or between the superior and the inferior, and so on.

台羅: Tsit lō tsìng-thâu si̍t-tsāi tsiânn tak-tînn.
英文: This kind of illness is really troublesome.

台文: 鰇魚鬚就是鰇魚的跤佮手。
台羅: Jiû-hî-tshiu tō sī jiû-hî ê kha kah tshiú.
中文: 魷魚的觸手就是魷魚的手跟腳。
英文: The tentacles of a squid are its hands and feet.
Seawater itself is salty water

台文: 鹹水魚若是現流仔加足貴的。
台羅: Kiâm-tsuí-hî nā-sī hiān-lâu-á ke tsiok kuì--ê.
中文: 海魚若是現捕的貴得多。
英文: If fresh, sea fish are much more expensive.

台文: 有當時仔食一屑仔鹹梅，會幫助消化。
台羅: Ū-tang-sî-á tsia̍h tsi̍t-sut-á kiâm-muê, ē pang-tsōo siau-huà.
中文: 偶爾吃一點點話梅，可以幫助消化。
英文: Occasionally eating a little bit of preserved plum can help with digestion.

台文: 有的人誠厚譴損，做啥物代誌攏著閣看日。
台羅: Ū ê lâng tsiânn kāu-khiàn-sńg, tsò siánn-mih tāi-tsì lóng tio̍h koh khuànn-ji̍t.
中文: 有的人有很多禁忌，無論做什麼事情都還得擇日。
英文: Some people have many taboos, no matter what they do, they still have to choose a good day.

中文: 迷信禁忌以巫術做蠱來趨吉避凶。
英文: Believing in superstitions and taboos, they use witchcraft to bring good luck and ward off evil.

台文: 醫生共聽筒囥佇我的胸坎，聽看我的肺部有各樣無。
台羅: I-sing kā thiann-tâng khǹg tī guá ê hing-khám, thiann khuànn guá ê hì-pōo ū koh-iūnn--bô.
中文: 醫師把聽診器放在我的胸膛，聽聽看我的肺部有沒有異狀。
英文: The doctor placed the stethoscope on my chest to listen for any abnormalities in my lungs.

台羅: Lí tsò he sī teh liáu gōng-kang.
英文: You are doing something that is pointless.

台文: 竹仔愛略仔烘一下，才有法度鬱拗。
台羅: Tik-á ài lio̍h-á hang--tsi̍t-ē, tsiah ū-huat-tōo ut-áu.
中文: 竹子要稍微用火燒烤一下，才有辦法揉彎。
英文: Bamboo needs to be slightly roasted with fire before it can be bent.
He insists on falsely accusing me.

台文: 六月天火燒埔，規日攏誠鬱熱。
台羅: La̍k-gue̍h-thinn hué-sio-poo, kui-ji̍t lóng tsiânn ut-jua̍h.
中文: 農曆六月的天氣就像火燒山，整天都很悶熱。
英文: The weather in the sixth month of the lunar calendar is like a burning mountain, and it is hot and stuffy all day long.

台文: 最近咧落𤺪雨，衫仔褲披較久都袂焦。
台羅: Tsuè-kīn teh lo̍h siān-hōo, sann-á-khòo phi khah kú to bē ta.
中文: 最近霪雨不停，衣褲晾再久也不乾。
英文: Recently, the heavy rain has not stopped, and even if clothes and pants are hung out for a long time, they will not dry.
Remember to pour wine during the worship.

台羅: Lāu-lâng kiann pua̍h-tó, m̄-hó peh suann-kiā.
中文: 老人家怕跌倒，不能爬山坡。
英文: The elderly are afraid of falling and cannot climb hills.

台文: 一人才分一疕仔，連楔喙齒縫都無夠。
台羅: Tsi̍t lâng tsiah pun tsi̍t-phí-á, liân seh tshuì-khí-phāng to bô-kàu.
中文: 一人才分得一點點，連塞牙縫都不夠。
英文: A person only gets a little bit, not even enough to fill the gaps between their teeth.

台文: 你莫看伊人一疕仔囝，伊力頭真飽喔！
台羅: Lí mài khuànn i lâng tsi̍t-phí-á-kiánn, i la̍t-thâu tsin pá--ooh!
中文: 你別看他是個小不點，他力氣可大著！
英文: Don't underestimate him just because he's small, he's actually very strong!

台文: 這个師傅的寸步，逐過攏嘛做甲一必一中。
台羅: Tsit ê sai-hū ê tshùn-pōo, ta̍k-kuè lóng mā tsò kah it-pit-it-tiòng.
中文: 這個師傅的尺寸，每次都做得非常精準。
英文: This master's measurements are always very precise.

台文: 咱七月半普渡彼工，菜碗著攢較腥臊咧，來拜好兄弟仔。
台羅: Lán Tshit-gue̍h-puànn phóo-tōo hit kang, tshài-uánn tio̍h tshuân khah tshenn-tshau--leh, lâi pài hó-hiann-tī-á.
中文: 咱們中元普渡那天，供品得準備豐盛點，來祭拜好兄弟。
英文: On the day of Zhongyuan Festival, let's prepare abundant offerings to worship our dear brothers.

台文: 拚暝工，七晏八晏才去睏。
英文: Working night shifts, I go to bed very late.

台文: 人額有夠，才會用得買團體票。
台羅: Lâng-gia̍h ū-kàu, tsiah ē-īng-tit bé thuân-thé-phiò.
中文: 人數足夠，才可以買團體票。
英文: If there are enough people, we can buy group tickets.

台文: 咱遮有八个人，遐的物件才五人額，猶無夠三个人額。
台羅: Lán tsia ū peh ê lâng, hia-ê mi̍h-kiānn tsiah gōo lâng-gia̍h, iáu bô-kàu sann ê lâng-gia̍h.
中文: 咱們這兒有八個人，那些東西才五人份，還不夠三人份。
英文: We have eight people here, but there are only enough of those things for five people, which is not even enough for three people.

台文: 伊生做人懸漢大，氣力飽，夯的貨自然比人較濟。
台羅: I senn-tsò lâng-kuân-hàn-tuā, khuì-la̍t pá, giâ ê huè tsū-jiân pí lâng khah tsē.
中文: 他人高馬大，力氣十足，扛的貨自然比別人還多。
英文: He is tall and strong, with plenty of strength, so he naturally carries more goods than others.

台文: 拜託伊做代誌，伊攏做甲真入心。
台羅: Pài-thok i tsò tāi-tsì, i lóng tsò kah tsin ji̍p-sim.
中文: 拜託他做事，他都做得很用心。
英文: Please ask him to do something, he always does it with great care.

中文: 疼惜人家，就要真心疼愛。
英文: If you cherish someone, you must truly love them.

台文: 教示的話伊攏會記入心。
台羅: Kà-sī ê uē i lóng ē kì ji̍p-sim.
中文: 訓示的話他都聽得進去。
英文: He can take in all the words of instruction.

台文: 攑刀的時愛攑刀柄，毋通去捎刀鋩。
台羅: Gia̍h to ê sî ài gia̍h to-pènn, m̄-thang khì sa to-mê.
中文: 拿刀的時候要拿刀柄，不要拿刀刃。
英文: When holding a knife, hold the handle, not the blade.

台文: 伊力草真飽，工課做規工嘛袂忝。
台羅: I la̍t-tsháu tsin pá, khang-khuè tsò kui-kang mā bē thiám.
中文: 他精體力充沛，工作一整天也不累。
英文: He is energetic and full of strength, and can work all day without getting tired.

台文: 彼箍行路使三角六肩，袂輸𨑨迌人。
台羅: Hit khoo kiânn-lōo sái sann-kak-la̍k-king, bē-su tshit-thô-lâng.
中文: 那傢伙走路大搖大擺的，就像黑道中人。
英文: That guy walks swaggeringly, just like a gangster.

台文: 報名到昨昏是上尾工，今仔日才欲報就袂赴矣。
台羅: Pò-miâ kàu tsa-hng sī siōng-bué kang, kin-á-ji̍t tsiah beh pò tō bē-hù--ah.
中文: 報名到昨天是最後一天，今天才要報名就來不及了。
英文: Yesterday was the last day to sign up, if you try to sign up today it will be too late.
last place

台文: 這个囡仔誠袂上教，較教都教袂曉。
台羅: Tsit ê gín-á tsiânn bē tsiūnn-kà, khah kà to kà bē-hiáu.
中文: 這個孩子很不受教，怎麼教都教不會。
英文: This child is very difficult to teach, no matter how you teach, they cannot learn.

台文: 這尾魚仔上無有三斤重。
台羅: Tsit bué hî-á siōng-bô ū sann kin tāng.
英文: This fish weighs at least three catties.

台文: 我轉來欲攢下晝頓，行入灶跤就看著大漢查某囝當咧煮矣。
台羅: Guá tńg-lâi beh tshuân ē-tàu-tǹg, kiânn-ji̍p tsàu-kha tō khuànn-tio̍h tuā-hàn tsa-bóo-kiánn tng-teh tsú--ah.
中文: 我回來要做午飯，走進廚房就看到大女兒正在煮了。
英文: I came back to make lunch and as soon as I walked into the kitchen, I saw my eldest daughter cooking.
Many years of wish

台文: 這久年症頭矣，著愛耐心治療，沓沓仔調養，才會見效。
台羅: Tse kú-nî tsìng-thâu--ah, tio̍h-ài nāi-sim tī-liâu, ta̍uh-ta̍uh-á tiâu-ióng, tsiah ē kiàn-hāu.
中文: 這是老毛病了，得要耐心治療，慢慢調養，才會見效。
英文: This is an old problem. It requires patience to treat and slowly recuperate before it will be effective.

台文: 大人大種矣，著較會曉想咧，毋通閣予序大人操煩。
台羅: Tuā-lâng-tuā-tsíng--ah, tio̍h khah ē-hiáu siūnn--leh, m̄-thang koh hōo sī-tuā-lâng tshau-huân.
中文: 老大不小了，想法得要成熟一點，不要再讓父母操心。
英文: The boss is not young anymore, thoughts need to be more mature, don't let parents worry anymore.

台文: 大人大種矣，磕袂著就起跤動手，有夠卸世眾。
台羅: Tuā-lâng-tuā-tsíng--ah, kha̍p-bē-tio̍h tō khí-kha-tāng-tshiú, ū-kàu sià-sì-tsìng.
中文: 都是大人了，動不動就拳腳相向，非常丟人現眼。
英文: All adults, but always resorting to violence, very embarrassing.

台文: 風颱過了後，欲去抾大水柴著愛遵守法規。
台羅: Hong-thai kuè liáu-āu, beh khì khioh tuā-tsuí-tshâ tio̍h-ài tsun-siú huat-kui.
中文: 颱風過後，要去撿漂流木得要遵守法規。
英文: After the typhoon, if you want to go collect driftwood, you must follow the regulations.
Lunar December, mustard greens are abundant.

台文: 果子大出的時上好食，價數閣俗。
台羅: Kué-tsí tuā-tshut ê sî siōng hó-tsia̍h, kè-siàu koh sio̍k.
中文: 水果類盛產時最好吃，價格又便宜。
英文: When fruits are in season, they are the best to eat and also cheap in price.

台文: 伊逐改送禮，攏是大出手，毋是大鮑魚就是高麗參。
台羅: I ta̍k-kái sàng-lé, lóng sī tuā-tshut-tshiú, m̄ sī tuā pau-hî tō sī ko-lê-sim.
中文: 他每次送禮，總是出手大方，不是大鮑魚就是人參。
英文: Every time he gives gifts, he is always generous, either abalone or ginseng.

台文: 我感覺做人毋通傷大目孔。
台羅: Guá kám-kak tsò-lâng m̄-thang siunn tuā-ba̍k-khóng.
中文: 我覺得做人不要太勢利眼。
英文: I think one should not be too superficial in life.

台文: 你有夠大目孔，兩个人食飯買遮濟菜。
台羅: Lí ū-kàu tuā-ba̍k-khóng, nn̄g ê lâng tsia̍h-pn̄g bé tsiah tsē tshài.
中文: 你有夠貪多，才兩個人吃飯買這麼多菜。
英文: You are too greedy. Only two people are eating and you bought so many dishes.
Big money, big wads of cash.
Burn a lot of gold and silver paper.

中文: 俗語，為了賺大錢，導致人面黃肌瘦。
英文: Saying, in order to make big money, leads to a yellow and skinny face.
Da Chao or Large banknote

台文: 𪜶兜是大家口，三頓煮食攏用大灶。
台羅: In tau sī tuā-ke-kháu, sann tǹg tsú-tsia̍h lóng īng tuā-tsàu.
中文: 他家是個大家庭，三餐的烹調都用大灶。
英文: His family is a big one, and they use a big stove for cooking all three meals.

台文: 你大身大命，出入行踏愛細膩喔！
台羅: Lí tuā-sin-tuā-miā, tshut-ji̍p kiânn-ta̍h ài sè-jī--ooh!
中文: 你身懷六甲，出入走路行動要小心喔！
英文: You are pregnant, so be careful when you move around!

台文: 看著𪜶有身的新婦佇咧摒掃，阿婆就會喝講：「大身大命喔！我來就好。」
台羅: Khuànn-tio̍h in ū-sin ê sin-pū tī-leh piànn-sàu, a-pô tō ē huah kóng, “Tuā-sin-tuā-miā--ooh! Guá lâi tō hó.”
中文: 看到他懷孕的媳婦在打掃，阿婆就會說：「一身二命喔！我來就好。」
英文: Seeing his pregnant daughter-in-law cleaning, the old lady would say, 'You have two lives in your body! I'll do it.'

台文: 做彼款生理，毋是趁大錢，就是了大注。
台羅: Tsò hit khuán sing-lí, m̄ sī thàn-tuā-tsînn, tō sī liáu tuā-tù.
中文: 做那種生意，不是賺大錢，就是賠大錢。
英文: Doing that kind of business, either you make big money or lose big money.

台文: 看兩个大肥相偃，實在真古錐，尻川䫌予人看現現。
台羅: Khuànn nn̄g ê tuā-puî sio-ián, si̍t-tsāi tsin kóo-tsui, kha-tshng-phué hōo lâng khuànn-hiān-hiān.
中文: 看兩個肥胖的人在相撲，實在很可愛，屁股肉讓人看得一清二楚。
英文: Watching two obese people in sumo wrestling is really cute. Their buttocks are clearly visible.

台文: 以前的人對屎礐仔舀屎尿起來，囥予伊發酵過，變做大肥，就聽好沃菜。
台羅: Í-tsîng ê lâng tuì sái-ha̍k-á iúnn sái-jiō khí--lâi, khǹg hōo i huat-kànn--kuè, piàn-tsò tuā-puî, tō thìng-hó ak-tshài.
中文: 以前的人從糞坑舀屎糞上來，放著讓它發酵後，成為糞肥，就可以澆菜。
英文: In the past, people used to scoop feces from the pit, let it ferment, and turn into manure, which could be used to water vegetables.

台文: 我這陣拄好無散票，大張的予你找敢好？
台羅: Guá tsit-tsūn tú-hó bô suánn-phiò, tuā-tiunn--ê hōo lí tsāu kám hó?
中文: 我這會兒剛好沒有小鈔，大鈔讓你找錢好嗎？
英文: I don't have any small bills right now. Is it okay if you give me big bills and I'll find change?

台文: 咱明仔早起招恁大細腎來去𬦰山。
台羅: Lán bîn-á-tsá-khí tsio lín tuā-sè-siān lâi-khì peh-suann.
中文: 我們明天早上邀你連襟一起去爬山。
英文: We invite you to go mountain climbing with your brother-in-law tomorrow morning.

台文: 伊是大漢囝，愛照顧小弟、小妹。
台羅: I sī tuā-hàn-kiánn, ài tsiàu-kòo sió-tī, sió-muē.
中文: 他是長子，得要照顧弟弟、妹妹。
英文: He is the eldest son and has to take care of his younger brother and sister.

台文: 你開毋著向矣啦！緊大翻頭斡倒轉來。
台羅: Lí khui m̄-tio̍h hiòng--ah--lah! Kín tuā-huan-thâu uat tò-tńg--lâi.
中文: 你開錯方向了，趕快大回轉開回頭來。
英文: You have gone the wrong way, quickly turn around and head back.

台文: 頭前地場較闊，你車開去遐大翻頭，按呢較好轉踅。
台羅: Thâu-tsîng tē-tiûnn khah khuah, lí tshia khui-khì hia tuā-huan-thâu, án-ne khah hó tńg-se̍h.
中文: 前面場地較寬敞，你車子開去那邊大回轉，這樣比較方便轉回頭。
英文: In front of the venue is spacious, drive your car over there for a big turn, it's more convenient to turn around.

台文: 囡仔咧睏晝，你毋通遐爾大嚨喉空。
台羅: Gín-á teh khùn-tàu, lí m̄-thang hiah-nī tuā-nâ-âu-khang.
中文: 孩子在睡午覺，你別那麼大嗓門。
英文: The child is taking a nap, don't speak so loudly.

台文: 伊是咱遮出名的大嚨喉空，遠遠就會當聽著伊講話的聲矣。
台羅: I sī lán tsia tshut-miâ ê tuā-nâ-âu-khang, hn̄g-hn̄g tō ē-tàng thiann-tio̍h i kóng-uē ê siann--ah.
中文: 他是我們這裡出了名的大嗓門，遠遠地就可以聽到他的聲音了。
英文: He is well-known for his loud voice around here. You can hear his voice from far away.

台文: 伊的成績佇𪜶彼班干焦算中中仔爾爾。
台羅: I ê sîng-tsik tī in hit pan kan-na sǹg tiong-tiong--á niā-niā.
中文: 他的成績在班上只能算中等而已。
英文: His grades in the class can only be considered average.

台文: 阿爸的身材中範中範，看起來袂肥嘛無偌瘦。
台羅: A-pah ê sin-tsâi tiong-pān-tiong-pān, khuànn--khí-lâi bē puî mā bô guā sán.
中文: 父親的身材中等，看起來不肥也不太瘦。
英文: Father's build is average, he doesn't look fat or too thin.

台文: 作穡人共採收了的荷蘭豆分做三級：䆀的、中範的、媠的。
台羅: Tsoh-sit-lâng kā tshái-siu liáu ê huê-liân-tāu hun-tsò sann kip, bái--ê, tiong-pān--ê, suí--ê.
中文: 農人將採收完的豌豆分成三級：品相不佳的、中等的、優良的。
英文: Farmers divide the harvested peas into three grades: poor quality, medium quality, and excellent quality.

台文: 教囡仔行五子直，會當提升𪜶的智力。
台羅: Kà gín-á kiânn gōo-jí-ti̍t, ē-tàng thê-sing in ê tì-li̍k.
中文: 教孩子下五子棋，可以提升他們的智力。
英文: Teaching children to play Five-in-a-Row can enhance their intelligence.

台文: 這擔的炒塗豆，逐粒都仁仁仁。
台羅: Tsit tànn ê tshá thôo-tāu, ta̍k lia̍p to jîn-jîn-jîn.
中文: 這一攤的炒花生，每一顆都非常飽滿。
英文: The fried peanuts at this stall are all very plump.

台文: 伊有咧練走標，跤肚肉仁仁仁。
台羅: I ū teh liān tsáu-pio, kha-tóo-bah jîn-jîn-jîn.
中文: 他有在練跑步，小腿肚的肌肉非常結實。
英文: He has been practicing running, and the muscles in his calves are very strong.

台文: 這本諺語集所收的臺灣話，逐句都仁仁仁。
台羅: Tsit pún gān-gí-tsi̍p sóo siu ê Tâi-uân-uē, ta̍k kù to jîn-jîn-jîn.
中文: 這本諺語集所收的臺灣話，每一句都是精挑細選的。
英文: The Taiwanese sayings collected in this book are carefully selected, every sentence is chosen with great care.

台文: 粗糠還粗糠，冇粟還冇粟。
台羅: Tshoo-khng huān tshoo-khng, phànn-tshik huān phànn-tshik.
中文: 稻穀的外殼歸稻穀的外殼，糠秕歸糠秕，不能混在一起。俗語，比喻兩類事物不可混為一談。
英文: The outer shell of rice belongs to the outer shell of rice, and the bran belongs to the bran. They cannot be mixed together. This is a common saying that means two different things should not be discussed together.

中文: 糠秕收進好的籮筐裡。俗語，比喻無能者佔據好職位。
英文: Chaff is collected in a good basket.

中文: 俗語，比喻傳染病流行時，體弱的人容易被感染。
英文: Saying, metaphorically speaking, when an infectious disease is spreading, people with weak bodies are more susceptible to infection.

台文: 伊進前都已經認罪矣，這馬煞來反口供。
台羅: I tsìn-tsîng to í-king jīn-tsuē--ah, tsit-má suah lâi huán-kháu-king.
中文: 他之前都已經認罪了，現在卻來翻供。
英文: He had already pleaded guilty before, but now he is retracting his confession.

台文: 塗面快收成，人面快反形。
台羅: Thôo-bīn khuài siu-sîng, lâng-bīn khuài huán-hîng.
中文: 在土地耕種容易收成；看人的臉色，容易遭人背棄。俗語，努力耕耘，才有收穫；看人臉色，不易過活。
英文: It is easy to harvest when cultivating the land; it is easy to be abandoned by others when judging their facial expressions. As the saying goes, one must work hard to reap the harvest; it is not easy to live by judging others' facial expressions.

台文: 伊最近咧反形，加真荏懶。
台羅: I tsuè-kīn teh huán-hîng, ke tsin lám-nuā.
中文: 他最近一反常態，變得很懶惰。
英文: He has recently been acting out of character and has become very lazy.

中文: 茄子一般都開紫色的花，開黃花的就是變種。歇後語，形容違反常態。
英文: Eggplants usually have purple flowers, and those with yellow flowers are mutants. A pun that describes a deviation from the norm.

台文: 這馬的臺灣囡仔袂曉講母語，毋是𪜶反種去矣，是𪜶的爸母毋肯對𪜶講母語。
台羅: Tsit-má ê Tâi-uân gín-á bē-hiáu kóng bú-gí, m̄ sī in huán-tsíng--khì--ah, sī in ê pē-bú m̄ khíng tuì in kóng bú-gí.
中文: 現在臺灣的小孩子不會說母語，不是他們發生了突變，而是他們的父母不肯對他們說母語。
英文: Now Taiwanese children do not speak their mother tongue, not because they have undergone mutation, but because their parents refuse to speak their mother tongue to them.
Mixed-race people are smarter.

台文: 拄著困難，若袂曉反變，就踅袂過。
台羅: Tú-tio̍h khùn-lân, nā bē-hiáu píng-pìnn, tō se̍h bē kuè.
中文: 碰到困難，如果不會應變，就轉圜不過來。
英文: When encountering difficulties, if one cannot adapt, they will not be able to turn things around.

中文: 近來制度經常進行重大的改變。
英文: Recently, there have been significant changes in the system.

台文: 欠錢還數是天公地道的代誌。
台羅: Khiàm tsînn hîng siàu sī thinn-kong-tē-tō ê tāi-tsì.
中文: 欠債還錢是天經地義的事情。
英文: Repaying debts is a matter of course.

台文: 初九天公生，咱做伙求天公伯仔保庇咱一家口仔平安順序。
台羅: Tshe-káu Thinn-kong-senn, lán tsò-hué kiû Thinn-kong-peh--á pó-pì lán tsi̍t-ke-kháu-á pîng-an sūn-sī.
中文: 初九天老爺老天爺誕辰公生，我們一起求老天爺保佑一家大小平安順利。
英文: On the ninth day of the first lunar month, we pray together for the blessings of the heavens for the safety and smoothness of our whole family.

中文: 天庭飽滿，是相學上的多福之相。
英文: Tian Ting is full, which is a sign of great fortune in Xiang Xue.

台文: 少年人愛較拍拚咧，才袂食老毋成樣。
台羅: Siàu-liân-lâng ài khah phah-piànn--leh, tsiah bē tsia̍h-lāu m̄-tsiânn-iūnn.
中文: 年輕人得要努力一點，年老時才不會不成個樣子。
英文: Young people need to work a little harder so that they won't become a mess when they are old.

台文: 老師共我講：「你猶少歲，日子猶誠長，前途著拍算一下。」
台羅: Lāu-su kā guá kóng, “Lí iáu tsió-huè, ji̍t-tsí iáu tsiânn tn̂g, tsiân-tôo tio̍h phah-sǹg--tsi̍t-ē.”
中文: 老師跟我說：「你還年輕，日子還很長，該為前途打算一下。」
英文: The teacher told me, 'You are still young, and there is still a long way to go. You should plan for your future.'

台文: 學工夫，若有人引𤆬，較緊學上手。
台羅: O̍h kang-hu, nā ū lâng ín-tshuā, khah kín o̍h tsiūnn-tshiú.
中文: 學習技藝，如果有人引導，比較快熟練。
英文: Learning skills, if someone guides, will become more proficient quickly.

台文: 伊心狂火熱，趕欲赴銀行三點半。
台羅: I sim-kông-hué-jia̍t, kuánn beh hù gîn-hâng sann tiám puànn.
中文: 他心急如焚，要趕銀行三點半。
英文: He was in a hurry to catch the bank at three thirty.

台文: 伊簽六合彩，痟甲心狂火熱。
台羅: I tshiam lio̍k-ha̍p-tshái, siáu kah sim-kông-hué-jia̍t.
中文: 他簽賭六合彩，瘋狂到不能自已。
英文: He bet on the Mark Six lottery and went crazy beyond control.

台文: 伊聽甲心花開，隨就笑咍咍。
台羅: I thiann kah sim-hue-khui, suî tō tshiò-hai-hai.
中文: 他聽得心花怒放，馬上就哈哈笑。
英文: He was so happy that his heart blossomed, and he burst out laughing immediately.

台文: 頭家今仔日心花開，講年底獎金欲發三個月。
台羅: Thâu-ke kin-á-ji̍t sim-hue-khui, kóng nî-té tsióng-kim beh huat sann kò gue̍h.
中文: 老闆今天心情大好，說年終獎金要發三個月份。
英文: The boss is in a great mood today and said that the year-end bonus will be three months' worth.

台文: 伊拄失戀，逐工攏心慒慒。
台羅: I tú sit-luân, ta̍k-kang lóng sim tso-tso.
中文: 他剛失戀，每天都心煩意亂鬱鬱寡歡。
英文: He just broke up and is upset every day, feeling depressed and unhappy.

台文: 這个人手爪賤，咱物件愛較斟酌咧。
台羅: Tsit ê lâng tshiú-jiáu-tsiān, lán mi̍h-kiānn ài khah tsim-tsiok--leh.
中文: 這個人手腳不乾淨，我們東西要多加注意。
英文: This person's hands and feet are not clean, we need to be more careful with our things.

台文: 伊的手股頭有刺字，穿吊䘥仔就看現現。
台羅: I ê tshiú-kóo-thâu ū tshiah-jī, tshīng tiàu-kah-á tō khuànn-hiān-hiān.
中文: 他的上手臂有刺青，穿無袖內衣就看得清清楚楚。
英文: His upper arm has a tattoo, which is clearly visible when he wears a sleeveless undershirt.

台文: 伊用手後曲共我㧎撞一下，暗示我伊欲先離開一下。
台羅: I īng tshiú-āu-khiau kā guá khê tōng--tsi̍t-ē, àm-sī guá i beh sing lī-khui--tsi̍t-ē.
中文: 他用手肘碰我一下，暗示我他要先離開一下。
英文: He nudged me with his elbow, indicating that he wanted to leave first.
worker.

台文: 阮出外人手面趁食，逐日著做粗工來度三頓。
台羅: Guán tshut-guā-lâng tshiú-bīn-thàn-tsia̍h, ta̍k-ji̍t tio̍h tsò tshoo-kang lâi tōo sann tǹg.
中文: 我們出外人靠勞力賺錢，每天得要幹粗活來糊口。
英文: We rely on manual labor to earn money when we go out, and we have to do hard work every day to make a living.

台文: 咱是手面趁食的，哪有彼號冗剩錢通出國觀光？
台羅: Lán sī tshiú-bīn-thàn-tsia̍h--ê, ná ū hit lō liōng-siōng tsînn thang tshut-kok kuan-kong?
中文: 咱們是微薄收入僅夠糊口，哪有那種閒錢出國觀光呢？
英文: We have a meager income just enough to make ends meet, how can we afford the luxury of traveling abroad?

台文: 看展覽的時，千萬莫手賤去摸展覽品。
台羅: Khuànn tián-lám ê sî, tshian-bān mài tshiú-tsiān khì bong tián-lám-phín.
中文: 看展覽時，千萬別手癢去摸展覽品。
英文: When viewing an exhibition, be sure not to get itchy hands and touch the exhibits.

台文: 伊講白賊，予𪜶老爸拍手蹄仔。
台羅: I kóng-pe̍h-tsha̍t, hōo in lāu-pē phah tshiú-tê-á.
中文: 他說謊，被他爸爸打手心。
英文: He lied and got his palms beaten by his father.

中文: 他管不住手腳就愛摸東摸西。有時也指他有順手牽羊的惡癖。
英文: He can't control his hands and feet and loves to touch things here and there. Sometimes it also refers to his habit of stealing.

台文: 相命仙共伊看手相講：「手縫櫳，財產空，隨趁隨空空。」
台羅: Siòng-miā-sian kā i khuànn tshiú-siòng kóng, “Tshiú-phāng lang, tsâi-sán khang, suî thàn suî khang-khang.”
中文: 算命先生看了他的手相後說：「手指間縫隙大，財產空，馬上賺馬上空。」
英文: After reading his palm, the fortune teller said, 'With wide gaps between your fingers, your wealth will be empty, earning and losing immediately.'

中文: 月暈出現，烈日會曝曬草坪，必有大旱。這是傳統俗諺，不是科學事實。
英文: The appearance of a halo around the moon indicates that there will be a drought when the sun shines fiercely on the lawn. This is a traditional folk proverb, not a scientific fact.

台文: 真濟人相信烏鴉咧吼表示歹吉兆。
台羅: Tsin tsē lâng siong-sìn oo-a teh háu piáu-sī pháinn-kiat-tiāu.
中文: 很多人相信烏鴉在啼叫表示凶兆。
英文: Many people believe that crows cawing is a bad omen.

台文: 透早就聽著遮爾歹吉兆的話，實在有夠衰。
台羅: Thàu-tsá tō thiann-tio̍h tsiah-nī pháinn-kiat-tiāu ê uē, si̍t-tsāi ū-kàu sue.
中文: 一大早就聽到這麼不吉利的話，實在很倒楣。
英文: Early in the morning, hearing such an unlucky remark is really unfortunate.

台文: 醫生檢查出伊腹肚內有生歹物仔。
台羅: I-sing kiám-tsa-tshut i pak-tóo-lāi ū senn pháinn-mih-á.
中文: 醫生檢查出他肚子裡長了惡性腫瘤。
英文: The doctor found a malignant tumor in his stomach.

台文: 伊無因為我生做較歹看面就棄嫌我。
台羅: I bô in-uī guá senn-tsò khah pháinn-khuànn-bīn tō khì-hiâm--guá.
中文: 他不因為我長得較難看就嫌棄我。
英文: He doesn't dislike me just because I'm not good-looking.

台文: 人講「輸人毋輸陣，輸陣歹看面」，咱著愛較拍拚咧。
台羅: Lâng kóng “su lâng m̄ su tīn, su tīn pháinn-khuànn-bīn”, lán tio̍h-ài khah phah-piànn--leh.
中文: 人家俗話說「輸給某人無所謂，別排在最後，在最後一名就太難看了」，我們就得要努力點。
英文: People say, "It doesn't matter if you lose to someone, just don't be the last, being the last is too embarrassing," so we have to work harder.
Getting angry, turning hostile.
Facing each other with angry expressions.

中文: 面相雖不友善卻容易達成買賣。面惡心善，熟語。比喻外貌不和善卻很好相處。
英文: the person may not look friendly, but they are actually easy to get along with.
The situation of the lawsuit is gradually becoming less optimistic.

台文: 人情留一線，日後才袂歹面相看。
台羅: Jîn-tsîng lâu tsi̍t suànn, ji̍t-āu tsiah bē pháinn-bīn-sio-khuànn.
中文: 人情留一線，改天才不會惡臉相向。
英文: Leave a line of kindness, and someday you won't face an angry face.

台文: 𪜶兩个門扇枋鬥袂峇，見擺見面攏歹面相看。
台羅: In nn̄g ê mn̂g-sìnn-pang tàu bē bā, kiàn-pái kìnn-bīn lóng pháinn-bīn-sio-khuànn.
中文: 他們倆個性不合，每次見面都惡臉相向。
英文: They both have incompatible personalities and scowl at each other every time they meet.

中文: 棉紗浸到水就很難紡織。
英文: When cotton yarn is soaked in water, it becomes difficult to spin.
The situation is becoming more and more tricky.

台文: 作穡人生活無好過，豐收的時農產品歹價，歹年冬閣收無通食。
台羅: Tsoh-sit-lâng sing-ua̍h bô hó kuè, hong-siu ê sî lông-sán-phín pháinn-kè, pháinn-nî-tang koh siu bô thang tsia̍h.
中文: 農民生活不好過，豐收時農產品賤價，欠收時又入不敷出。
英文: Farmers have a difficult life. When there is a good harvest, agricultural products are cheap, but when there is a poor harvest, they cannot make ends meet.

台文: 這个囡仔歹喙斗，真揀食，飼甲強欲變毋成囡仔。
台羅: Tsit ê gín-á pháinn-tshuì-táu, tsin kíng-tsia̍h, tshī kah kiōng-beh piàn m̄-tsiânn-gín-á.
中文: 這個小孩胃口不好，很挑食，養得快要變成發育不良的小孩了。
英文: This child has a poor appetite, is very picky with food, and is on the verge of becoming a malnourished child.

台文: 你這个毋成囡仔，食飽取跋筊，枉費恁爸母共你晟養甲遮大漢。
台羅: Lí tsit ê m̄-tsiânn-gín-á, tsia̍h-pá tshú pua̍h-kiáu, óng-huì lín pē-bú kā lí tshiânn-ióng kah tsiah tuā-hàn.
中文: 你這個小混混，吃飽只會賭博，枉費你父母把你養育得這麼大。
英文: You little rascal, all you do is gamble after having a full meal. Your parents raised you for nothing.

台文: 公證人看水尺來計算貨船的載貨量。
台羅: Kong-tsìng-jîn khuànn tsuí-tshioh lâi kè-sǹg huè-tsûn ê tsài-huè-liōng.
中文: 公證人看水尺來計算貨船的載貨量。
英文: The notary public calculates the cargo capacity of the cargo ship by looking at the water gauge.
ripples appeared.

台文: 這馬咱攏無咧納水租矣，攏嘛政府替咱納的。
台羅: Tsit-má lán lóng bô teh la̍p tsuí-tsoo--ah, lóng mā tsìng-hú thè lán la̍p--ê.
中文: 現在我們都不用繳水利會費，都是政府代繳的。
英文: Now we don't have to pay the water conservancy association fees, they are all paid by the government.

中文: 繳納水利會費。也用來戲稱在外時去公廁或借用人家的廁所小便
英文: Pay the water conservancy association fee. It is also used to jokingly refer to going to a public restroom or borrowing someone else's restroom to urinate while outside.

台文: 咱兄弟姊妹就像仝一條水脈流出來的啦。
台羅: Lán hiann-tī-tsí-muē tō tshiūnn kāng tsi̍t tiâu tsuí-me̍h lâu--tshut-lâi--ê--lah.
中文: 我們兄弟姊妹就像同一條水系流出來的一樣。
英文: We siblings are like water flowing out of the same system.

中文: 稻穀用水碓碾過，變成白米，不會留下糙米。俗語，比喻做事精密的人不會疏忽。
英文: The text translates to: Rice is produced by using water to pound and grind grains, resulting in white rice without leaving any brown rice. This proverb is used to describe a person who is meticulous and does not make mistakes in their work.

台文: 水牛上愛佇水窟仔滒浴。
台羅: Tsuí-gû siōng ài tī tsuí-khut-á kō-i̍k.
中文: 水牛最愛在水坑裡打滾洗澡。
英文: Water buffaloes love to roll and bathe in puddles of water.

台文: 車囥佇外口，落雨了後煞卡一沿水鉎。
台羅: Tshia khǹg tī guā-kháu, lo̍h-hōo liáu-āu suah kha̍h tsi̍t iân tsuí-sian.
中文: 車子放外面，下雨之後卻卡積了一層水垢。
英文: The car was left outside, and after the rain, a layer of dirt accumulated on it.
The fire is about to go out.

台文: 等咧咱佇火車頭的前驛相等，做伙坐後一幫火車上北。
台羅: Tán--leh lán tī hué-tshia-thâu ê tsîng-ia̍h sio-tán, tsò-hué tsē āu tsi̍t pang hué-tshia tsiūnn-pak.
中文: 等一下我們在火車站的前站見，一起坐下一班火車北上。
