英文: Friend introducing a job to you is of course good, but if you want to make progress in the company, you also need to study seriously and work hard. As they say, 'The master leads you in, but the practice is up to the individual.'

台文: 俗語講：「惡馬惡人騎。」你人遮古意，當然嘛無伊法，愛揣一个比伊較惡的人來治伊啦。
台羅: Sio̍k-gí kóng, “Ok bé ok lâng khiâ.” Lí lâng tsiah kóo-ì, tong-jiân mā bô i huat, ài tshuē tsi̍t ê pí i khah ok ê lâng lâi tī--i--lah.
中文: 俗語說：「惡馬惡人騎。」你這麼老實，當然拿他沒辦法，要找一個比他更兇惡的人來治他。
英文: Saying goes, 'A bad horse is ridden by a bad person.' You are so honest, of course you can't deal with him. You need to find someone more vicious than him to control him.

台文: 彼个囡仔足愛欺負比伊較細漢的人，這改拄著比伊較大漢的就覕鬚，乖乖仔予人創治，真正是「惡馬惡人騎」。
台羅: Hit ê gín-á tsiok ài khi-hū pí i khah sè-hàn ê lâng, tsit kái tú-tio̍h pí i khah tuā-hàn--ê tō bih-tshiu, kuai-kuai-á hōo lâng tshòng-tī, tsin-tsiànn sī “ok bé ok lâng khiâ”.
中文: 那個孩子很愛欺負個子比他小的人，這次遇到個子比他大的，就乖乖讓人戲弄，真是「惡馬惡人騎」。
英文: That child loves to bully people smaller than him, but this time he encountered someone bigger and obediently let them tease him. It's truly "a wicked horse lets a wicked person ride it".

台文: 表姊目頭懸，揣對象揀東揀西、揀碗揀箸，啥人知影經過幾若年煞「揀啊揀，揀著一个賣龍眼」。
台羅: Piáu-tsí ba̍k-thâu kuân, tshuē tuì-siōng kíng-tang-kíng-sai, kíng-uánn-kíng-tī, siánn-lâng tsai-iánn king-kuè kuí-nā nî suah “kíng--ah kíng, kíng-tio̍h tsi̍t ê bē lîng-gíng”.
中文: 表姊眼光高，找對象挑三揀四、東挑西揀，誰知道經過好幾年卻「挑來選去，最後選了個不怎樣的人」。
英文: Cousin has high standards, being picky when choosing a partner, who would have known that after several years, they would end up "picking and choosing, and finally choosing someone who is not that great".

台文: 你莫叫是講你做的遐的失德代無人知，俗語講：「攑頭三尺有神明。」你緊縒慢會得著報應。
台羅: Lí mài kiò-sī kóng lí tsò ê hia-ê sit-tik tāi bô lâng tsai, sio̍k-gí kóng: “Gia̍h-thâu sann tshioh ū sîn-bîng.” Lí kín-tsua̍h-bān ē  tit-tio̍h pò-ìng.
中文: 你別以為你做的那些虧心事沒人知道，俗話說：「舉頭三尺有神明。」你遲早會得到報應。
英文: Don't think that no one knows about the guilty things you've done. As the saying goes, 'There is a god three feet above your head.' You will eventually get what you deserve.

台文: 這件代誌若甲蹽落去矣，就莫閣觀前顧後，「敢做匏桸，就毋通驚水燙」，敢毋是咧？
台羅: Tsit kiānn tāi-tsì nā-kah liâu--lo̍h-khì--ah, tō mài koh kuan-tsiân kòo-āu, “kánn tsò pû-hia, tō m̄-thang kiann tsuí thǹg”, kám m̄ sī--leh?
中文: 這件事既然不顧一切投身其中，就不要瞻前顧後，「敢做瓠瓜勺子，就不能怕被滾水燙」，不是嗎？
英文: Since you have thrown yourself into this matter without any regard, don't hesitate and be afraid, 'If you dare to be a gourd ladle, you can't be afraid of scalding water', right?

台文: 古早人講：「棚頂做甲流汗，棚跤嫌甲流瀾。」橫直做代誌總是袂中眾人意，欲做就認真做，毋免驚人批評。
台羅: Kóo-tsá-lâng kóng, “Pênn-tíng tsò kah lâu-kuānn, pênn-kha hiâm kah lâu-nuā.” Huâinn-ti̍t tsò tāi-tsì tsóng-sī bē tìng tsìng-lâng ì, beh tsò tō jīn-tsin tsò, m̄-bián kiann lâng phue-phîng.
中文: 以前的人說：「戲台上的演員演得汗流浹背，戲台下的觀眾批評得口沫橫飛。」反正做事總是不能符合眾人的意思，想做就認真做，不用怕別人批評。
英文: In the past, people said, 'Actors on stage sweat profusely, while the audience below criticizes with flying spittle.' Anyway, one can never satisfy everyone's expectations. If you want to do something, do it seriously and don't be afraid of criticism.

台文: 班長共咱服務，逐家毋但無感謝伊，閣共伊嫌甲無一塊仔好，誠實「棚頂做甲流汗，棚跤嫌甲流瀾」。
台羅: Pan-tiúnn kā lán ho̍k-bū, ta̍k-ke m̄-nā bô kám-siā--i, koh kā i hiâm kah bô tsi̍t-tè-á hó, tsiânn-si̍t “pênn-tíng tsò kah lâu-kuānn, pênn-kha hiâm kah lâu-nuā”.
中文: 班長為我們服務，大家不但不感謝他，還把他批評得體無完膚，真的是「戲台上的演員演得汗流浹背，戲台下的觀眾批評得口沫橫飛」。
英文: The class monitor serves us, but not only do we not thank him, we also criticize him mercilessly, truly "like actors sweating profusely on stage, while the audience below spews criticism."

台文: 伊做人誠慷慨，年冬月節攏會去送禮，收著物件的朋友若共推辭，伊攏會講「無三不成禮」，後回嘛閣繼續送。
台羅: I tsò-lâng tsiânn khóng-khài, nî-tang-gue̍h-tseh lóng ē khì sàng lé, siu-tio̍h mi̍h-kiānn ê pîng-iú nā kā the-sî, i lóng ē kóng “bû sam put sîng lé”, āu huê mā koh kè-sio̍k sàng.
中文: 他做人非常慷慨，遇到過年過節都會送禮物給朋友，收到禮物的朋友要是婉謝，他都會說「無三不成禮」，下回還是繼續送。
英文: He is very generous in his dealings with people. Whenever there is a holiday, he will give gifts to his friends. If his friends try to decline the gifts politely, he will say, 'It's impolite to refuse three times,' and continue to give gifts next time.

台文: 「無日毋知晝，無鬚毋知老」，少年時的理想攏猶未實現，目一下𥍉咱都半老老矣。
台羅: “Bô ji̍t m̄ tsai tàu, bô tshiu m̄ tsai lāu”, siàu-liân sî ê lí-sióng lóng iáu-buē si̍t-hiān, ba̍k tsi̍t-ē nih lán to pùann-ló-lāu--ah.
中文: 「沒出太陽，不知已過了中午；沒留鬍子，不知人已老邁」，年輕時的理想依然沒有實現，眨眼間我們都已老年將至了。
英文: Without the sun, I didn't realize it was already past noon; without a beard, I didn't realize I had grown old. The ideals of my youth still remain unfulfilled, and in the blink of an eye, we are all approaching old age.

台文: 阿華明其都腹內無膏，硬死欲佇眾人面前吟詩，吟甲毋成聲調，予人笑講「無毛雞假大格」。
台羅: A-huâ bîng-kî to pak-lāi bô ko, ngē sí beh tī tsìng-lâng bīn-tsîng gîm-si, gîm kah m̄-tsiânn siann-tiāu, hōo lâng tshiò kóng “bô môo ke ké tuā-keh”.
中文: 阿華明明就沒什麼學問，硬是要在眾人面前吟詩，吟得荒腔走板，被人家嘲笑「無毛雞假裝體格高大」。
英文: Ahua clearly has no knowledge, but insists on reciting poetry in front of everyone. His recitation is off-key and he is mocked as a "featherless chicken pretending to be tall and strong."

台文: 早起本來欲騎機車去買菜，想袂到機車煞袂發，臨時「無牛駛馬」，換騎跤踏車去。
台羅: Tsá-khí pún-lâi beh khiâ ki-tshia khì bé tshài, siūnn-bē-kàu ki-tshia suah bē huat, lîm-sî “bô gû sái bé”, uānn khiâ kha-ta̍h-tshia khì.
中文: 早上本來想騎機車去買菜，想不到機車竟然發不動，臨時「退而求其次」，換騎腳踏車去。
英文: In the morning, I originally wanted to ride a motorcycle to buy groceries, but unexpectedly the motorcycle wouldn't start. So, I had to "settle for second best" and ride a bicycle instead.

台文: 老爸老母攏過身去的阿木，是一个欲食毋討趁的貧惰骨，見想的齊是彼款「無米有舂臼，無囝抱新婦」的套頭，到今嘛是十一哥仔光𣮈𣮈，後過食老毋知欲靠啥人咧？
台羅: Lāu-pē lāu-bú lóng kuè-sin--khì ê A-bo̍k, sī tsi̍t ê beh tsia̍h m̄ thó-thàn ê pîn-tuānn-kut, kiàn siūnn--ê tsiâu sī hit khuán “bô bí ū tsing-khū, bô kiánn phō sin-pū” ê thò-thâu, kàu-tann mā sī tsa̍p-it-ko--á kng-khu̍t-khu̍t, āu-kuè tsia̍h-lāu m̄ tsai beh khò siánn-lâng--leh?
中文: 父母雙亡的阿木，是一个不肯努力工作的懶惰鬼，每次想的都是那種「沒米卻有臼；沒有兒子卻領養童養媳」的把戲，折騰到現在還是孑然一身、家徒四壁，往後的晚年生活要倚靠誰呢？
英文: Amu, who lost both parents, is a lazy ghost who refuses to work hard. Every time he thinks about those tricks like "having a mill without rice; adopting a child without a son-in-law", he is still alone and his house is empty. Who will he rely on for his later years?

台文: 你喔！「無彼號尻川，想欲食彼號瀉藥」，行無三步就怦怦喘的人，也欲參人去𬦰山。
台羅: Lí--ooh! “Bô hit lō kha-tshng, siūnn-beh tsia̍h hit lō sià-io̍h”, kiânn bô sann pōo tō phēnn-phēnn-tshuán ê lâng, iā beh tsham lâng khì peh-suann.
中文: 你喔﹗「沒有那種能耐，還妄想做那種事」，走不到三步就氣喘吁吁的人，也想跟人家去爬山。
英文: You, 'Without that ability, you still dare to have such thoughts', a person who gets out of breath after just three steps, also wants to go mountain climbing with others.

台文: 𪜶序大人講的話伊都無咧信篤矣，你何乜苦「無枷夯交椅」，硬欲共伊款勸。
台羅: In sī-tuā-lâng kóng ê uē i to bô teh sìn-táu--ah, lí hô-mí-khóo “bô kê giâ kau-í”, ngē beh kā i khuán-khǹg.
中文: 他父母親說的話他都不理會了，你何苦「自找麻煩」，硬要苦勸他。
英文: He ignored everything his parents said, why bother "looking for trouble" and insist on persuading him.

台文: 失業規年，食三頓都有問題矣，伊就共定存領出來，人講「無通生食，哪有通曝乾」，目睭前的生活較要緊，後擺的日子袂顧得囉。
台羅: Sit-gia̍p kui-nî, tsia̍h sann tǹg to ū būn-tê--ah, i tō kā tīng-tsûn niá--tshut-lâi, lâng kóng “bô thang tshenn tsia̍h, ná ū thang pha̍k-kuann”, ba̍k-tsiu-tsîng ê sing-ua̍h khah iàu-kín, āu-pái ê ji̍t-tsí bē-kòo--tit--looh.
中文: 失業經年，三餐都成問題了，他就把定存領出來，人家說「生吃都不夠，哪能晒成乾」，眼前的生活比較重要，以後的日子顧不到了。
英文: Unemployed for years, with meals becoming a problem, he withdrew his fixed deposit. People said, 'Even raw, it's not enough, how can it be dried.' The present life is more important, and the future days can't be taken care of.

台文: 阮翁這站仔無頭路，保險公司的業務員煞來招伊入保險，伊現此時都「無通生食，哪有通曝乾」，欲佗生錢來投保咧？
台羅: Guán ang tsit-tsām-á bô thâu-lōo, pó-hiám kong-si ê gia̍p-bū-uân suah lâi tsio i ji̍p pó-hiám, i hiān-tshú-sî to “bô thang tshenn tsia̍h, ná ū thang pha̍k-kuann”, beh tó senn tsînn lâi tâu-pó--leh?
中文: 我先生這陣子失業，保險公司的業務員還來邀他參加保險，他現在是「生吃都不夠，哪能晒成乾」，哪裡有多餘的錢來投保呢？
英文: My husband has been unemployed recently. The insurance agent from the insurance company even came to invite him to join the insurance. He is now "not even enough to eat raw, how can he afford to dry it in the sun?" Where is there any extra money to buy insurance?

台文: 想欲食金瓜湯，煞規菜市仔攏無人咧賣金瓜，「無魚，蝦嘛好」，今仔日先買冬瓜轉來去𤉙排骨湯。
台羅: Siūnn-beh tsia̍h kim-kue thng, suah kui tshài-tshī-á lóng bô lâng teh bē kim-kue, “bô hî, hê mā hó”, kin-á-ji̍t sing bé tang-kue tńg lâi-khì kûn pâi-kut thng.
中文: 想喝南瓜湯，整個菜市場卻沒有人賣南瓜，「退而求其次」，今天先買冬瓜回家煮排骨湯。
英文: Wanting to drink pumpkin soup, but there was no one selling pumpkins in the whole market, "settling for second best," today I will buy winter melon and cook pork rib soup at home.

台文: 塚仔埔欲開路，駛怪手的司機先攢牲醴拜好兄弟仔，紲落去那燒銀紙，喙閣那唸：「無禁無忌，食百二。」
台羅: Thióng-á-poo beh khui-lōo, sái kuài-tshiú ê su-ki sing tshuân sing-lé pài  hó-hiann-tī-á, suà--lo̍h-khì ná sio gîn-tsuá, tshuì koh ná liām: “Bô-kìm-bô-khī, tsia̍h pah-jī.”
中文: 墓地要開路，怪手司機先準備三牲祭拜好兄弟，接著一邊燒銀紙，嘴巴還一邊念著：「百無禁忌，活到一百二十歲。」
英文: The cemetery needs to be opened, and the crane driver prepares three sacrifices to worship his good brother. While burning silver paper, he recites, "No taboos, live to be 120 years old."

台文: 囡仔人有當仔講話較無站無節，序大人常在都會對喙講：「無禁無忌，食百二。」
台羅: Gín-á-lâng ū-tang-á kóng-uē khah bô-tsām-bô-tsat, sī-tuā-lâng tshiâng-tsāi to ē tuì-tshuì kóng: “Bô-kìm-bô-khī, tsia̍h pah-jī.”
中文: 小孩子有時候講話較口無遮攔，長輩常常都會隨口補一句：「百無禁忌，活到一百二十歲。」
英文: Children sometimes speak without any filter, and older generations often add a remark, 'No taboos, live to be 120 years old.'

台文: 真濟意外抑是失敗，攏是因為靠勢家己經驗豐富，做代誌無夠細膩才會發生，愛知影「猴也會跋落樹跤」。
台羅: Tsin tsē ì-guā ia̍h-sī sit-pāi, lóng sī in-uī khò-sè ka-kī king-giām hong-hù, tsò tāi-tsì bô-kàu sè-jī tsiah ē huat-sing, ài tsai-iánn “kâu iā ē pua̍h-lo̍h tshiū-kha”.
中文: 很多意外或是失敗，往往是因為仗著自己經驗老到，做事不夠細心才會發生，要知道「猴子也會跌落樹下」。
英文: Many accidents or failures often occur because of relying on one's own experience and not being careful enough. You should know that "even monkeys fall from trees."

台文: 伊便若看著我，就喙笑目笑，好禮相借問，毋過佇尻脊後煞共我講甲無一塊好，真正是「畫虎畫皮難畫骨，知人知面不知心」。
台羅: I piān-nā khuànn-tio̍h guá, tō tshuì-tshiò-ba̍k-tshiò, hó-lé sio-tsioh-mn̄g, m̄-koh tī kha-tsiah-āu suah kā guá kóng kah bô tsi̍t tè hó, tsin-tsiànn sī “uā hóo uā phî lân uā kut, ti jîn ti biān put ti sim”.
中文: 他每次看到我，就笑容可掬，客氣的打招呼，背地裡卻把我說得一無是處，真的是「畫虎畫皮難畫骨，知人知面不知心」。
英文: Every time he sees me, he smiles warmly, politely greets me, but behind my back, he speaks ill of me, truly "it's difficult to draw the bones when painting a tiger's skin, knowing someone's face but not their heart".

台文: 相等的時陣，等的人等甲心狂火著，予人等的煞寬寬仔來，來到位也無會失禮。人講「等物僫到，等人快老」，將心比心，準時較好啦。
台羅: Sio-tán ê sî-tsūn, tán ê lâng tán kah sim-kông-hué-to̍h, hōo lâng tán--ê suah khuann-khuann-á lâi, lâi kàu-uī iā bô huē-sit-lé. Lâng kóng “tán mi̍h oh kàu, tán lâng khuài lāu”, tsiong-sim-pí-sim, tsún-sî khah hó--lah.
中文: 約人相見時，先到的人等得心急如焚，晚到的人卻姍姍來遲，到了也沒道歉。人家說「等待的時間很難熬」，將心比心，準時比較好啦。
英文: When making an appointment, the person who arrives first waits anxiously, while the person who arrives late comes leisurely without apologizing. People say "waiting time is hard to endure", so put yourself in their shoes and be punctual.

台文: 耍紙牌的時，提著好牌的就穩心仔等，毋過「等物僫到，等人快老」，定定是別人先到，家己煞看有食無干焦癮。
台羅: Sńg tsuá-pâi ê sî, the̍h-tio̍h hó pâi--ê tō ún-sim-á tán, m̄-koh “tán mi̍h oh kàu, tán lâng khuài lāu”, tiānn-tiānn sī pa̍t-lâng sing kàu, ka-kī suah  khuànn-ū tsia̍h-bô kan-na giàn.
中文: 玩紙牌的時候，拿到好牌的就安穩地聽牌，不過「等待的東西往往落空」，常常是別人先胡牌，自己只能眼睜睜而無可奈何。
英文: When playing cards, those who get good cards calmly wait for a winning hand, but "what you wait for often falls through." It is often others who win first, leaving oneself helpless and unable to do anything but watch.

台文: 歹路毋通行，僥倖代毋通做，若無，「菜蟲食菜，菜跤死」，無好煞尾。
台羅: Pháinn-lōo m̄-thang kiânn, hiau-hīng-tāi m̄-thang tsò, nā-bô, “tshài-thâng tsia̍h tshài, tshài-kha sí”, bô hó suah-bué.
中文: 邪路不要走，不義之事不要做，否則，「終將玩火自焚」，沒有好下場。
英文: Do not take the evil path, do not do unjust things, otherwise, 'you will eventually play with fire and burn yourself', there will be no good ending.

台文: 嫁娶進前愛先探門風，俗語講：「買田愛揀好田底，娶某愛揀好娘嬭。」
台羅: Kè-tshuā tsìn-tsîng ài sing thàm mn̂g-hong, sio̍k-gí kóng: “Bé tshân ài kíng hó tshân té, tshuā-bóo ài kíng hó niû-lé.”
中文: 結婚前要先打聽對方家庭的狀況，俗語說：「買田要選肥沃土，娶妻要選有良母。」
英文: Before getting married, you should first inquire about the family background of the other party. As the saying goes, 'When buying land, choose fertile soil; when marrying a wife, choose a good mother.'

台文: 阿珍看厝看半年外才買著一間伊佮意的厝，伊講：「買厝，買厝邊。」除了考慮價數，閣較要緊的是愛揣著有好厝邊的社區。
台羅: A-tin khuànn tshù khuànn puànn nî guā tsiah bé-tio̍h tsi̍t king i kah-ì ê tshù, i kóng: “Bé tshù, bé tshù-pinn.” Tû-liáu khó-lī kè-siàu, koh-khah iàu-kín--ê sī ài tshuē-tio̍h ū hó tshù-pinn ê siā-khu.
中文: 小珍看房子看了半年多才買到一間他喜歡的房子，他說：「買房子要慎選好鄰居。」除了考慮價錢，更加重要的是要找到有好鄰居的社區。
英文: Xiao Zhen looked at houses for more than half a year before finally buying a house that he liked. He said, "When buying a house, one must carefully choose good neighbors." In addition to considering the price, it is even more important to find a community with good neighbors.

台文: 雖然咱是交往誠濟年的好朋友，人講「買賣算分，相請無論」，咱的生理猶是著照步來，毋過這攤予我來請，你就莫閣和我相搶矣。
台羅: Sui-jiân lán sī kau-óng tsiânn tsē nî ê hó-pîng-iú, lâng kóng “bé-bē sǹg hun, sio-tshiánn bô lūn”, lán ê sing-lí iáu-sī tio̍h tsiàu-pōo-lâi, m̄-koh tsit thuann hōo guá lâi tshiánn, lí tō mài koh hām guá sio-tshiúnn--ah.
中文: 雖然我們是交往多年的好友，人家說「買賣得算清，請客別計較」，我們的生意還是得按部就班，不過這次由我來請客，你就不要跟我搶了。
英文: Although we have been good friends for many years, they say "business is business, don't worry about treating others", but our business still needs to proceed step by step. However, this time it's my turn to treat, so don't compete with me.

台文: 你毋通按呢直直做，攏無歇睏，雖罔恁兜這站仔較困難，毋過「趁也著趁，食也著食」，嘛愛停睏食飯，才有氣力通做工課。
台羅: Lí m̄-thang án-ne ti̍t-ti̍t tsò, lóng bô hioh-khùn, sui-bóng lín tau tsit-tsām-á khah khùn-lân, m̄-koh “thàn iā tio̍h thàn, tsia̍h iā tio̍h tsia̍h”, mā ài thîng-khùn tsia̍h-pn̄g, tsiah ū khuì-la̍t thang tsò khang-khuè.
中文: 你不要這樣一直做不停，都沒休息，雖然你家這陣子經濟較困難，不過「賺也得賺，吃也得吃」，也得休息吃飯才有力氣工作。
英文: You don't have to keep doing this without stopping, without taking a break. Although your family is going through a difficult financial situation, "you have to earn money and eat, and you also need to rest and eat to have the energy to work."

台文: 原本肝無好就愛注意，毋通為著趁錢拚甲無暝無日，才袂拍歹身體，人講：「趁錢有數，性命愛顧。」趁會著嘛愛食會著才有效。
台羅: Guân-pún kuann bô hó tō ài tsù-ì, m̄-thang uī-tio̍h thàn-tsînn piànn kah bô-mê-bô-ji̍t, tsiah bē phah-pháinn sin-thé, lâng kóng, “Thàn-tsînn iú sòo, sènn-miā ài kòo.” Thàn ē tio̍h mā ài tsia̍h ē tio̍h tsiah ū-hāu.
中文: 原本肝功能不好就得注意，不要為了賺錢日夜勤奮，才不會弄壞身體，人家說：「賺錢數量有限，生命要照顧。」賺得到也要花得了才有用。
英文: Originally, if your liver function is not good, you should pay attention and not work hard day and night just to make money, so as not to harm your body. People say, "There is a limited amount of money to be earned, but life must be taken care of." Even if you can earn money, it's only useful if you can spend it.

台文: 咱若時常想著「趁錢有數，性命愛顧」這句話，就較知影愛照顧家己的身體。
台羅: Lán nā sî-siông siūnn-tio̍h “thàn-tsînn iú sòo, sènn-miā ài kòo” tsit kù uē, tō khah tsai-iánn ài tsiàu-kòo ka-kī ê sin-thé.
中文: 我們如果時常想到「賺錢數量有限，生命要照顧」這句話，就容易想到要照顧自己的身體。
英文: If we often think of the phrase "money is limited, life needs to be taken care of," it is easy to think of taking care of our own bodies.

台文: 我最近拄著一寡代誌，無蓋順序，毋過我想著阿母捌共我講過：「跋一倒，抾著一隻金雞母。」遮的代誌一定會當予我愈來愈有智慧，勇敢面對一切。
台羅: Guá tsuè-kīn tú-tio̍h tsi̍t-kuá tāi-tsì, bô kài sūn-sī, m̄-koh guá siūnn-tio̍h a-bú bat kā guá kóng--kuè: “Pua̍h tsi̍t tó, khioh-tio̍h tsi̍t tsiah kim ke-bó.” Tsia-ê tāi-tsì it-tīng ē-tàng hōo guá jú lâi jú ū tì-huī, ióng-kám bīn-tuì it-tshè.
中文: 我最近遇到一些事情，不是那麼順利，不過我想到媽媽曾經跟我說過：「塞翁失馬，焉知非福。」這些事情一定能夠讓我越來越有智慧，勇敢面對一切。
英文: Recently, I have encountered some things that haven't been going smoothly, but I remembered my mother once told me, 'Misfortune may be a blessing in disguise.' These things will definitely make me wiser and braver to face everything.

台文: 明明是伊毋著閣敢佮人大細聲，我佇邊仔看甲「痚呴袂忍得嗽」，就開喙佮伊理論。
台羅: Bîng-bîng sī i m̄-tio̍h koh kánn kah lâng tuā-sè-siann, guá tī pinn--á khuànn kah “he-ku bē lún tit sàu”, tō khui-tshuì kah i lí-lūn.
中文: 明明是他不對還敢跟別人大小聲，我在旁邊看得「忍無可忍」，就開口跟他理論。
英文: Clearly, he was in the wrong but still dared to raise his voice at others. I couldn't bear it any longer and spoke up to argue with him.

台文: 雖然阿美𪜶翁矮閣大箍，學歷嘛並阿美較低，毋過伊猶是真愛𪜶翁，因為「媠䆀無比止，愛著較慘死」。
台羅: Sui-jiân A-bí in ang é koh tuā-khoo, ha̍k-li̍k mā phīng A-bí khah kē, m̄-koh  i iáu-sī tsin ài in ang, in-uī “suí bái bô pí tsí, ài--tio̍h khah-tshám sí”.
中文: 雖然小美的丈夫長得又矮又胖，學歷也比小美低，但他仍然非常愛他先生，因為「情人眼裡出西施」。
英文: Although Xiaomei's husband is short and fat, and his education is lower than Xiaomei's, she still loves him very much because "beauty is in the eye of the beholder."

台文: 「圓人會扁，扁人會圓」，啥人知影到尾會按怎咧？
台羅: “Înn--lâng ē pínn, pínn--lâng ē înn”, siánn-lâng tsai-iánn kàu-bué ē án-tsuánn--leh?
中文: 「世事本無常」，有誰知道結局是好是壞呢？
英文: "The world is always changing, who knows if the outcome will be good or bad?"

台文: 珠仔欲嫁進前，𪜶老母共伊講：「『嫁雞綴雞飛，嫁狗綴狗走。』毋管嫁了好抑䆀，一定愛佮恁翁做伙拍拚。」
台羅: Tsu--á beh kè tsìn-tsîng, in lāu-bú kā i kóng: “‘Kè ke tuè ke pue, kè káu tuè káu tsáu.’ M̄-kuán kè liáu hó ia̍h bái, it-tīng ài kah lín ang tsò-hué phah-piànn.”
中文: 小珠要嫁之前，他媽媽跟他說：「『嫁雞隨雞，嫁狗隨狗。』不管嫁的好或壞，一定要跟你先生一起努力。」
英文: Before Xiaozhu gets married, her mother tells her, 'Marry a chicken, follow the chicken; marry a dog, follow the dog. Regardless of whether it's good or bad, you must work hard together with your husband.'

台文: 人客若欲買物件，加減仔都會嫌東嫌西，毋過俗語咧講：「嫌貨才是買貨人。」咱著愛耐心聽人客講，提無仝的產品予人客揀，生理才做會成。
台羅: Lâng-kheh nā beh bé mi̍h-kiānn, ke-kiám-á to ē hiâm-tang-hiâm-sai, m̄-koh sio̍k-gí teh kóng, “Hiâm huè tsiah-sī bé huè lâng.” Lán tio̍h-ài nāi-sim thiann lâng-kheh kóng, the̍h bô kāng ê sán-phín hōo lâng-kheh kíng, sing-lí tsiah tsò ē sîng.
中文: 俗話說：「嫌貨才是買貨人。」客人如果要買東西，或多或少會嫌東嫌西，我們就要耐心聽客人說話，拿不同的產品給客人挑，生意才做得成。
英文: As the saying goes, 'The one who finds fault is the one who buys the goods.' If a customer wants to buy something, they will inevitably find fault with it to some extent. We should patiently listen to the customer, offer different products for them to choose from, and only then can we make a successful business.

台文: 俗語講：「愛拚才會贏。」佇景氣無好的時陣，著愛毋驚艱苦，堅持理想、跤踏實地，成功的機會就占較大面。
台羅: Sio̍k-gí kóng, “Ài piànn tsiah ē iânn.” Tī kíng-khì bô hó ê sî-tsūn, tio̍h-ài m̄ kiann kan-khóo, kian-tshî lí-sióng, kha-ta̍h-si̍t-tē, sîng-kong ê ki-huē tō tsiàm khah-tuā-bīn.
中文: 俗話說：「要努力才會贏。」在景氣低迷的時候，必須不怕辛苦，堅持理想、腳踏實地，成功的機會就會比較大。
英文: As the saying goes, 'You have to work hard to win.' In times of economic downturn, you must not be afraid of hard work, persist in your ideals, be down-to-earth, and your chances of success will be greater.

台文: 人講：「愛媠毋驚流鼻水。」天氣遮爾冷，伊仝款穿遐少，攏毋驚會寒著。
台羅: Lâng kóng: “Ài-suí m̄ kiann lâu phīnn-tsuí.” Thinn-khì tsiah-nī líng, i kāng-khuán tshīng  hiah tsió, lóng m̄ kiann ē kuânn--tio̍h.
中文: 所謂：「愛美不怕流鼻水。」天氣這麼冷，他照樣穿得那麼少，都不怕受涼了。
英文: So-called: 'Love beauty, not afraid of a runny nose.' The weather is so cold, he still dresses so lightly, not afraid of catching a cold.

台文: 共你講「惹熊惹虎，毋通惹著刺查某」，你都毋聽，敢去共彼个頭家娘唱聲，這擺知死矣乎？
台羅: Kā lí kóng “jiá hîm jiá hóo, m̄-thang jiá-tio̍h tshiah-tsa-bóo”, lí to m̄ thiann, kánn khì kā hit ê thâu-ke-niû tshiàng-siann, tsit pái tsai-sí--ah--honnh?
中文: 跟你說過「千萬別招惹兇悍的女人」，你就不聽勸，敢去跟那個老闆娘挑釁，這下知道嚴重性了吧？
英文: I told you, "Never provoke a fierce woman," but you didn't listen. You dared to provoke that boss lady. Now you know the severity, right?

台文: 保健的雜誌推薦「暗頓減食一口，活甲九十九」，閣講若逐工攏出去運動一下，對身體閣較好。
台羅: Pó-kiān ê tsa̍p-tsì thui-tsiàn “àm-tǹg kiám tsia̍h tsi̍t kháu, ua̍h kah káu-tsa̍p-káu”, koh kóng nā ta̍k-kang lóng tshut-khì ūn-tōng--tsi̍t-ē, tuì sin-thé koh-khah hó.
中文: 保健的雜誌推薦「晚餐少吃一口，活到九十九」，又說如果每天出去運動一下，對身體更好。
英文: The health magazine recommends, 'Take one less bite at dinner and live until ninety-nine,' and also says that going out for exercise every day is even better for the body.

台文: 現時社會尊重個人，就算是爸囝嘛有無仝款的想法，人講「會生得囝身，袂生得囝心」，爸囝無仝宗教、無仝政黨，嘛應該互相尊重。
台羅: Hiān-sî siā-huē tsun-tiōng kò-jîn, tō-sǹg sī pē-kiánn mā ū bô kāng-khuán ê siūnn-huat, lâng kóng “ē-senn-tit kiánn sin, bē-senn-tit kiánn sim”, pē-kiánn bô kāng tsong-kàu, bô kāng tsìng-tóng, mā ing-kai hōo-siong tsun-tiōng.
中文: 現代社會尊重個人，就算是父子也有不一樣的想法，人們說「能夠生出孩子的身體，卻不能夠生出孩子的心思」，父子不同宗教、不同政黨，也應該要互相尊重。
英文: Modern society respects individuals, even if they are father and son, they have different thoughts. People say, "The body that can give birth to a child, but not the mind." Fathers and sons of different religions and political parties should also respect each other.

台文: 爸母教育序細是一件誠艱難的工課，「會生得囝身，袂生得囝心」，有的囡仔不受教，甚至忤逆爸母，予𪜶氣甲毋知欲怎樣才好。
台羅: Pē-bú kàu-io̍k sī-sè sī tsi̍t kiānn tsiânn kan-lân ê khang-khuè, “ē-senn-tit kiánn sin, bē-senn-tit kiánn sim”, ū ê gín-á put-siū-kàu, sīm-tsì ngóo-gi̍k pē-bú, hōo in khì kah m̄ tsai beh tsuánn-iūnn tsiah hó.
中文: 父母教育子女是一件很艱難的工作，「能夠生出孩子的身體，卻不能夠生出孩子的心思」，有些孩子不受教，甚至忤逆父母，讓他們氣得不知如何是好。
英文: Parenting is a difficult job, "able to give birth to a child's body, but unable to give birth to a child's thoughts", some children are not teachable, and even defy their parents, making them at a loss for what to do.

台文: 啥人毋捌失敗過？人講：「會跋才會大。」做毋著去共當做經驗，毋才捎會著做工課的鋩角，嘛才會愈做愈熟手。
台羅: Siánn-lâng m̄ bat sit-pāi--kuè? Lâng kóng: “Ē pua̍h tsiah ē tuā.” Tsò m̄-tio̍h--khì kā tòng-tsò king-giām, m̄-tsiah sa ē tio̍h tsò khang-khuè ê mê-kak, mā tsiah ē jú tsò jú si̍k-tshiú.
中文: 誰沒有失敗過？人家說：「跌過跤才長得大。」做錯了把它當做經驗，才能掌握到工作的訣竅，也才會越做越順手。
英文: Who hasn't failed? They say, 'You have to fall before you can grow.' Treat mistakes as experiences, in order to grasp the secrets of work, and only then will you become more skilled with practice.

台文: 癮頭！你這號做「會曉偷食，袂曉拭喙」，不時提彼張偷拆的圖出來看，這馬逐家攏知影彼本冊是你拆破的矣。
台羅: Giàn-thâu! Lí tse hō-tsò “ē-hiáu thau tsia̍h, bē-hiáu tshit tshuì”, put-sî the̍h hit tiunn thau thiah ê tôo tshut-lâi khuànn, tsit-má ta̍k-ke lóng tsai-iánn hit pún tsheh sī lí thiah--phuà--ê--ah.
中文: 傻瓜！你這叫「偷吃卻不知道該擦嘴」，老是拿那張偷撕的圖出來看，現在大家全都知道那本書是你撕破的了。
英文: Fool! This is called "eating without wiping your mouth", always taking out that torn picture to look at, now everyone knows that you tore that book.

台文: 做生理，面對人客，「溜溜瞅瞅，食兩蕊目睭」，愛知影變竅，予人客滿意，生理才做會交易。
台羅: Tsò-sing-lí, bīn-tuì lâng-kheh, “liu-liu-tshiu-tshiu, tsia̍h nn̄g luí ba̍k-tsiu”, ài tsai-iánn piàn-khiàu, hōo lâng-kheh muá-ì, sing-lí tsiah tsò ē ka-ia̍h.
中文: 做生意，面對顧客，「要會察言觀色」，隨機應變，讓顧客滿意，生意才能做得興旺。
英文: Doing business, facing customers, "must be able to read their words and observe their expressions", adapt on the spot, satisfy customers, only then can the business thrive.

台文: 少年人拄出業，毋管食頭路抑是家己做頭家，「萬事起頭難」，愛沓沓仔來，堅持落去，做會久才有成功的機會。
台羅: Siàu-liân-lâng tú tshut-gia̍p, m̄-kuán tsia̍h-thâu-lōo ia̍h-sī ka-kī tsò thâu-ke, “bān-sū khí-thâu lân”, ài ta̍uh-ta̍uh-á lâi, kian-tshî--lo̍h-khì, tsò ē kú tsiah ū sîng-kong ê ki-huē.
中文: 年輕人剛畢業，上班或是自己創業，「萬事起頭難」，要慢慢來，堅持下去，做得久才有成功的機會。
英文: Young people who have just graduated, whether they go to work or start their own business, "everything is difficult at the beginning," they need to take it slowly, persist, and only by doing it for a long time will they have a chance of success.

台文: 非洲真濟國家因為飢荒，百姓枵飢失頓，真濟囡仔攏「腹肚若水櫃，胸坎若樓梯」，予人真毋甘。
台羅: Hui-tsiu tsin tsē kok-ka in-uī ki-hng, peh-sènn iau-ki-sit-tǹg, tsin tsē gín-á lóng “pak-tóo ná tsuí-kuī, hing-khám ná lâu-thui”, hōo lâng tsin m̄-kam.
中文: 非洲很多國家因為飢荒，人民三餐不繼，很多兒童都「骨瘦如柴，卻又挺個大肚子」，讓人很不捨。
英文: Many African countries are experiencing famine, causing people to go without meals. Many children are "skinny as a stick, yet have big bellies," which is very distressing.

台文: 伊自細漢就帶身命，「腹肚做藥櫥」，食藥仔會使講是閬時無閬日。
台羅: I tsū sè-hàn tō tài-sin-miā, “pak-tóo tsò io̍h-tû”, tsia̍h io̍h-á ē-sái kóng sī làng-sî bô làng-ji̍t.
中文: 他從小就帶有慢性疾病，「肚子當藥罐」，吃藥可謂無日無之。
英文: He has had a chronic illness since childhood, "his stomach is like a medicine jar," taking medicine can be described as incessant.

台文: 較早的人相信「落塗時八字命」，想講命運是出世的時就註好好的。現代人愛知影前途愛靠家己創造，若肯拍拚就會成功。
台羅: Khah-tsá ê lâng siong-sìn “lo̍h-thôo sî peh-jī miā”, siūnn-kóng miā-ūn sī tshut-sì ê sî tō tsù hó-hó--ê. Hiān-tāi lâng ài tsai-iánn tsiân-tôo ài khò ka-kī tshòng-tsō, nā khíng phah-piànn tō ē sîng-kong.
中文: 以前的人相信「出生的時辰就決定一個人的命運」，認為命運是出生的時候就註定好的。現代的人要曉得前途得靠自己創造，如果肯努力就會成功。
英文: In the past, people believed that "the time of birth determines a person's destiny" and thought that destiny was predetermined at birth. Modern people need to understand that their future depends on their own creation, and if they are willing to work hard, they will succeed.

台文: 咱臺灣人是命運共同體，毋通規工冤家、對立，因為「落水平平沉，全無重頭輕」。
台羅: Lán Tâi-uân-lâng sī miā-ūn kiōng-tông-thé, m̄-thang kui-kang uan-ke, tuì-li̍p, in-uī “lo̍h tsuí pênn-pênn tîm, tsuân bô tāng-thâu-khin”.
中文: 我們臺灣人是命運共同體，不要整天吵架、對立，否則「兩敗俱傷，誰也沒佔到便宜」。
英文: We Taiwanese are a community of shared destiny. Don't argue and oppose each other all the time, otherwise "both sides will suffer and no one will benefit".

台文: 朋友相請，哪著大魚大肉，人講「誠意食水甜」，路邊擔仔就足好食。
台羅: Pîng-iú sio-tshiánn, ná-tio̍h tuā hî tuā bah, lâng kóng “sîng-ì tsia̍h tsuí tinn”, lōo-pinn-tànn-á tō tsiok hó-tsia̍h.
中文: 現代社會尊重個人，就算是父子也有不一樣的想法，人們說「能夠生出孩子的身體，卻不能夠生出孩子的心思」，父子不同宗教、不同政黨，也應該要互相尊重。
英文: Modern society respects individuals, even if they are father and son, they have different thoughts. People say, "The body that can give birth to a child, but not the mind." Fathers and sons of different religions and political parties should also respect each other.

台文: 朋友若來相揣，心情歡喜閣熱情共伊招待，白滾水來相請嘛無要緊，人咧講「誠意食水甜」，毋免歹勢。
台羅: Pîng-iú nā lâi sio-tshuē, sim-tsîng huann-hí koh jia̍t-tsîng kā i tsiau-thāi, pe̍h-kún-tsuí lâi sio-tshiánn mā bô iàu-kín, lâng teh kóng “sîng-ì tsia̍h tsuí tinn”, m̄-bián pháinn-sè.
中文: 朋友如果來訪，心裡高興又熱忱的招待他，用白開水待客也不要緊，人家說「有誠意喝水都甜」，不用不好意思。
英文: If a friend comes to visit, warmly welcome them and treat them with plain water. They say, 'Sincere water tastes sweet,' so there's no need to feel embarrassed.

台文: 你若欲開店賣手機仔，著愛綴會著科技咧發展的速度，毋通「過時賣曆日」，去賣以早彼種無網路功能的，這馬真罕得看著有人咧用矣。
台羅: Lí nā beh khui-tiàm bē tshiú-ki-á, tio̍h-ài tuè ē tio̍h kho-ki teh huat-tián ê sok-tōo, m̄-thang “kuè-sî bē la̍h-ji̍t”, khì bē í-tsá hit tsióng bô bāng-lōo kong-lîng--ê, tsit-má tsin hán-tit khuànn-tio̍h ū lâng teh īng--ah.
中文: 你如果想開店販售手機，就得追上科技發展的速度，不要「賣過期的日曆」，賣以前那種沒有網路功能的手機，現在很少看到有人使用了。
英文: If you want to open a store selling mobile phones, you have to keep up with the pace of technological development, don't "sell outdated calendars", sell the kind of phones that don't have internet functionality, which are rarely seen being used now.

台文: 這个時代需要新思維，老沿的袂使老古板，一直用「過橋較濟你行路，食鹽較濟你食米」的態度，來教示少年人。
台羅: Tsit ê sî-tāi su-iàu sin su-uî, lāu-iân--ê bē-sái lāu-kóo-pán, it-ti̍t iōng “kuè kiô khah tsē lí kiânn-lōo, tsia̍h iâm khah tsē lí tsia̍h bí” ê thāi-tōo, lâi kà-sī siàu-liân-lâng.
中文: 這個時代需要新的思維，老一輩的不可以食古不化，一直用「倚老賣老」的心態，來教訓年輕人。)
英文: This era needs new thinking, the older generation cannot cling to outdated ways and continue to use the mentality of "relying on old age to sell old age" to lecture young people.

台文: 人講：「隔壁親家，禮數原在。」雖然欲娶的新娘蹛佇厝邊，對𤆬路雞到大禮車，一項都袂省得。
台羅: Lâng kóng, “Keh-piah tshin-ke, lé-sòo guân-tsāi.” Sui-jiân beh tshuā ê sin-niû tuà tī tshù-pinn, tuì tshuā-lōo-ke kàu tuā lé-tshia, tsi̍t hāng to bē-síng--tit.
中文: 人家說：「隔壁親家，禮數仍舊一樣。」雖然要娶的新娘就住在附近，從帶路雞到大禮車，一樣都不能少。
英文: People say, 'The same courtesy still applies to the next-door relatives.' Even though the bride-to-be lives nearby, nothing can be omitted, from the chicken leading the way to the grand wedding car.

台文: 「隔壁親家，禮數原在」，按呢會予人佮人的關係較親切嘛較搭粒。
台羅: “Keh-piah tshin-ke, lé-sòo guân-tsāi”, án-ne ē hōo lâng kah lâng ê kuan-hē khah tshin-tshiat mā khah tah-lia̍p.
中文: 即使是住在隔壁的親家，必要的禮節還是要遵守，這樣會使得人跟人的關係更親切也更緊密。
英文: Even if they are relatives living next door, necessary etiquette still needs to be followed, which will make the relationship between people more friendly and closer.

台文: 做人著愛有孝才有底，千萬毋通「飼囝無論飯，飼爸母算頓」，飼囝飼甲肥朒朒，飼爸母飼甲賰一支骨。
台羅: Tsò-lâng tio̍h-ài iú-hàu tsiah ū-té, tshian-bān m̄-thang “tshī kiánn bô-lūn pn̄g, tshī pē-bú sǹg tǹg”, tshī kiánn tshī kah puî-tsut-tsut, tshī pē-bú tshī kah tshun tsi̍t ki kut.
中文: 為人要懂得盡孝才是根本之道，千萬不要「養兒不計成本，奉養父母卻斤斤計較」，把兒女養得胖嘟嘟的，卻讓父母餓得瘦巴巴的。
英文: To be a person, one must understand that filial piety is the fundamental way. One must never "spare no expense in raising children, but be stingy in taking care of parents," raising children to be chubby while leaving parents hungry and thin.

台文: 阿義仔這个人傷過奸巧，毋通予伊入來咱公司上班，若無，是會「飼鳥鼠，咬布袋」。
台羅: A-gī--á tsit ê lâng siunn kuè kan-khiáu, m̄-thang hōo i ji̍p-lâi lán kong-si siōng-pan, nā-bô, sī ē “tshī niáu-tshí, kā pòo-tē”.
中文: 阿義這個人過於奸險，不能讓他到我們公司上班，否則，會「養虎貽患」的。
英文: Ah Yi is too cunning, we can't let him work in our company, otherwise, it will "raise a tiger and invite trouble".

台文: 愈有學問愈有才情的人，若像人講的「飽穗的稻仔，頭犁犁」，會予人愈尊敬。
台羅: Jú ū ha̍k-būn jú ū tsâi-tsîng ê lâng, ná-tshiūnn lâng kóng--ê “pá-suī ê tiū-á, thâu lê-lê”, ē hōo lâng jú tsun-kìng.
中文: 越有學問與能力的人，就像是人家說的「飽滿而成熟的稻穗，頭向下」，會更受人尊敬。
英文: The more knowledgeable and capable a person is, just like what people say, "a ripe and mature rice ear, with its head down," the more respected they will be.

台文: 你無聽人講「骨力食栗，貧惰吞瀾」呢？若肯做就毋驚無通食，上驚的是欲食毋討趁，可能就愛看人食穿矣。
台羅: Lí bô thiann lâng kóng “kut-la̍t tsia̍h-la̍t, pîn-tuānn thun nuā”--nih? Nā khíng tsò tō m̄ kiann bô thang tsia̍h, siōng kiann--ê sī beh tsia̍h m̄ thó-thàn, khó-lîng tō ài khuànn lâng tsia̍h-tshīng--ah.
中文: 你沒聽人家說「勤奮耕耘，就會有好的食物，而懶惰者就只能吞口水」嗎？只要肯做就不怕沒東西吃，最怕的是只想吃卻不去工作賺錢，可能就得倚靠他人生活了。
英文: Haven't you heard people say, 'If you work hard, you will have good food, but lazy people can only drool'? As long as you are willing to work, you won't be afraid of having nothing to eat. What you should be afraid of is wanting to eat but not working to earn money, then you may have to rely on others for a living.

台文: 伊串都用共人騙咧賺食，閣展講按呢攏免本，毋過「僥倖錢，失德了；冤枉錢，跋輸筊」，緊慢伊會知悽慘。
台羅: I tshuàn to īng kā lâng phiàn teh tsuán-tsia̍h, koh tián kóng án-ne lóng bián pún, m̄-koh “hiau-hīng-tsînn, sit-tik liáu; uan-óng-tsînn, pua̍h-su kiáu”, kín-bān i ē tsai tshi-tshám.
中文: 他靠著詐騙賺錢，還跟人炫耀這樣都不花成本，不過「不義之財，怎麼來就怎麼去」，他早晚會嘗到苦頭。
英文: He makes money by fraud and even boasts to others that he doesn't spend any cost. However, "ill-gotten gains will be lost sooner or later," and he will taste bitterness sooner or later.

台文: 叫伊做一點仔代誌，就若「慢牛厚屎尿」，𠢕拖沙閣連鞭頭殼疼、連鞭腹肚疼。
台羅: Kiò i tsò tsi̍t-tiám-á tāi-tsì, tō ná “bān gû kāu-sái-jiō”, gâu thua-sua koh liâm-mi thâu-khak thiànn, liâm-mi pak-tóo thiànn.
中文: 叫他做一點小事，就像「行動遲緩的牛屎尿多」，拖拖拉拉又一下子頭痛、一下子肚子痛。
英文: Calling him to do a little thing is like "slow-moving cow dung with excessive urine", dragging and causing headaches and stomachaches.

台文: 「疑人，毋成賊」，若無證據通做干證，就袂當烏白賴人。
台羅: “Gî lâng, m̄ tsiânn tsha̍t”, nā bô tsìng-kì thang tsò kan-tsìng, tō bē-tàng oo-pe̍h luā--lâng.
中文: 「不能只因懷疑，便將人當賊」，如果沒有證據可以證明，就不能隨意誣賴他人。
英文: 'Cannot simply suspect and treat people as thieves,' if there is no evidence to prove it, one cannot falsely accuse others.

台文: 人講：「疑人，毋成賊。」佳哉警方有共代誌調查予伊清楚，才無冤枉著好人。
台羅: Lâng kóng: “Gî lâng, m̄ tsiânn tsha̍t.” Ka-tsài kíng-hong ū kā tāi-tsì tiâu-tsa hōo i tshing-tshó, tsiah bô uan-óng-tio̍h hó-lâng.
中文: 所謂：「懷疑他人，焉能把人當賊。」幸虧警方把事情調查清楚，才沒有冤枉到好人。
英文: The so-called 'doubting others, how can one treat others as thieves.' Fortunately, the police investigated the matter thoroughly, so innocent people were not wrongly accused.

台文: 莫想遐濟啦！咱「盡人事，順天意」，到底會按怎就交予天公伯仔安排矣。
台羅: Mài siūnn hiah tsē--lah! Lán “tsīn jîn-sū, sūn thinn-ì”, tàu-té ē án-tsuánn tō kau hōo thinn-kong-peh--á an-pâi--ah.
中文: 別想那麼多啦！我們「盡人事，聽天命」，結果如何就交由老天爺安排了。
英文: Don't think too much! We'll do our best and leave the rest to fate.

台文: 公司的錢水雄雄轉踅袂過來，因端淡薄仔複雜，古早人講：「緊行無好步。」欲解決問題，千萬毋通傷過趕狂，愛三思而後行。
台羅: Kong-si ê tsînn-tsuí hiông-hiông tńg-se̍h bē kuè--lâi, in-tuann tām-po̍h-á ho̍k-tsa̍p, kóo-tsá-lâng kóng, “Kín kiânn bô hó pōo.” Beh kái-kuat būn-tê, tshian-bān m̄-thang siunn kuè kuánn-kông, ài sàm-su jî hiō hîng.
中文: 公司的資金突然周轉不過來，原因略微複雜，古人說：「欲速則不達。」要解決問題，千萬不可太過慌張，須三思而後行。
英文: The company's funds suddenly couldn't keep up, the reason is a bit complicated, as the ancients said, 'Haste makes waste.' To solve the problem, one must not panic too much, but rather think carefully before taking action.

台文: 咱拄著代誌，上好是緊事寬辦，才袂重耽，愛知「緊紡無好紗，緊嫁無好大家」。
台羅: Lán tú-tio̍h tāi-tsì, siōng hó sī kín-sū-khuann-pān, tsiah bē tîng-tânn, ài tsai “kín pháng bô hó se, kín kè bô hó ta-ke”.
中文: 當我們遇到事情，最好能夠沉著應對，才不會出錯，須知「事緩則圓，欲速則不達」。
英文: When we encounter things, it is best to respond calmly so as not to make mistakes. You should know that "haste makes waste".

台文: 阿明瘦罔瘦，逐頓飯攏愛食四、五碗才知飽，莫怪人攏講伊「瘦田𠢕欶水」。
台羅: A-bîng sán bóng sán, ta̍k tǹg pn̄g lóng ài tsia̍h sì, gōo uánn tsiah tsai pá, bo̍k-kuài lâng lóng kóng i “sán tshân gâu suh tsuí”.
中文: 小明雖然個子瘦小，但一餐飯都要吃四、五碗才覺得飽，難怪人家都說他「瘦規瘦，還真能吃」。
英文: Although Xiaoming is small in stature, he has to eat four or five bowls of rice to feel full. No wonder people say, "He's thin, but he can really eat."

台文: 阿財仔下真濟苦心佮所費咧共𪜶後生栽培，向望伊會當出頭天，結局伊毋但大學讀無畢業，閣欲食毋討趁，顛倒是𪜶查某囝較有才情，研究所都猶未出業，幾若間公司就相爭欲共倩，阿財仔怨嘆講：「豬毋大，大對狗去。」
台羅: A-tsâi--á hē tsin tsē khóo-sim kah sóo-huì teh kā in hāu-senn tsai-puê, ǹg-bāng i ē-tàng tshut-thâu-thinn, kiat-kio̍k i m̄-nā tāi-ha̍k tha̍k bô pit-gia̍p, koh beh tsia̍h m̄ thó-thàn, tian-tò sī in tsa-bóo-kiánn khah ū tsâi-tsîng, gián-kiù-sóo to iáu-buē tshut-gia̍p, kuí-nā king kong-si tō sio-tsenn beh kā tshiànn, A-tsâi--á uàn-thàn kóng, “Ti m̄ tuā, tuā tuì káu--khì.”
中文: 阿財花費了許多苦心和費用栽培他兒子，希望他能出人頭地，結果他不但大學無法畢業，還好逸惡勞，反而是他女兒比較有才華，研究所還沒畢業，好幾間公司就搶著要聘用他，阿財嘆氣說：「事與願違。」
英文: Ah Cai spent a lot of effort and money to cultivate his son, hoping that he could stand out. As a result, not only did he fail to graduate from university, but he also became lazy. On the other hand, his daughter is more talented. Even before graduating from graduate school, several companies were eager to hire her. Ah Cai sighed and said, 'Things didn't go as planned.'

台文: 俗語講：「戲館邊的豬母，袂歕簫嘛會拍拍。」萬項技術，捷看捷摸加減嘛會曉。
台羅: Sio̍k-gí kóng, “Hì-kuán-pinn ê ti-bó, bē pûn siau mā ē phah-phik.” Bān-hāng ki-su̍t, tsia̍p khuànn tsia̍p bong ke-kiám mā ē-hiáu.
中文: 俗話說：「戲館邊的母豬，不會吹簫，也會打拍子。」任何技藝，常看常碰多少也會一些。
英文: As the saying goes, 'The sow next to the theater can't play the flute, but can keep the beat.' Any skill, with frequent observation and practice, will also acquire some proficiency.

台文: 咱這馬這間厝細罔細，毋過蹛著誠慣勢，人講：「豬岫毋值狗岫穩。」你莫閣想欲開大錢去買樓仔厝。
台羅: Lán tsit-má tsit king tshù sè bóng sè, m̄-koh tuà tio̍h tsiânn kuàn-sì, lâng kóng: “Ti-siū m̄-ta̍t káu-siū ún.” Lí mài koh siūnn-beh khai tuā tsînn khì bé lâu-á-tshù.
中文: 我們家小歸小，但住起來很習慣，人家說：「金窩銀窩不如自己的狗窩。」你就別再想著花大錢去買樓房。
英文: Our home may be small, but we are used to living in it. People say, 'A golden nest is not as good as your own dog's nest.' So stop thinking about spending a lot of money to buy a house.

台文: 頭家人上要緊的工課是管理公司的業務，毋通「豬頭毋顧，顧鴨母卵」，干焦咧斟酌辦公室的花有沃水無？
台羅: Thâu-ke-lâng siōng iàu-kín ê khang-khuè sī kuán-lí kong-si ê gia̍p-bū, m̄-thang “ti-thâu m̄ kòo, kòo ah-bó-nn̄g”, kan-na teh tsim-tsiok pān-kong-sik ê hue ū ak-tsuí--bô?
中文: 當老板最要緊的工作是管理公司的業務，不可以「捨本逐末」，光是注意辦公室的花有沒有澆水。
英文: The most important job for a boss is to manage the company's business, not to focus solely on whether the office plants are being watered.

台文: 若欲予人會佮意聽你講古，上無，腹肚內嘛愛有膏，像你按呢講無三兩句話就講袂落去，真正是「豬頭皮炸無油」。
台羅: Nā beh hōo lâng ē kah-ì thiann lí kóng-kóo, siōng-bô, pak-tóo-lāi mā ài ū ko, tshiūnn lí án-ne kóng bô sann nn̄g kù uē tō kóng bē lo̍h--khì, tsin-tsiànn sī “ti-thâu-phuê tsuànn bô iû”.
中文: 若想要別人喜歡聽你說故事，至少，肚子也要有一些墨水，像你這樣講不到兩三句話就說不下去，真的是「肚子裡沒墨水」。
英文: If you want others to enjoy listening to your stories, at least, you need to have some ink in your stomach. Like you, who can't continue speaking after just a few sentences, you really have "no ink in your stomach".

台文: 買物件的時，生理人講的話免不了會「賣茶講茶芳，賣花講花紅」，咱共參考一下就好，免總共信。
台羅: Bé mi̍h-kiānn ê sî, sing-lí-lâng kóng ê uē bián-put-liáu ē “bē tê kóng tê phang, bē hue kóng hue âng”, lán kā tsham-khó--tsi̍t-ē tō hó, bián tsóng kā sìn.
中文: 買東西時，生意人所講的話免不了會「賣什麼東西就稱讚什麼東西好」，我們用來參考就好，別完全相信。
英文: When buying things, it is inevitable that business people will say, "Praise whatever they are selling," we should take it as a reference, but not completely believe it.

台文: 伊攏講伊經銷的烏油誠讚，正經是「賣茶講茶芳，賣花講花紅」，咱猶是加行幾間仔才袂予伊偏去。
台羅: I lóng kóng i king-siau ê oo-iû tsiânn tsán, tsìng-king sī “bē tê kóng tê phang, bē hue kóng hue âng”, lán iáu-sī ke kiânn--kuí-king-á tsiah bē hōo i phinn--khì.
中文: 他都說他經銷的機油很好，實在是「老王賣瓜，自賣自誇」，我們還是多問幾家同行做比較，才不會被他騙了。
英文: He always says that the engine oil he sells is very good, but it's just "Old Wang selling melons, boasting about himself." We should still ask more peers for comparison so that we won't be deceived by him.

台文: 種蒜頭的作穡人攏揀較媠的提去賣，留一寡脯去的家己食，莫怪人講：「燒瓷的食缺，織蓆的睏椅。」
台羅: Tsìng suàn-thâu ê tsoh-sit-lâng lóng kíng khah suí--ê the̍h-khì bē, lâu tsi̍t-kuá póo--khì--ê ka-kī tsia̍h, bo̍k-kuài lâng kóng, “Sio-huî--ê tsia̍h khih, tsit-tshio̍h--ê khùn í.”
中文: 蒜農都挑比較漂亮的拿去賣，留一些乾癟的自己吃，難怪人家說「燒瓷的自己用有缺口的碗，織草蓆的在椅子上睡覺。」
英文: Farmers pick the prettier ones to sell, keeping the dried ones for themselves. No wonder people say, 'Using cracked bowls for oneself while sleeping on a grass mat.'

台文: 做人、做代誌著愛跤踏實地，若干焦欲變彼款「鋪面蟶，浸水蚵」的齣頭，連鞭就會予人看破跤手。
台羅: Tsò-lâng, tsò tāi-tsì tio̍h-ài kha-ta̍h-si̍t-tē, nā kan-na beh pìnn hit khuán “phoo bīn than, tsìm-tsuí ô” ê tshut-thâu, liâm-mi tō ē hōo lâng khuànn-phuà-kha-tshiú.
中文: 做人、做事得實在，若是想搞「裝門面、充排場」的戲碼，很快就會讓人識破技倆。
英文: Being honest in one's actions and behavior, if one tries to put on a facade and show off, they will soon be exposed.

台文: 俗語講「靠山山會崩，靠水水會焦」，萬項代誌靠家己去拍拚，是上穩當的步數。
台羅: Sio̍k-gí kóng “khò suann suann ē pang, khò tsuí tsuí ē ta”, bān-hāng tāi-tsì khò ka-kī khì phah-piànn, sī siōng ún-tàng ê pōo-sòo.
中文: 俗話說「靠山山會倒，靠人人會跑」，凡事靠自己努力奮鬥，是最妥當的方法。
英文: As the saying goes, 'If you rely on a mountain, it will collapse; if you rely on people, they will run away.' It is most appropriate to rely on one's own efforts and struggle in everything.

台文: 咱若欲佇社會佮人做代誌，著愛照起工來，仙都毋通想欲偏人，「樹頭徛予在，毋驚樹尾做風颱」。
台羅: Lán nā beh tī siā-huē kah lâng tsò tāi-tsì, tio̍h-ài tsiàu-khí-kang lâi, sian to m̄-thang siūnn-beh phinn--lâng, “tshiū-thâu khiā hōo tsāi, m̄ kiann tshiū-bué tsò-hong-thai”.
中文: 我們若要在社會上與人共事，就得按部就班，不要有占別人便宜的念頭，「根基穩固了，就不怕外在的環境惡劣」。
英文: If we want to work with others in society, we must follow the rules and not have the idea of taking advantage of others. "Once the foundation is solid, we are not afraid of the harsh external environment."

台文: 人講：「樹頭徛予在，毋驚樹尾做風颱。」阿金仔做人實在閣有信用，透底都毋驚人佇尻川後咧生閒仔話。
台羅: Lâng kóng, “Tshiū-thâu khiā hōo tsāi, m̄ kiann tshiū-bué tsò-hong-thai.” A-kim--á tsò-lâng si̍t-tsāi koh ū sìn-iōng, thàu-té to m̄ kiann lâng tī kha-tshng-āu teh senn îng-á-uē.
中文: 所謂：「行事正直，就不怕背後的蜚短流長。」阿金為人實在又值得信賴，從來都不怕別人在背後講閒話。
英文: The so-called, 'Acting with integrity, one does not fear the gossip behind their back.' Ah Jin is truly trustworthy and never fears others talking behind his back.

台文: 講話袂使傷譀，著愛真的才通講；若定咧歕雞胿是會予人看破跤手，久來人就會講你是「膨風水雞刣無肉」喔！
台羅: Kóng-uē bē-sái siunn hàm, tio̍h-ài tsin--ê tsiah thang kóng; nā tiānn teh pûn-ke-kui sī ē hōo lâng khuànn-phuà-kha-tshiú, kú--lâi lâng tō ē kóng lí sī “phòng-hong tsuí-ke thâi bô bah”--ooh!
中文: 講話切勿浮誇，得真的如此才能說；如果常常吹牛會讓別人摸清楚底細，久了就會被說是「誇大不實」喔！
英文: Do not exaggerate when speaking, only say it if it is true; if you often brag, others will figure out the truth, and eventually you will be called "exaggerating"!

台文: 這擺的比賽，人都共咱唱聲矣，講欲予咱輸甲足歹看的，「輸人毋輸陣，輸陣歹看面」，咱著較綿爛操練咧，較袂落人的喙。
台羅: Tsit pái ê pí-sài, lâng to kā lán tshiàng-siann--ah, kóng beh hōo lán su kah tsiok pháinn-khuànn--ê, “su lâng m̄ su tīn, su tīn pháinn-khuànn bīn”, lán tio̍h  khah mî-nuā tshau-liān--leh, khah bē lo̍h-lâng-ê-tshuì.
中文: 這次比賽，對手已經撂狠話了，說要讓我們輸得很難看，「奮發向上，勿落人後」，我們得練習得勤快些，不讓別人有批評之處。
英文: This time, the opponent has already made tough remarks, saying that they will make us lose in a very embarrassing way, "strive to move forward, don't fall behind", we need to practice harder and not give others any room for criticism.

台文: 當今社會無錢行無路，所以咱目睭擘金就愛趁錢，毋過人講「錢四跤，人兩跤」，人逐錢逐無歇，到目睭瞌去才會煞。
台羅: Tong-kim siā-huē bô tsînn kiânn bô-lōo, sóo-í lán ba̍k-tsiu peh-kim tō ài thàn-tsînn, m̄-koh lâng kóng “tsînn sì kha, lâng nn̄g kha”, lâng jiok tsînn jiok bô hioh, kàu ba̍k-tsiu kheh--khì tsiah ē suah.
中文: 當前社會沒錢寸步難行，所以我們一睜開眼就得賺錢，不過人家說「錢有四條腿，人只有兩條腿」，人們追逐財富追個不停，到閉上眼睛才會停止。
英文: The current society is difficult to move forward without money, so as soon as we open our eyes, we have to make money. However, people say, 'Money has four legs, while humans only have two legs.' People chase after wealth without stopping until they close their eyes.

台文: 你看伊「頭大面四方，肚大居財王」，相命仙講伊另日仔定著是大富大貴的人。
台羅: Lí khuànn i “thâu tuā bīn sù-hong, tóo tuā ki-tsâi ông”, siòng-miā-sian kóng i līng-ji̍t-á tiānn-tio̍h sī tuā-hù-tuā-kuì ê lâng.
中文: 你看他「頭大、臉方、肚大」，命相師說他將來必定是大富大貴之人。
英文: You see him with a big head, square face, and big belly, the fortune teller says he will definitely be a wealthy and prosperous person in the future.

台文: 做代誌若不時「頭燒燒，尾冷冷」，欲成功就較僫囉！
台羅: Tsò tāi-tsì nā put-sî “thâu sio-sio, bué líng-líng”, beh sîng-kong tō khah oh--looh!
中文: 做事情若總是「三分鐘熱度」，想成功就比較困難囉！
英文: If you always have a "three-minute enthusiasm" for doing things, it will be more difficult to succeed!

台文: 伊都毋知頭毋知尾，你閣講遐緊，較加伊嘛袂輸「鴨仔聽雷」，愣佇遐若柴頭尪仔咧！
台羅: I to m̄ tsai thâu m̄ tsai bué, lí koh kóng hiah kín, khah-ke i mā bē-su “ah-á thiann luî”, gāng tī hia ná tshâ-thâu-ang-á--leh!
中文: 他不知道整個來龍去脈，你還講得那麼快，難怪他像「鴨子聽到雷聲」，愣在那裡像木偶一樣！
英文: He doesn't know the whole story, you're speaking so fast, no wonder he's like a "duck hearing thunder", standing there like a puppet!

台文: 寢去外國讀語言學校，逐日都親像「鴨仔聽雷」咧，攏聽無先生咧講啥，真正食力甲袂曉講。
台羅: Tshím khì guā-kok tha̍k gí-giân ha̍k-hāu, ta̍k-ji̍t to tshin-tshiūnn “ah-á thiann luî”--leh, lóng thiann-bô sian-sinn teh kóng siannh, tsin-tsiànn tsia̍h-la̍t kah bē-hiáu kóng.
中文: 剛去國外讀語言學校，每天都像「鴨子聽到雷聲」，聽不懂老師在說什麼，真是吃力到難以言表。
英文: Just went to study at a language school abroad, every day feels like "a duck hearing thunder", can't understand what the teacher is saying, it's really difficult to put into words.

台文: 爸母毋但愛關心囡仔的健康佮學業，嘛愛注意伊的人際關係，因為「龍交龍，鳳交鳳，隱痀的交侗戇。」朋友對囡仔的影響有時仔比爸母閣較大。
台羅: Pē-bú m̄-nā ài kuan-sim gín-á ê kiān-khong kah ha̍k-gia̍p, mā ài tsù-ì i ê jîn-tsè kuan-hē, in-uī “lîng kau lîng, hōng kau hōng, ún-ku--ê kau tòng-gōng.” Pîng-iú tuì gín-á ê íng-hióng ū-sî-á pí pē-bú koh-khah tuā.
中文: 父母不但要關心小孩的健康與學業，也要留意他的交友狀況，有道是「什麼樣的人交什麼樣的朋友。」朋友對孩子的影響有時候比父母還大。
英文: Parents should not only care about their children's health and academics, but also pay attention to their social circle. There is a saying, "You are judged by the company you keep." Sometimes, friends have a greater influence on children than their own parents.

台文: 阿義仔笑阿土仔頇顢讀冊，論真來講是「龜笑鱉無尾，鱉笑龜粗皮」，一个考四十分，一个考三十八，阿義仔是有較𠢕諾？
台羅: A-gī--á tshiò A-thóo--á hân-bān tha̍k-tsheh, lūn-tsin lâi kóng sī “ku tshiò pih bô bué, pih tshiò ku tshoo phuê”, tsi̍t ê khó sì-tsa̍p hun, tsi̍t ê khó sann-tsa̍p-peh, A-gī--á sī ū khah gâu--hioh?
中文: 阿義笑阿土很不會讀書，其實是「五十步笑百步」，一个考四十分，一个考三十八，阿義有比較厲害嗎？
英文: Ah Yi laughed at Ah Tu for being bad at studying, but in fact, he is "the pot calling the kettle black". One scored 40 points, the other scored 38 points. Is Ah Yi really more impressive?

台文: 伊拄入來公司，看著都古意古意，啥人知久來變老鳥煞「龜跤趖出來」，見若有菜鳥入來就欲共人創治。
台羅: I tú ji̍p-lâi kong-si, khuànn tio̍h to kóo-ì-kóo-ì, siánn-lâng tsai kú--lâi piàn lāu-tsiáu suah “ku-kha sô--tshut-lâi”, kiàn-nā ū tshài-tsiáu ji̍p--lâi tō beh kā lâng tshòng-tī.
中文: 他剛進來公司，看起來忠厚老實，誰知道時間一久變資深員工卻「露出馬腳」，只要有新進員工進來就想捉弄人家。
英文: He just entered the company, appearing honest and sincere, but who knew that over time he would reveal his true colors as a senior employee, always wanting to play tricks on new employees.

台文: 「龜跤龜內肉」，無論查某囝抑後生，攏是序大人的心肝寶貝。
台羅: “Ku-kha ku-lāi bah”, bô-lūn tsa-bóo-kiánn ia̍h hāu-senn, lóng sī sī-tuā-lâng ê sim-kuann pó-puè.
中文: 「手心手背都是肉」，不論是女兒或兒子，都是父母的心肝寶貝。
英文: "Both the palm and the back of the hand are flesh," whether it's a daughter or a son, they are the parents' beloved treasure.

台文: 這間新開的店講納一百箍參加會員就有一份會員禮物，「龜跤龜內肉」，其實這份禮物就是用咱會員費買的。
台羅: Tsit king sin khui ê tiàm kóng la̍p tsi̍t-pah khoo tsham-ka huē-uân tō ū tsi̍t hūn huē-uân lé-bu̍t, “ku-kha ku-lāi bah”, kî-si̍t tsit hūn lé-bu̍t tō sī  īng lán huē-uân-huì bé--ê.
中文: 這家新開的店說付一百塊參加會員就有一份會員禮物，「羊毛出在羊身上」，其實這份禮物就是我們用會員費買的。
英文: This newly opened store claims that by paying one hundred dollars to join as a member, you will receive a membership gift. "You get what you pay for," but in reality, this gift is bought with our membership fees.

台文: 你一月日才趁彼屑仔錢，家己都飼袂飽矣，閣想欲學人蓄厝蓄車，真正是「閹雞趁鳳飛」。
台羅: Lí tsi̍t gue̍h-ji̍t tsiah thàn hit-sut-á tsînn, ka-kī to tshī bē pá--ah, koh siūnn-beh o̍h lâng hak-tshù hak tshia, tsin-tsiànn sī “iam-ke thàn hōng pue”.
中文: 你一個月才賺那麼一點點錢，自己都養不活了，還想學人家買房買車，真的是「東施效顰」。
英文: You only earn such a small amount of money in a month, you can't even support yourself, and you still want to learn from others to buy a house and a car. It's really "aping others without success".

台文: 咱做代誌愛有耐心，毋通驚艱苦，人講「戲棚跤徛久就是你的」，若會當堅持到底，相信咱一定會成功。
台羅: Lán tsò tāi-tsì ài ū nāi-sim, m̄-thang kiann kan-khóo, lâng kóng “hì-pênn kha khiā kú tō sī lí ê”, nā ē-tàng kian-tshî kàu-té,  siong-sìn lán it-tīng ē sîng-kong.
中文: 我們做事要有耐心，不要怕艱難，人家說「有志者事竟成」，如果能堅持到底，相信我們一定會成功。
英文: We must be patient and not be afraid of difficulties. They say, 'Where there's a will, there's a way.' If we can persevere to the end, I believe we will definitely succeed.

台文: 俗語講：「毛毛仔雨落久，塗嘛會澹。」咱人若加減做、加減趁，也會賰一寡仔家伙。
台羅: Sio̍k-gí kóng, “Mn̂g-mn̂g-á-hōo lo̍h-kú, thôo mā ē tâm.” Lán-lâng nā ke-kiám tsò, ke-kiám thàn, iā ē tshun tsi̍t-kuá-á ke-hué.
中文: 俗話說：「濛濛細雨下久了，土地也會潮濕。」我們若有得做就做、有得賺就賺，也會累積一點家產。
英文: As the saying goes, 'After a long period of drizzling rain, the land will become damp.' If we can do something, we should do it; if we can earn something, we should earn it, and we will also accumulate some wealth.

台文: 拄著代誌袂順序，若肯骨力去做，堅持落去，「毛毛仔雨落久，塗嘛會澹」，閣較困難的代誌嘛會當解決。
台羅: Tú-tio̍h tāi-tsì bē sūn-sī, nā khíng kut-la̍t khì tsò, kian-tshî--lo̍h-khì, “mn̂g-mn̂g-á-hōo lo̍h-kú, thôo mā ē tâm”, koh-khah khùn-lân ê tāi-tsì mā ē-tàng kái-kuat.
中文: 遇到事情不順利，只要肯努力去做，堅持下去，「濛濛細雨下久了，土地也會潮濕」，再困難的事情也能解決。
英文: Encountering difficulties, as long as you are willing to work hard and persist, "after a long drizzle, the land will become moist," even the most difficult things can be resolved.

台文: 「艱苦頭，快活尾」的道理人人知，毋過有擋頭的人才做會到。
台羅: “Kan-khóo thâu, khuìnn-ua̍h bué” ê tō-lí lâng-lâng tsai, m̄-koh ū-tòng-thâu ê lâng tsiah tsò ē kàu.
中文: 「吃得苦中苦，方為人上人」的道理大家都知道，但是有毅力的人才做得到。
英文: The principle of "Enduring hardship is the path to success" is known by everyone, but only those with perseverance can achieve it.

台文: 俗語講：「艱苦頭，快活尾。」阿發自國小出業了後就綴人去做塗水，骨力趁錢來飼規家伙仔，天公伯仔也真疼惜伊，予伊娶著願意做伙拍拚的媠某，閣踏著好時機佮人合股起厝趁著錢，兩个囡仔嘛真有孝閣有才情，予伊穩心仔提早退休，佮𪜶牽手鬥陣去遊山玩水。
台羅: Sio̍k-gí kóng, “Kan-khóo thâu, khuìnn-ua̍h bué.” A-huat tsū kok-sió tshut-gia̍p liáu-āu tō tuè lâng khì tsò thôo-tsuí, kut-la̍t thàn-tsînn lâi tshī kui-ke-hué-á, thinn-kong-peh--á iā tsin thiànn-sioh--i, hōo i tshuā-tio̍h guān-ì tsò-hué phah-piànn ê suí bóo, koh ta̍h-tio̍h hó sî-ki kah lâng ha̍p-kóo khí-tshù thàn-tio̍h tsînn, nn̄g ê gín-á mā tsin iú-hàu koh ū tsâi-tsîng, hōo i ún-sim-á thê-tsá thè-hiu, kah in khan-tshiú tàu-tīn khì iû-san-uán-suí.
中文: 俗諺說：「含淚播種，歡笑收割。」阿發從國小畢業後就跟著別人去做泥水匠，賣力賺錢養一家人，老天爺也很疼愛他，讓他娶到願意一起努力的美嬌娘，又遇上景氣好跟人合建公寓賺到錢，兩個小孩很孝順又有才華，讓他安心提早退休，和妻子一同去遊山玩水。
英文: Saying: 'Sow with tears, reap with laughter.' Ah Fa followed others to become a bricklayer after graduating from elementary school, working hard to earn money to support his family. The heavens also favored him, allowing him to marry a beautiful and willing partner who was willing to work hard together. He also encountered a good economy and earned money by collaborating with others to build apartments. Their two children were filial and talented, allowing him to retire early with peace of mind and travel to the mountains and waters with his wife.

台文: 判斷媒體消息的正確度真誠重要，社會定定有人放一个風聲，隨就有人「講一个影，生一个囝」，綴咧烏白傳消息。
台羅: Phuànn-tuàn muî-thé siau-sit ê tsìng-khak-tōo tsin-tsiânn tiōng-iàu, siā-huē tiānn-tiānn ū lâng pàng tsi̍t ê hong-siann, suî tō ū lâng “kóng tsi̍t ê iánn, senn tsi̍t ê kiánn”, tuè leh oo-pe̍h thuân siau-sit.
中文: 判斷媒體消息的正確度十分重要，社會上常常有人放個風聲，馬上就有人「捕風捉影」，亂傳消息。
英文: Judging the accuracy of media reports is very important. There are often people in society who spread rumors and immediately there are people who "see shadows in the wind" and spread false information.

台文: 食物件毋通拚遐雄勢，人講「講著食，舂破額」，你按呢袂輸枵鬼仝款。
台羅: Tsia̍h mi̍h-kiānn m̄-thang piànn hiah hiông-sè, lâng kóng “kóng-tio̍h tsia̍h, tsing-phuà hia̍h”, lí án-ne bē-su iau-kuí kāng-khuán.
中文: 吃東西不要如此急躁，人們說「為了吃而爭先恐後，撞破了額頭」，你這樣好像貪吃鬼一般。
英文: Don't be so impatient when eating, people say 'rushing to eat and bumping their heads, as if they were gluttons'.

台文: 貪心的人「講著食，舂破額」，到尾仔嘛無較贏。
台羅: Tham-sim ê lâng “kóng-tio̍h tsia̍h, tsing-phuà hia̍h”, kàu bué--á mā bô khah iânn.
中文: 貪心的人「爭權奪利而不顧形象」，到頭來也只是一場空。
英文: Greedy people "fight for power and profit without considering their image", in the end it's all in vain.

台文: 「搖人無才，搖豬無刣」，咱愛較定著咧，才袂予人看袂起。
台羅: “Iô lâng bô-tsâi, iô ti bô thâi”, lán ài khah tiānn-tio̍h--leh, tsiah bē hōo lâng khuànn-bē-khí.
中文: 搖來晃去的人沒有才幹，搖搖晃晃的豬，就不屠宰」，我們要穩重一點，才不會被別人瞧不起。
英文: Shaking and swaying people have no talent, swaying pigs, don't slaughter them. We need to be more steady so that others won't look down on us.

台文: 俗語講：「斷掌查埔做相公，斷掌查某守空房。」以早這句無影無跡的話，害死一寡斷掌的查某人，真正是買命。
台羅: Sio̍k-gí kóng, “Tn̄g-tsiúnn tsa-poo tsò siùnn-kang, tn̄g-tsiúnn tsa-bóo tsiú khang-pâng.” Í-tsá tsit kù bô-iánn-bô-tsiah ê uē, hāi-sí tsi̍t-kuá tn̄g-tsiúnn ê tsa-bóo-lâng, tsin-tsiànn sī bé-miā.
中文: 俗語說：「男子斷掌，比較果斷，適合當官；女子斷掌，是剋夫命，會守寡。」從前這句毫無根據的話，害慘一些斷掌的婦女，真是要命。
英文: According to a proverb, "If a man's palm is broken, he is decisive and suitable for being an official; if a woman's palm is broken, it is a sign of widowhood and she will remain a widow." In the past, this baseless saying has caused great harm to some women with broken palms, which is truly unfortunate.

台文: 彼个人客䆀閣厚屎，見擺來攏欲賒數，就像人咧講的「䆀猴𠢕欠數」。
台羅: Hit ê lâng-kheh bái koh kāu-sái, kiàn-pái lâi lóng beh sia-siàu, tō tshiūnn lâng teh kóng--ê “bái-kâu gâu khiàm-siàu”.
中文: 那個客人長得醜又愛挑剔，買次來都要賒帳，就像人家說的「醜人愛賒帳」。
英文: That guest is ugly and picky, always buying on credit, just like they say, 'Ugly people love to buy on credit'.

台文: 伊拄入去公司就搪著「舊囚食新囚」，逐項代誌老鳥都欲共伊食死死，無欲予伊有機會通出頭。
台羅: I tú ji̍p-khì kong-si tō tn̄g-tio̍h “kū siû tsia̍h sin siû”, ta̍k hāng tāi-tsì lāu-tsiáu to beh kā i tsia̍h-sí-sí, bô beh hōo i ū ki-huē thang tshut-thâu.
中文: 他剛進去公司就遭遇「老鳥欺負新鳥」，每件事情老鳥都要吃定他，不讓他有出頭的機會。
英文: As soon as he entered the company, he encountered the situation of "experienced employees bullying new employees". In everything, the experienced employees would dominate him and not give him any chance to stand out.

台文: 頭家定定一支喙踅踅唸，毋過「雜唸大家出蠻皮新婦」，久來下跤手人攏麻痺去矣，無咧共伊信篤。
台羅: Thâu-ke tiānn-tiānn tsi̍t ki tshuì se̍h-se̍h-liām, m̄-koh “tsa̍p-liām ta-ke tshut bân-phuê sin-pū”, kú--lâi ē-kha-tshiú-lâng lóng bâ-pì--khì--ah, bô teh kā i sìn-táu.
中文: 老闆一張嘴常常念個不停，但「有嘮叨的上司，就會有不聽話的部屬」，久了底下的員工都麻木了，也不把他當一回事。
英文: The boss often keeps talking non-stop, but "if there is a nagging boss, there will be disobedient subordinates". Over time, the employees below have become numb and don't take him seriously.

台文: 伊少年的時袂曉想，無了解爸母的苦心，閣定定共𪜶夯硬篙，等到伊做人爸母矣，才體會著「雙手抱孩兒，才知爸母時」的道理。
台羅: I siàu-liân ê sî bē-hiáu siūnn, bô liáu-kái pē-bú ê khóo-sim, koh tiānn-tiānn kā in giâ-ngē-ko, tán-kàu i tsò lâng pē-bú--ah, tsiah thé-huē-tio̍h “siang-tshiú phō hâi-jî, tsiah tsai pē-bú sî” ê tō-lí.
中文: 他年少輕狂，不了解父母的苦心，還常常跟他們唱反調，直到他當父母了，才體會到「養兒方知父母恩」的道理。
英文: He was young and arrogant, not understanding his parents' hard work, often going against them, until he became a parent himself, only then did he understand the meaning of "raising a child makes one appreciate the kindness of parents".

台文: 俗語講：「雙个旋，惡甲無人問。」阮小弟雖然雙个旋，毋過伊性地好，閣真有人緣，共這款無科學根據的古早話當做笑談就好。
台羅: Sio̍k-gí kóng, “Siang ê tsn̄g, ok kah bô lâng mn̄g.” Guán sió-tī sui-jiân siang ê tsn̄g, m̄-koh i sìng-tē hó, koh tsin ū-lâng-iân, kā tsit khuán bô kho-ha̍k kin-kì ê kóo-tsá uē tòng-tsò tshiàu-tâm tō hó.
中文: 俗話說：「兩個髮旋的人，兇惡到沒人聞問。」我弟弟雖然有兩個髮旋，但他脾氣好，還很有人緣，把這種無科學依據的俗語視為有趣的笑話就好。
英文: As the saying goes, 'Two people with curly hair are so fierce that no one dares to ask.' Although my younger brother has two curly hairs, he has a good temper and is very popular. He just sees this unscientific idiom as an interesting joke.

台文: 歹代就毋通做，愛知影「雞卵密密也有縫」，代誌早慢會煏空。
台羅: Pháinn-tāi tō m̄-thang tsò, ài tsai-iánn “ke-nn̄g ba̍t-ba̍t iā ū phāng”, tāi-tsì tsá-bān ē piak-khang.
中文: 壞事不要做，要曉得「百密必有一疏」，事情早晚會敗露。
英文: Don't do bad things, you should know that "there is always a loophole in every plan", the truth will be revealed sooner or later.

台文: 伊掠準進前共人烏西這層代誌處理甲誠好勢矣，毋過「雞卵密密也有縫」，尾仔猶是煏空矣。
台羅: I lia̍h-tsún tsìn-tsîng kā lâng oo-se tsit tsân tāi-tsì tshú-lí kah tsiânn hó-sè--ah, m̄-koh “ke-nn̄g ba̍t-ba̍t iā ū phāng”, bué--á iáu-sī  piak-khang--ah.
中文: 他以為之前行賄這件事情處理得萬無一失了，但是「百密必有一疏」，後來還是被揭發了。
英文: He thought that the bribery incident had been handled perfectly, but "there is always a loophole in every plan," and it was eventually exposed.

台文: 人看咱無，咱顛倒愛較拍拚。俗語講：「雞屎落塗，也有三寸煙。」咱若會長志，人就毋敢看衰咱。
台羅: Lâng khuànn lán bô, lán tian-tò ài khah phah-piànn. Sio̍k-gí kóng, “Ke-sái lo̍h-thôo, iā ū sann tshùn ian.” Lán nā ē tsiáng-tsì, lâng tō m̄ kánn khuànn-sue--lán.
中文: 人家看不起我們，我們反而要更努力。俗話說：「雞屎落地，也有三寸煙。」我們要是能奮發向上，人家就不敢把我們看扁了。
英文: People look down on us, but we should work even harder. As the saying goes, 'Even chicken droppings have three inches of smoke.' If we can strive for progress, others won't dare to look down on us.

台文: 人出世就有好額散的差別，毋過人講「雞屎落塗，也有三寸煙」，散赤囡仔有志氣，閣較會予人呵咾。
台羅: Lâng tshut-sì tō ū hó-gia̍h-sàn ê tsha-pia̍t, m̄-koh lâng kóng “ke-sái lo̍h-thôo, iā ū sann tshùn ian”, sàn-tshiah gín-á ū tsì-khì, koh-khah ē hōo lâng o-ló.
中文: 人出生就有貧富不均的差別，不過人家說「雞屎落地，也有三寸煙」，窮人家小孩有志氣，更會受人稱讚。
英文: People are born with unequal wealth, but as they say, "Even chicken droppings have three inches of smoke." Poor children have aspirations and are more likely to be praised by others.

台文: 伊自少年就對下港起去臺北做生理，佇遐娶某生囝，到今五十外冬矣，毋過「離鄉，無離腔」，講臺語的時猶原有下港腔。
台羅: I tsū siàu-liân tō tuì ē-káng khí-khì Tâi-pak tsò-sing-lí, tī hia tshuā-bóo senn-kiánn, kàu-tann gōo-tsa̍p-guā tang--ah, m̄-koh “lī hiunn, bô lī khiunn”, kóng Tâi-gí ê sî iu-guân ū ē-káng khiunn.
中文: 他年輕時就從南部上去臺北做生意，在那裡娶妻生子，至今五十多年了，不過「離鄉，不離腔」，說臺語時仍然有南部腔。
英文: When he was young, he went from the south to Taipei to do business, where he got married and had children. It has been over fifty years, but he still speaks with a southern accent when speaking Taiwanese.

台文: 人講：「關門著閂，講話著看。」咱講話著愛細膩斟酌，才袂無張無持去共人得失著。
台羅: Lâng kóng, “Kuainn-mn̂g tio̍h tshuànn, kóng-uē tio̍h khuànn.” Lán kóng-uē tio̍h-ài sè-jī tsim-tsiok, tsiah bē bô-tiunn-bô-tî khì kā lâng tik-sit--tio̍h.
中文: 人家說：「關門要上門栓，說話要看場合。」我們說話要小心謹慎，才不會一不小心得罪到人。
英文: People say, 'When closing the door, latch it; when speaking, consider the occasion.' We should speak carefully and cautiously, so as not to unintentionally offend others.

台文: 感謝你點醒我「勸人做好代，較贏食早齋」，我會加做寡善事，共有困難的人鬥相共。
台羅: Kám-siā lí tiám-tshénn guá “khǹg lâng tsò hó tāi, khah iânn tsia̍h tsá-tsai”, guá ē ke tsò kuá siān-sū, kā ū khùn-lân ê lâng tàu-sann-kāng.
中文: 謝謝你提醒我「與其吃早齋，不如多做好事」，我會多做好事，幫助有困難的人。
英文: Thank you for reminding me "Instead of fasting, it's better to do more good deeds", I will do more good deeds and help people in need.

台文: 人講：「勸恁有孝千萬句，袂曉有孝豬狗牛。」你按呢共恁序大人忤逆，實在誠不應該。
台羅: Lâng kóng, “Khǹg lín iú-hàu tshian-bān kù, bē-hiáu iú-hàu ti káu gû.” Lí án-ne kā lín sī-tuā-lâng ngóo-gi̍k, si̍t-tsāi tsiânn put ing-kai.
中文: 人家說：「勸告各位要孝順父母，否則連畜牲都不如。」像你這樣忤逆父母親，實在很不應該。
英文: People say, 'Advising everyone to be filial to their parents, otherwise even animals are better than you.' It's really inappropriate for you to be disobedient to your parents.

台文: 政府抑是爸母管愈嚴，人民抑是序細就閣較會起慼，𠢕變鬼變怪，莫怪人咧講：「嚴官府出厚賊；嚴爸母出阿里不達。」
台羅: Tsìng-hú ia̍h-sī pē-bú kuán jú giâm, jîn-bîn ia̍h-sī sī-sè tō koh-khah ē khí-tsheh, gâu pìnn-kuí-pìnn-kuài, bo̍k-kuài lâng teh kóng, “Giâm kuann-hú tshut kāu tsha̍t; giâm pē-bú tshut a-lí-put-ta̍t.”
中文: 政府或父母管得愈嚴格，人民或小孩就更會感到厭惡，容易搞鬼耍花招，難怪人家說：「過於嚴苛的官府，小偷反而更加猖狂；父母管教過嚴，小孩越是不成材。」
英文: The more strict the government or parents are, the more the people or children will feel disgusted, and they will easily play tricks. No wonder people say, 'The more strict the government, the more rampant the thieves; the more strict the parents, the more unsuccessful the children.'

台文: 明其知伊這个人是無半撇，猶是交代一寡簡單的穡頭予伊試看覓咧，結局照常做甲離離落落，有影是「爛塗袂糊得壁」。
台羅: Bîng-kî-tsai i tsit ê lâng sī bô-puànn-phiat, iáu-sī kau-tài tsi̍t-kuá kán-tan ê sit-thâu hōo i tshì-khuànn-māi--leh, kiat-kio̍k tsiàu-siông tsò kah li-li-lak-lak, ū-iánn sī “nuā-thôo bē kôo tit piah”.
中文: 明知他這個人一點本事也沒有，仍舊把一些簡單的工作交付他試試看，結果照樣做得亂七八糟，果然「爛泥扶不上牆」。
英文: Knowing that he has no skills at all, they still assigned him some simple tasks to try, and as expected, he did them all in a mess, truly "can't make a silk purse out of a sow's ear".

台文: 俗語講：「歡歡喜喜一工，煩煩惱惱也一工。」做人著愛較樂暢咧，煩惱是加工的。
台羅: Sio̍k-gí kóng, “Huann-huann-hí-hí tsi̍t kang, huân-huân-ló-ló iā tsi̍t kang.” Tsò lâng tio̍h-ài khah lo̍k-thiòng--leh, huân-ló sī ke-kang--ê.
中文: 俗話說：「快樂也是過一天，憂愁也是過一天。」做人應該要比較快樂些，煩惱是多餘的。
英文: As the saying goes, 'Happiness is also a day, sorrow is also a day.' People should be happier and worries are unnecessary.

台文: 我知影你揣無頭路心內艱苦，毋過「歡歡喜喜一工，煩煩惱惱也一工」，你著看較開咧，咱閣來去揣。
台羅: Guá tsai-iánn lí tshuē-bô thâu-lōo sim-lāi kan-khóo, m̄-koh “huann-huann-hí-hí tsi̍t kang, huân-huân-ló-ló iā tsi̍t kang”, lí tio̍h khuànn khah khui--leh, lán koh lâi-khì tshuē.
中文: 我知道你找不到工作心裡難過，不過「快樂也是過一天，憂愁也是過一天」，你要看開一點，我們繼續找。
英文: I know you're upset about not being able to find a job, but "Happiness is also a day, sorrow is also a day." You need to be more open-minded, let's keep looking.

台文: 有人請教一个好額人好額的祕訣，伊笑笑仔講：「聽某喙，大富貴。家庭和諧，事業自然較會成功。」
台羅: Ū lâng tshíng-kàu tsi̍t ê hó-gia̍h-lâng hó-gia̍h ê pì-kuat, i tshiò-tshiò-á kóng, “Thiann bóo tshuì, tuā hù-kuì. Ka-tîng hô-hâi, sū-gia̍p tsū-jiân khah ē sîng-kong.”
中文: 有人請教一位富翁富有的祕訣，他笑笑說：「聽妻子的話，大富大貴。家庭和諧，事業自然比較容易成功。」
英文: Someone asked a wealthy man for the secret to his wealth, he smiled and said, "Listen to your wife, and you'll be rich and prosperous. A harmonious family makes it easier for your career to succeed."

台文: 遮爾簡單的問題，你一个大學生煞毋知欲按怎解決，敢是「讀冊，讀佇尻脊骿」？
台羅: Tsiah-nī kán-tan ê būn-tê, lí tsi̍t ê tāi-ha̍k-sing suah m̄ tsai beh án-tsuánn kái-kuat, kám-sī “tha̍k-tsheh, tha̍k tī kha-tsiah-phiann”?
中文: 這麼簡單的問題，你一個大學生竟然不知如何解決，難道是「書都讀到背部去了」？
英文: Such a simple question, and yet you, a university student, don't even know how to solve it. Could it be that you've "studied until it's all in your back"?

台文: 𪜶共往過佇學校學著的智識用來做歹代誌，正港是「讀冊，讀佇尻脊骿」。
台羅: In kā íng-kuè tī ha̍k-hāu o̍h--tio̍h ê tì-sik īng-lâi tsò pháinn tāi-tsì, tsiànn-káng sī “tha̍k-tsheh, tha̍k tī kha-tsiah-phiann”.
中文: 他們將以前在學校學到的知識用來做壞事，真的是「書都讀到背部去了」。
英文: They will use the knowledge they learned in school before to do bad things, it's really "reading the book to the back".

台文: 人講：「驚某大丈夫，拍某豬狗牛。」翁仔某著愛互相疼惜佮尊存，毋通起跤動手。
台羅: Lâng kóng, “Kiann bóo tāi-tiōng-hu, phah bóo ti káu gû.” Ang-á-bóo tio̍h-ài hōo-siong thiànn-sioh kah tsun-tshûn, m̄-thang khí-kha-tāng-tshiú.
中文: 人家說：「怕妻子的是男子漢，打妻子的豬狗不如。」夫妻要互相疼惜與尊重，不要動手動腳。
英文: People say, 'A real man is afraid of his wife, beating one's wife is worse than a pig or a dog.' Spouses should cherish and respect each other, and not resort to violence.

台文: 阿義仔歌聲真好，老師鼓勵伊去參加歌唱比賽，伊攏講伊足驚上台唱歌。老師講：「『驚驚袂著等。』你愛勇敢徛起去舞台，才會當予人知影你的歌聲有偌好。」
台羅: A-gī--á kua-siann tsin hó, lāu-su kóo-lē i khì tsham-ka kua-tshiùnn pí-sài, i lóng kóng i tsiok kiann tsiūnn-tâi tshiùnn-kua. Lāu-su kóng: “ ‘Kiann-kiann bē tio̍h-tíng.’ Lí ài ióng-kám khiā khí-khì bú-tâi, tsiah ē-tàng hōo lâng tsai-iánn lí ê kua-siann ū guā hó.”
中文: 小義歌聲很好，老師鼓勵他去參加歌唱比賽，他都說他很怕上台唱歌。老師說：「『光是恐懼擔憂不會獲得優勝。』你要勇敢站上舞台，才能讓人知道你的歌聲有多好。」
英文: The little Yi's singing is very good. The teacher encouraged him to participate in the singing competition, but he said he was afraid to sing on stage. The teacher said, "Just being afraid won't win you the championship. You have to bravely step onto the stage to let people know how good your singing is."

台文: 伊這个人有較直，袂曉變竅，毋過「戇的也有一項會」，交代伊做直頭路，伊攏會照起工做，袂拖沙、袂勼水，真可取。
台羅: I tsit ê lâng ū khah ti̍t, bē-hiáu piàn-khiàu, m̄-koh “gōng--ê iā ū tsi̍t hāng ē”, kau-tài i tsò ti̍t thâu-lōo, i lóng ē tsiàu-khí-kang tsò, bē thua-sua, bē kiu-tsuí, tsin khó-tshú.
中文: 他這個人比較直，不會變通，不過「天生我才必有用」，交代他做不需要變通的事，他都會照規矩做，不會拖拖拉拉、不會敷衍，很有可取之處。
英文: He is straightforward and inflexible, but "I was born to be useful." When asked to do something that doesn't require flexibility, he will follow the rules and won't procrastinate or be perfunctory. He has admirable qualities.
